content: Yakhauj cov tub kws nyag coj nyag quaspuj tubse nrug Yakhauj moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv npe hu le nuav:
Lunpees, Xime-oos, Levis, Yudas,
Ixakhas, Xenpuloos, Npeenyamees,
Daas, Nathalis, Khas hab Aseles.
Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg kws nwg coj moog muaj xyaa caum leej. Nwg tug tub Yauxej tub xub moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm.
Tom qaab ntawd Yauxej txawm tuag lawm, ces taagnrho nwg cov tijlaug, hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob tam ntawd puavleej tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Tabsis puab cov tubki kws yog cov Yixalayees muaj mivnyuas fuamvaam coob nyob puv nkaus tebchaws Iziv.
Tug vaajntxwv tshab kws lug kaav tebchaws Iziv, nwg tsi paub Yauxej.
Nwg has rua nwg cov pejxeem has tas, “Cov Yixalayees fuamvaam coob hab muaj zug heev, nyob tsaam puab ua phem rua peb.

Ces thaus muaj tsuv muaj rog tuaj tua peb, puab yuav sau nthwv tuaj yeebncuab tog tua peb, hab puab yuav tsiv tawm  huv peb lub tebchaws moog. Peb yuavtsum nrhav kev txuv cov tuabneeg nuav tsi pub kuas puab fuamvaam ntxiv lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Iziv txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog yuam cov Yixalayees ua num nyaav kawg nkaus kuas puab poob sab. Cov Yixalayees ua lub nroog Phithoos hab lub nroog Lamexes rau Falaus tej cuabyeej.
Txawm yog cov Iziv yuav quab yuam cov Yixalayees npaum le caag los puab yimfuab fuamvaam coob npaum le ntawd hab rhawv zej zog dlaav zuj zug, ua rua cov Iziv ntshai puab heev.
Cov Iziv yuam cov Yixalayees ua qhev txomnyem ntsuav,
hab yuam puab ua cov Iziv tej vaaj tse, tej laj teb hab ua txhua yaam num nyaav, puab tsi hlub cov Yixalayees hlo le.
Muaj ib nub cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv has rua ob tug quaspuj kws yog Sifalas hab Puahas kws pheej moog paab cov Henplais tej quaspuj dlaws cev.
Nwg has rua obtug tas, “Thaus meb moog paab cov Henplais tej quaspuj dlaws cev, tug mivnyuas twg yog tug tub, meb ca le muab tua povtseg, tabsis tug twg yog tug ntxhais, meb maam le ca nyob.”
Tabsis obtug quaspuj ntawd paub ntshai Vaajtswv, obtug txhaj tsi ua lawv le vaajntxwv Iziv has, obtug tsi tua tej mivnyuas tub povtseg.
Yog le ntawd, vaajntxwv txhaj tso tuabneeg moog hu obtug tuaj cuag nwg, hab nwg nug obtug has tas, “Vim le caag meb ua le nuav? Vim le caag meb tseem tseg cov mivnyuas tub nyob hab?”
Obtug teb has tas, “Cov quaspuj Henplais tsi zoo le peb cov quaspuj Iziv, puab tau mivnyuas sai heev, hab puab tub tau mivnyuas ua ntej wb moog txug lawm.”
Vim obtug paub ntshai Vaajtswv, Vaajtswv txhaj ua zoo rua obtug hab pub obtug muaj tubki coob.
Cov Yixalayees pheej fuamvaam coob zuj zug hab muaj zug heev.

Thaus kawg Falaus saamfwm rua nwg cov pejxeem suavdlawg has tas, “Ca le muab cov Henplais tej mivnyuas tub kws nyavnyuas yug tau lug txhua tug pov rua huv tug Dlej Niles, tabsis tseg cov mivnyuas ntxhais ca.”
Thaus ntawd muaj ib tug txivneej kws yog xeem Levis, moog yuav nwg xeem ib tug ntxhais lug ua quaspuj,
hab tug quaspuj ntawd yug tau ib tug tub rua nwg. Thaus tug quaspuj ntawd pum has tas, tug tub nuav ntxim hlub heev, nwg txawm muab zais tau peb lub hlis.

Tabsis thaus kws nwg yuav zais tsi tau tug tub ntawd ntxiv lawm, nwg txhaj muab ib lub tawb kavtheej lug hab muab roj ntoos leem tsi pub kuas dlej txheem tau rua saab huv. Nwg muab tug tub ntawd tso pw rua huv lub tawb hab nqaa moog tso rua huv cov lojkov nraag ntug dlej.
Tug tub ntawd tug muam txhaj moog sawv ib caag dleb tsawv saib tuaj, saib puas muaj xwm dlaabtsi rua tug tub ntawd.

Falaus tug ntxhais moog dlaa dlej nraag haav dlej, thaus kws nwg cov ntxhais qhev ncig ua si ntawm ntug dlej. Taamsim ntawd nwg txawm pum ib lub tawb nyob huv cov lojkov, nwg txhaj kuas ib tug nkauj nqe moog nqaa lug rua nwg saib.

Thaus tug ntxhais qhev nqaa lug txug, Falaus tug ntxhais muab qheb hlo saib, ua cav muaj ib tug mivnyuas tub pw huv. Tug tub ntawd quaj heev, ua rua Falaus tug ntxhais hlub nwg kawg le; nwg has tas, “Tug tub nuav yog cov Henplais mivnyuas.”
Tug tub ntawd tug muam txhaj lug has rua Falaus tug ntxhais has tas, “Koj puas xaav khaiv kuv moog nrhav ib tug quaspuj kws yog cov Henplais tu tug tub nuav rua koj?”
Falaus tug ntxhais teb has tas, “Thov koj ca le moog nrhav.” Yog le ntawd, tug ntxhais txhaj moog coj tug tub ntawd leej nam tuaj.
Falaus tug ntxhais has rua tug quaspuj ntawd tas, “Koj coj tug mivnyuas nuav moog tu rua kuv, kuv yuav muab nqe zug rua koj.” Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj coj tug mivtub ntawd lug tu.

Thaus tug mivnyuas ntawd luj hlub lawm, leej nam txhaj coj moog cob rua Falaus tug ntxhais kws yuav tug mivnyuas ntawd ua nwg tug tub. Vaajntxwv tug ntxhais has tas, “Kuv muab tug tub nuav huv dlej lug, yog le ntawd, kuv yuav tis tug tub nuav lub npe hu ua Mauxes.”

Thaus Mauxes hlub tav txiv lawm, Mauxes txhaj moog ncig saib nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab nwg pum puab raug luas quab yuam ua num nyaav kawg le. Hab nwg tseem pum cov Iziv ib tug txivneej muab ib tug Henplais kws yog Mauxes tsaav tuabneeg ntaus.
Thaus Mauxes pum le ntawd, Mauxes xaam ncig leeg thaaj tsaam ntawd tsi muaj leejtwg nyob ze, nwg txawm muab tug tuabneeg Iziv ntawd tua kag. Nwg muab hai moog faus rua huv cov xuabzeb.
Nub tom qaab Mauxes rov tawm moog hab pum ob tug tuabneeg Henplais taabtom sis ntaus. Mauxes has rua tug kws ua txhum has tas, “Ua caag koj laam ntaus tug kws yog koj tsaav tuabneeg Henplais?”

Tug txivneej ntawd teb has tas, “Leejtwg tsaa koj ua nom tuaj txav txim rua wb le nuav? Koj yuav muab kuv tua povtseg ib yaam le koj tua tug tuabneeg Iziv hab los?” Ces Mauxes ntshai heev hab nwg xaav has tas, “Muaj tuabneeg paub zaaj kws kuv ua taag lug lawm lauj.”
Thaus Falaus nov dlheev zaaj nuav, nwg txhaj nrhav Mauxes tua povtseg, tabsis Mauxes tub xub tsiv moog rua tim tebchaws Midias lawm. Muaj ib nub, thaus Mauxes taabtom nyob ntawm ib lub qhov tshij,
Yethoos kws yog tug povthawj huv tebchaws Midias, xyaa leej ntxhais tuaj ntaus dlej laub rua huv dlaab rua puab txiv cov yaaj hab cov tshis haus.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg yug yaaj muab Yethoos cov ntxhais lawv tsiv. Ces Mauxes txhaj moog paab puab hab ntaus dlej rua puab cov tsaj haus.
Thaus cov ntxhais rov lug txug tsev, puab txiv nug puab has tas, “Ua caag nub nua mej lug tsev ntxuv dlua txhua nub?”

Cov ntxhais teb has tas, “Muaj ib tug tuabneeg Iziv paab peb, tsi pub cov yug yaaj ua phem rua peb, hab nwg tseem ntaus dlej rua peb hab ntaus dlej rua peb tej tsaj haus huv tuabsi, peb txhaj tau lug tsev ntxuv.”
Yethoos nug nwg cov ntxhais has tas, “Tug txivneej ntawd nyob qhov twg? Ua le caag mej tsi coj nwg lug tsev? Mej ca le moog hu nwg lug nrug peb noj mov.”
Yog le ntawd Mauxes txhaj ua ib sab nyob huv tebchaws Midias, hab Yethoos muab nwg tug ntxhais Xipaulas rua Mauxes yuav,
Xipaulas yug tau ib tug tub rua Mauxes. Mauxes has tas, “Rua qhov kuv yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, yog le ntawd, kuv tis kuv tug tub nuav lub npe hu ua Nkesoos.”
Tau ntau xyoo tom qaab kws cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tuag lawm, tabsis cov Yixalayees tseem pheej quaj ntsuag rua txujkev ua qhev hab quaj thov Vaajtswv paab. Puab tej suab quaj moog txug Vaajtswv,
Vaajtswv nov puab tej suab quaj hab ncu txug tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj lawm.
Vaajtswv pum cov Yixalayees txujkev kws ua luas qhev hab nwg hlub puab kawg nkaus le.

Muaj ib nub Mauxes taabtom moog yug nwg yawmtxiv Yethoos kws yog tug povthawj nyob huv tebchaws Midias cov yaaj hab cov tshis, nwg coj paab tsaj ntawd hlaa taj suabpuam moog txug tim lub Roob Xinais kws yog lub roob dlawbhuv.

Nyob rua qhov ntawd, tug TSWV ib tug timtswv tau lug txa ua nplaim suavtawg cig laam lug rua Mauxes pum nyob huv ib tsob ntoo. Mauxes pum nplaim tawg cig lab ploog huv tsob ntoo tuaj, tabsis tsob ntoo tsi kub nyab le.
Mauxes xaav has tas, “Ua caag qhov nuav yuav txawv ua luaj, vim le caag tsob ntoo tsi kub nyab le, kuv yuav txaav moog kuas ze hab xauj saib.”
Thaus tug TSWV pum Mauxes txaav lug ze, nwg hu Mauxes huv tsob ntoo ntawd tuaj has tas, “Mauxes! Mauxes!” Mauxes teb has tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Tsi xob txaav lug ze ntawm nuav. Ca le hle koj nkawm khau, rua qhov koj sawv ntawm thaaj chaw kws dlawbhuv.
Kuv yog koj cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv, yog Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.” Yog le ntawd, Mauxes tsi muaj cuabkaav yuav saib taug Vaajtswv, nwg txhaj muab teg pus nwg ntsejmuag.

Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv pum kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv raug kev tsimtxom heev, kuv nov puab tej suab quaj qw thov kuv paab kuas puab dlim ntawm txujkev kws puab raug yuam ua luas qhev. Kuv paub puab raug kev txomnyem kawg nkaus le lawm,

yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj lug paab kuas puab dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg Iziv hab yuav coj puab tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog nyob lub tebchaws vaammeej kws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws naj nub nua cov Kana-aas, cov Hitis, cov Amoos, cov Pelixes, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus nyob.
Kuv tub nov kuv tsaav tuabneeg lub suab quaj thov kuv paab puab lawm, hab kuv pum cov tuabneeg Iziv tsimtxom puab kawg nkaus le.
Nwgnuav kuv yuav khaiv koj moog cuag cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv hab koj moog tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg kuas puab tawm tau huv nwg lub tebchaws lug.”
Tabsis Mauxes has rua Vaajtswv tas, “Kuv tsi yog ib tug numtswv. Kuv yuav ua le caag muaj cuabkaav moog cuag tau vaajntxwv, hab coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug?”

Vaajtswv teb has tas, “Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj, hab thaus koj coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug, mej yuav tuaj pehawm kuv sau lub roob nuav. Koj txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug khaiv koj moog.”

Mauxes teb Vaajtswv has tas, “Thaus kuv moog txug ntawm cov Yixalayees hab qha rua puab has tas, ‘Mej cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv khaiv kuv tuaj cuag mej,’ hab puab yuav nug kuv has tas, ‘Tug Vaajtswv ntawd lub npe hu le caag?’ Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav teb puab le caag?”
Vaajtswv has tas, “KUV YOG TUG KWS KUV YOG. Koj yuavtsum qha rua puab has tas: ‘Tug kws nwg lub npe hu ua KUV YOG TUG KWS KUV YOG,  tau tso kuv tuaj paab mej.’

Qha rua cov Yixalayees paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV, puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv, kws yog Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv, khaiv koj moog paab puab. Lub npe nuav yog kuv lub npe moog ibtxhis, txij nuav moog lawm yaav tom ntej txhua tam tuabneeg yuavtsum hu kuv lub npe le nuav.

Koj ca le moog hab hu cov Yixalayees cov kev txwjlaug tuaj ua ke hab qha rua puab has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV, puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv kws yog Anplahaas, Ixaj, hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tau lug tshwm rua koj pum. Qha rua puab has tas, kuv tub lug saib puab hab kuv pum cov Iziv tsimtxom puab lawm.

Kuv npaaj sab has tas, kuv yuav coj puab tawm huv tebchaws Iziv, qhov chaw kws puab raug luas tsimtxom moog nyob huv lub tebchaws vaammeej kws yog cov Kana-aas, cov Hitis, cov Amoos, cov Pelixes, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus lub tebchaws vaammeej kws aav rog hab zoo qoob.

“Kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuav noog tej lug kws koj has. Ces koj yuavtsum nrug cov Yixalayees tej kev txwjlaug moog cuag cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv lug ua rua peb pum. Nwgnuav thov koj tso peb moog peb nub ke rua tom taj suabpuam, peb yuav moog tua tsaj fij rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv.’
Kuv paub has tas, cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv yeej yuav tsi tso mej moog, yog nwg tsi raug tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus yuam kuas tso.
Tabsis kuv yuav siv kuv lub fwjchim kws txaus ntshai kawg rau txim rua cov Iziv. Ces tom qaab ntawd nwg maam le yuav tso mej tawm moog.
“Kuv yuav tshoov cov Iziv sab kuas puab fwm koj, mas thaus kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawm moog, puab yuav tsi tawm moog teg dlawb teg nplag.

Txhua tug quaspuj Yixalayees yuav moog thov tej quaspuj Iziv kws nrug mej nyob koom zej koom zog, hab nrug nwg nyob ua ib tse, tej tsoog tsho, saw nyaj saw kub. Cov Yixalayees yuav muab tej ntawd rua puab tej tub tej ntxhais coj hab naav, hab mej yuav sau cov Iziv tej qhov txhua chaw huv tuabsi moog.”
Mauxes teb tug TSWV has tas, “Tabsis yog cov Yixalayees tsi ntseeg kuv hab tsi noog tej lug kws kuv has, kuv yuav ua le caag? yog puab has tas, ‘Tug TSWV tub tsi tau lug tshwm rua koj pum le ne?’ ”
Tug TSWV txhaj nug Mauxes has tas, “Koj tuav dlaabtsi ntawm koj txhais teg?” Mauxes teb has tas, “Kuv tuav ib tug paas nreg.”

Tug TSWV has ntxiv rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le muab pov rua huv aav.” Thaus Mauxes muab tug paas nreg pov rhees rua huv aav, tug paas ntawd txawm txa kag ua ib tug naab, Mauxes ntshai hab nwg ca le tig hlo tsiv.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le cev teg tuav nkaus tug naab tug kutwv nqaa hlo.” Mauxes txhaj cev loo teg tuav nkaus tug naab, ces tug naab rov qaab yog tug paas nreg le qub lawm.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ua le nuav qha rua cov Yixalayees has tas, tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv kws yog Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv tau lug tshwm rua koj pum tag.”

Tug TSWV has ntxiv rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le muab koj txhais teg ntsaws rua huv koj plaab tshos.” Mauxes ua lawv le ntawd, hab thaus nwg thau nwg txhais teg tawm lug, ua cav nwg txhais teg ca le mob ruas ua cos dlawb paug ib yaam le te.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Koj ca le muab koj txhais teg ntsaws rov qaab rua huv koj plaab tshos dlua.” Mauxes txawm ua lawv le ntawd, thaus nwg thau nwg txhais teg tawm lug, ua cav nwg txhais teg zoo dlu lug ib yaam le qub lawm.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Yog puab tsi ntseeg koj lossis tsi ntseeg thawj yaam txujci kws koj ua, ces puab yeej yuavtsum ntseeg zaaj nuav xwb.

Thaus puab pum koj ua ob yaam txujci nuav taag, yog puab tseem tsi ntseeg koj hab tsi kaam noog koj tej lug, koj ca le moog has dlej huv tug dlej Niles lug laub rua sau nruab nqhuab. Cov dlej ntawd yuav txa ua ntshaav.”

Tabsis Mauxes has rua Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj tsi xob khaiv kuv moog. Kuv yeej ibtxwm has lug txhaav, txawm yog thaus koj nrug kuv thaam los kuv yeej has tsi tau lug nrawm le. Kuv yeej ibtxwm has tsi tau lug zoo hab nplaig yeej txhaav.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Leejtwg yog tug tsim tuabneeg kuas muaj qhovncauj? Leejtwg yog tug kws ua rua tuabneeg laag ntseg lossis ruag? Leejtwg ua rua tuabneeg tsi pum kev lossis dligmuag? Kuv yog tug TSWV kws ua tej nuav.
Koj ca le moog! Kuv yuav paab koj has hab yuav qha kuas koj txawj has.”
Tabsis Mauxes teb has tas, “Thov koj khaiv lwm tug moog.”

Thaus Mauxes has le nuav, tug TSWV npautawg heev rua Mauxes hab has tas, “Koj tug tijlaug Aloos kws yog xeem Levis ne? Kuv paub nwg yeej has tau lug zoo. Taamsim nuav nwg taabtom tuaj cuag koj, hab thaus nwg pum koj nwg yuav zoo sab heev.
Koj ca le nrug nwg thaam hab qha rua nwg ua tug has. Kuv yuav paab meb has lug, hab kuv yuav qha kuas meb paub tej kws tsimnyog meb ua.
Aloos yuav yog tug kws sawv koj cev has koj cov lug rua cov pejxeem. Ces koj yuav zoo ib yaam le Vaajtswv, koj ua tug qha rua nwg has lug lawm xwb.
Nqaa tug paas nreg nuav nrug koj moog, koj txhaj yuav tau tug paas nuav siv ua txujci rua puab.”

Ces Mauxes txawm rov qaab moog cuag nwg yawmtxiv Yethoos, hab has rua Yethoos has tas, “Thov ca kuv rov qaab moog saib kuv cov kwvtij kws nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, saib puab puas tseem muaj sa nyob.” Yethoos pum zoo hab has tas “Moog zoo koj.”
Thaus Mauxes tseem nyob huv tebchaws Midias, tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog nraag tebchaws Iziv, rua qhov cov tuabneeg kws nrhav koj tua povtseg tub tuag taag lawm.”
Mauxes txhaj tsaws nwg tug quaspuj hab ob tug tub caij neeg luav hab puab rov moog rua tebchaws Iziv lawm Mauxes nqaa rawv nwg tug paas nreg kws Vaajtswv kuas nwg nqaa nrug nwg moog.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes ib zag ntxiv has tas, “Thaus koj moog txug nraag tebchaws Iziv, koj yuavtsum ua txhua yaam txujci tseemceeb kws kuv tub muab fwjchim rua koj lawm, koj ua tim ntsej tim muag rua Falaus saib. Tabsis kuv yuav ua kuas Falaus muaj lub sab tawv, hab nwg yuav tsi kaam tso cov tuabneeg ntawd tawm moog.
Ces koj yuavtsum qha rua nwg has tas, kuv kws yog tug TSWV has le nuav, ‘Cov Yixalayees yog kuv tug tub hlub ntaag.
Kuv has rua koj has tas, ca le tso kev rua kuv tug tub tawm moog, kuas nwg txhaj tau pehawm kuv, tabsis koj pheej tsi kaam tso le. Taamsim nuav kuv yuav tua koj cov tub hlub kuas tuag taag.’ ”
Thaus tug TSWV ntsib Mauxes tsuam chaw pw ntawm ib tog kev kws moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, nwg tub xaav muab Mauxes tua povtseg rua nraag.

Ces Xipaulas kws yog Mauxes tug quaspuj, txhaj muab tau ib lub pobzeb ntse ntse lug hlais nwg tug tub dlaim tawv noov, hab muab moog so Mauxes kutaw,  hab has tas, “Qhov tseeb tag koj yog kuv tug quasyawg kws tso ntshaav rua kuv.”
Ces tug TSWV txhaj tseg Mauxes txujsa. Qhov kws nwg has tas, “Koj yog tug quasyawg kws tso ntshaav,” tub yog has txug qhov kws ua kevcai txav tawv ntaag.

Tom qaab ntawd, tug TSWV has rua Aloos has tas, “Koj ca le moog ntsib Mauxes tom taj suabpuam.” Yog le ntawd, Aloos txhaj moog ntsib Mauxes rua sau lub roob dlawbhuv, hab thaus kws Aloos pum Mauxes, nwg puag nkaus Mauxes nwj.
Ces Mauxes qha Aloos txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tau has rua Mauxes kuas nwg rov lug rua tebchaws Iziv, hab nwg tseem qha tej txujci kws tug TSWV kuas nwg ua ntawd huv tuabsi rua Aloos.
Mauxes hab Aloos obtug txhaj ua ke lug rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab hu taagnrho cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj tuaj txoos ua ke.
Aloos has txhua yaam kws tug TSWV has rua Mauxes rua cov Yixalayees noog, hab Mauxes txawm ua txhua yaam txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV qha rua Mauxes lawm, rua cov Yixalayees saib.
Puab kuj ntseeg, hab thaus puab nov has tas, tug TSWV tau lug saib puab hab pum puab tej kev txomnyem kws raug luas tsimtxom ntawd lawm, puab txhaj qhau cev hlo pehawm tug TSWV.

Tom qaab ntawd, Mauxes hab Aloos txhaj moog cuag cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv hab has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Koj ca le tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, puab yuav moog ua ib rooj mov noj tom taj suabpuam ua kuv tsaug.’ ”
Tabsis Falaus nug has tas, “Tug TSWV yog leejtwg? Ua caag txhaj yuav kuas kuv noog nwg lug hab tso cov Yixalayees tawm moog? Kuv tsi paub tug TSWV; kuv tsi kaam tso cov Yixalayees moog qhov twg le.”

Mauxes hab Aloos obtug teb has tas, “Cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv lug ua rua peb pum. Yog le ntawd, thov koj pub peb moog peb nub ke rua tom taj suabpuam, moog tua tsaj fij rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv. Yog peb tsi ua le ntawd, nwg yuav tua peb lug ntawm tso tej kaab mob phem lossis lug ntawm tej nav ntaaj nav rag kuas peb tuag taag.”
Falaus has rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tas, “Yog le caag meb pheej xaav ua kuas cov tuabneeg nuav tso puab teg num tseg ua dlaabtsi? Ca le tso cov qhev nuav rov moog ua num taamsim nuav!
Meb saib maj, mej cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav fuamvaam coob tshaaj cov Iziv lawm, nwgnuav meb txawm yuav kuas puab tso num tseg nua los?”
Tuab nub ntawd Falaus has rua cov Iziv kws ua thawj saib cov qhev, hab has rua cov Yixalayees kws ua thawjcoj le nuav:
“Txij nub nua moog mej tsi xob muab quavnyaab rua cov tuabneeg nuav xyaw aav puab thwvcib le qub lawm. Mej ca puab maam moog nrhav puab xwb.

Tabsis yuavtsum yuam kuas puab, puab tau thwvcib ntau ib yaam le thaus kws mej tseem muab quavnyaab rua puab, tsi pub kuas tsawg tshaaj ntawd. Vim puab tubnkeeg, puab txhaj tuaj thov kuas kuv tso puab coj khoom moog fij rua puab tug Vaajtswv.
Mej muab num rua puab ua kuas nyaav dlua qhov qub, kuas puab khwv heev tsi tau su le, puab txhaj tsi khoom noog luas tej lug dlaag ntxag.”
Cov Iziv kws saib cov qhev hab cov Yixalayees kws ua thawjcoj txhaj moog has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Falaus yuav tsi muab quavnyaab rua mej lawm.
Nwg has tas, mej yuavtsum moog nrhav mej quavnyaab, hab moog nrhav qhov twg los tau, tabsis yuavtsum puab kuas tau thwvcib ntau npaum le qub.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj moog nrhav quavnyaab thoob plawg huv tebchaws Iziv.
Cov thawj kws saib cov qhev ntawd, yuam kuas txhua nub puab yuavtsum puab thwvcib tau ntau ib yaam le thaus kws tseem muab quavnyaab rua puab.

Cov Iziv kws ua thawj saib cov qhev, ntaus cov Yixalayees kws puab muab tsaa ua cov thawj saib num. Puab nug has tas, “Vim le caag mej cov tuabneeg puab tsi tau thwvcib ntau npaum le yaav taag lug lawm?”
Cov Yixalayees kws saib num txhaj moog cuag Falaus hab ywg has tas, “Falaus, vim le caag koj ua le nuav rua peb?
Koj tub tsi muab quavnyaab rua peb le yaav taag lug, tabsis koj tseem kuas puab yuam peb puab thwvcib taag zug le! Hab nwgnuav puab ntaus peb ua lwj ua lam, mas tsimnyog koj nrug paub zaaj nuav.”
Falaus teb has tas, “Mej tubnkeeg hab tsi xaav ua num xwb, hab tub yog vim le nuav mej txhaj tuaj thov kuv kuas kuv pub mej coj khoom moog fij rua tug TSWV.
Mej ca le rov qaab moog ua num taamsim nuav, kuv yuav tsi muab quavnyaab rua mej lawm, tabsis mej yuavtsum puab thwvcib kuas tau ntau ib yaam le mej ibtxwm puab lug lawm.”
Cov Yixalayees kws saib num, pum has tas puab yeej yuav raug teebmeem xwb, rua qhov Falaus has kuas txhua nub puab yuavtsum puab thwvcib kuas tau ntau ib yaam le puab ibtxwm puab lug lawm.
Thaus puab rov qaab lug, puab ntsib Mauxes hab Aloos obtug taabtom tog puab.

Puab has rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tas, “Thov Vaajtswv taug tej num kws meb ua lug lawm hab rau txim rua meb, rua qhov meb ua rua Falaus hab nwg cov numtswv ntxub peb heev. Meb ua le ntawd ib yaam le yog meb muab ntaaj cob rua puab tua peb povtseg ntaag.”
Mauxes moog thov tug TSWV dlua ib zag ntxiv has tas, “Tug TSWV, ua caag koj tsi hlub koj tsaav tuabneeg? Vim le caag koj khaiv kuv tuaj?
Txij nub kws koj khaiv kuv ua tug sawv koj cev moog has rua Falaus, nwg tseem hajyam tsimtxom puab heev xwb. Hab koj tub tsi ua ib yaam dlaabtsi paab puab le!”

Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Nwgnuav koj yuav pum tej kws kuv yuav ua rua Falaus. Kuv yuav yuam kuas nwg tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawm moog. Qhov tseeb, yog kuv yuam kuas nwg ntab kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.”
Vaajtswv nrug Mauxes thaam hab has rua Mauxes has tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV.
Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, tug kws tau tshwm lug rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj puab pum, tabsis kuv tsi tau qha kuv lub npe dlawbhuv kws yog tug TSWV rua puab paub.
Hab kuv tseem tau coglug rua puab, yuav muab lub tebchaws Kana-aas pub rua puab, yog lub tebchaws kws thaus u puab lug nyob ua tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tau ib ntus.
Nwgnuav kuv nov cov Yixalayees kws raug cov Iziv muab yuam ua qhev lub suab quaj qw lawm, hab kuv ncu txug tej lug kws kuv cog tseg lawm.

Koj moog qha rua cov Yixalayees has tas, tej lug nuav yog kuv has rua puab ntaag, ‘Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv yuav paab mej hab tso kuas mej dlim ntawm txujkev kws ua cov Iziv qhev. Kuv yuav tsaa kuv txhais npaab kws muaj zug luj zug nchaav, coj kev rau txim nyaav heev lug rua puab, hab kuv yuav cawm kuas mej dlim.

Kuv yuav xaiv mej ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Thaus kuv tso mej dlim kev ua qhev huv tebchaws Iziv lug, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv yuav coj mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv coglug rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj lawm; hab kuv yuav muab pub rua mej nyob ua mej tug. Kuv yog tug TSWV.’ ”
Mauxes coj cov lug nuav moog has rua cov Yixalayees, tabsis puab tsi ntseeg nwg le, rua qhov puab dlhuav sab rua txujkev ua luas tauj luas qhev hwv lawm.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj moog has rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv kuas nwg ca le tso cov Yixalayees tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.”
Tabsis Mauxes teb has tas, “Cov Yixalayees tub tsi noog kuv lug lawm, Falaus yuav ua le caag noog kuv lug? Kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg kws ibtxwm has lug txhaav heev.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug le nuav: “Meb ca le qha rua cov Yixalayees hab Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv has tas, ‘Kuv yog tug tsaa meb ua ob tug coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv nuav moog.’ ”
Yakhauj tug tub hlub Lunpees, muaj plaub tug tub: Hanauj, Palus, Hexeloos hab Kalamis, puab puavleej yog cov yawmkoob kws ris puab caajceg npe.
Xime-oos muaj rau tug tub: Yemuyees, Yamees, Auhas, Yakhees, Xauhas, hab Sa-ules, puab yog tug quaspuj Kana-aas cov tub; puab puavleej yog cov yawmkoob kws ris puab caajceg npe.
Levis muaj peb tug tub: Nkesoos, Kauhas hab Melalis; puab puavleej yog cov yawmkoob kws ris puab caajceg npe. Levis ua neej nyob tau ib puas peb caug xyaa xyoo.
Nkesoos muaj ob tug tub: Linpanis, hab Sime-is; obtug muaj xeebntxwv coob heev.
Kauhas muaj plaub tug tub: Amalas, Ixahas, Henploos, hab Uxiyees. Kauhas ua neej nyob tau ib puas peb caug peb xyoos.
Melalis muaj ob leeg tub: Mahalis hab Musis. Cov nuav puavleej yog suav xeem Levis nrug puab tej xeebntxwv huv tuabsi.
Amalas yuav nwg txiv tug muam Yaukhenpes lug ua quaspuj, Yaukhenpes txhaj yug tau Aloos hab Mauxes obtug. Amalas ua neej nyob tau ib puas peb caug xyaa xyoo.
Ixakhas muaj peb tug tub: Kaulahas, Nefenkas hab Xikhalis.
Uxiyees, muaj peb tug tub: Misayees, Exafas hab Sithalis.
Aloos yuav Elinpas kws yog Aminadas tug ntxhais hab yog Nahasoos tug muam ua quaspuj; Elinpas yug tau Nadas, Anpihus, Ele-axas hab Ithamas rua Aloos.
Kaulas muaj peb tug tub: Axis, Ekanas, hab Anpe-asafas; puab puavleej yog Kaulas caajceg kws faib ua tej cuab lawm cov yawmkoob.
Aloos tug tub Ele-axas, yuav Putiyees ib tug ntxhais ua quaspuj; hab nwg yug tau Finehas rua Ele-axas. Cov nuav yog cov thawjcoj ntawm nwg caajceg hab yog tej cuab kwvtij ntawm xeem Levis.
Aloos hab Mauxes yog ob tug kws Vaajtswv has tas, “Coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog.”
Obtug yog ob tug kws moog cuag Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv kuas tso cov Yixalayees tawm moog nyob ywjpheej.
Thaus tug TSWV lug has rua Mauxes huv tebchaws Iziv,
nwg has le nuav: “Kuv yog tug TSWV. Ca le qha txhua yaam kws kuv qha koj lawm rua cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv.”
Tabsis Mauxes teb has tas, “Koj yeej paub kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg kws has lug txhaav heev; yuav ua le caag Falaus txhaj noog kuv has?”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav ua kuas koj zoo le Vaajtswv rua Falaus, hab koj tug tijlaug Aloos yuav ua tug cev koj tej lug rua nwg.
Koj yuavtsum pav txhua yaam kws kuv qha koj rua Aloos, hab nwg yuav has rua Falaus kuas tso cov Yixalayees tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws moog.
Tabsis kuv yuav ua kuas Falaus muaj lub sab tawv heev, txawm yog nwg yuav pum kuv ua tej txujci txaus ntshai heev nyob huv tebchaws Iziv nuav npaum twg los nwg yuav tsi noog koj tej lug.
Ces kuv yuav tsaa kuv txhais teg rau txim nyaav rua cov Iziv hab yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog.
Thaus kuv tsaa kuv txais teg lug tawmtsaam cov Iziv hab coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawm huv puab lub tebchaws moog, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV tag.”
Mauxes hab Aloos obtug ua lawv le kws tug TSWV has.
Thaus obtug moog cuag Falaus, Mauxes noobnyoog muaj yim caum xyoo, Aloos noobnyoog muaj yim caum peb xyoos.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tas,
“Yog Falaus has kuas meb ua txujci rua nwg saib, koj ca le has kuas Aloos muab nwg tug paas nreg pov rhees rua ntawm Falaus xubndlag, ces tug paas ntawd yuav txa ua ib tug naab.”
Mauxes hab Aloos moog cuag Falaus hab ua lawv le tej kws tug TSWV has. Aloos muab nwg tug paas nreg pov rhees rua ntawm Falaus hab nwg cov numtswv xubndlag, tug paas ntawd txawm txa ua ib tug naab.
Falaus hu nwg cov tuabneeg txawj ntse hab cov tuabneeg txawj yeegsiv tuaj hab puab ua tau tej txujci ib yaam le Mauxes obtug ua.
Puab muab puab tej paas pov rua huv aav, tej paas ntawd txawm txa ua naab taag le hab, tabsis Aloos tug paas nreg muab puab tej paas nreg nqog taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Txawm yog le ntawd los Falaus tseem muaj lub sab tawv, tsi ntseeg Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tej lug lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas, “Falaus lub sab tawv heev, nwg tsi kaam tso cov Yixalayees tawm moog.
Yog le ntawd, thaus sawv ntxuv koj ca le moog cuag Falaus thaus nwg moog nraag tug dlej Niles. Koj nqaa tug paas nreg kws txa tau ua naab, hab moog tog nwg nraag ntug dlej.

Koj has rua Falaus has tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv khaiv kuv tuaj has kuas koj ca le tso nwg tsaav tuabneeg tawm moog, puab txhaj tau moog pehawm nwg tom taj suabpuam. Tabsis koj tseem tsi noog Vaajtswv lug le hab.

Falaus, nwgnuav tug TSWV has tas, koj yuav paub nwg yog tug TSWV lug ntawm tej txujci kws nwg yuav ua nuav. Koj saib, kuv yuav muab tug paas nreg nuav nplawm tug dlej Niles nuav, mas tug dlej nuav yuav txa ua ntshaav taagnrho.
Ntseg yuav tuag taag, hab dlej yuav tsw lwj ntxag, ua rua cov Iziv yuav haus tsi taug tej dlej ntawd.’ ”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj kuas Aloos muab nwg tug paas nreg tsaa rua txhua tug dlej, tej kwj dleg, hab tej paag dlej huv tebchaws Iziv. Tej dlej ntawd yuav txa ua ntshaav, hab yuav muaj ntshaav thoob plawg lub tebchaws, txawm yog huv tej thoob ntoo hab tej hub pobzeb los yuav muaj ntshaav taag huv tuabsi.”
Ces Mauxes hab Aloos txawm ua lawv le tug TSWV has. Aloos muab nwg tug paas nreg nplawm tug dlej Niles taabmeeg Falaus hab nwg cov numtswv, ces tej dlej txawm txa ua ntshaav taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Tej ntseg huv dlej tuag taag tsw lwj ntxag ua rua cov Iziv haus tsi taug. Hab ua rua muaj ntshaav thoob plawg tebchaws Iziv.
Cov Iziv kws txawj yeegsiv, puab ua tau ib yaam le ntawd hab, Falaus txhaj tseem muaj lub sab tawv le qub. Nwg tsi noog Mauxes hab Aloos tej lug lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm.
Falaus rov qaab moog tsev, nwg tsi quavntsej zaaj nuav le.
Cov Iziv moog khawb qhovdlej lawv tug ntug dlej Niles, rua qhov puab haus tsi taug tug dlej Niles.
Xyaa nub kws tug TSWV muab dlej hloov ua ntshaav dlhau lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Ca le moog cuag Falaus hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj ca le tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, puab yuav moog pehawm kuv.
Yog koj tseem tsi tso puab moog hab, kuv yuav rau txim rua koj lub tebchaws kws yog tso qaav lug nyob puv nkaus koj lub tebchaws.

Qaav yuav nyob puv nkaus huv tug dlej Niles, tej qaav ntawd yuav tawm huv tug dlej Niles lug nyob huv koj tsev, huv koj chaav pw, sau koj lub txaaj, huv koj cov numtswv hab koj cov pejxeem tsev, huv koj lub qhovcub, hab koj tej laujkaub ua noj ua haus.
Tej qaav ntawd yuav dlha lug nce koj, koj cov pejxeem hab koj cov numtswv huv tuabsi.’ ”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj kuas Aloos muab nwg tug paas nreg tsaa rua tej dlej, tej kwj dleg, hab tej paag dlej, ua kuas qaav tawm tuaj nyob thoob plawg tebchaws Iziv.”
Yog le ntawd, Aloos txhaj muab nwg tug paas tsaa rua tej dlej, ces qaav txawm tawm tuaj puv nkaus tebchaws Iziv.
Tabsis cov Iziv kws txawj yeegsiv, kuj ua yeegsiv kuas qaav tawm tuaj puv nkaus lub tebchaws Iziv hab.
Falaus hu Mauxes hab Aloos obtug moog cuag nwg, nwg has rua obtug tas, “Meb ca le thov kuas tug TSWV tshem tej qaav nuav tawm moog, kuv yuav tso mej cov tuabneeg coj tsaj moog fij rua tug TSWV.”

Mauxes has rua Falaus has tas, “Kuv zoo sab thov Vaajtswv paab koj. Saib koj muab lub sijhawm twg rua kuv thov Vaajtswv rua koj, koj cov numtswv hab koj cov pejxeem kuas tej qaav ntawd tsiv tawm ntawm mej moog, tsuas pub muaj nyob huv tug dlej Niles xwb.”

Falaus teb has tas, “Pigkig koj maam le thov Vaajtswv rua kuv.” Mauxes teb has tas, “Kuv yuav ua lawv le koj thov, mas koj txhaj yuav paub has tas, tsi muaj lwm tug vaajtswv zoo npaum le tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv nuav lawm.
Tej qaav ntawd yuav tsiv tawm ntawm koj, koj cov numtswv hab koj cov pejxeem moog, tsuas pub muaj nyob huv tug dlej Niles xwb.”
Mauxes hab Aloos tawm huv Falaus tsev moog, hab Mauxes thov tug TSWV kuas tshem tej qaav kws tso lug tsimtxom Falaus ntawd moog kuas taag.
Tug TSWV ua lawv le Mauxes thov, tej qaav kws nyob huv tej tsev, ntawm tej tshaav puam hab tom tej teb puavleej tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Cov Iziv khaws tej qaav tuag ntawd lug tso ua tej pawg tsw lwj ntxag thoob lub tebchaws.
Thaus Falaus pum tej qaav ntawd tuag taag lawm, nwg rov muaj lub sab tawv ib yaam le qub, lawv le tug TSWV tau has lawm, Falaus yeej tsi noog Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tej lug le.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le has kuas Aloos muab nwg tug paas nreg nplawm aav, tej moov aav kws nyob thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws Iziv nuav yuav txa ua yoov qab taag.”
Yog le ntawd, Aloos muab nwg tug paas nreg nplawm aav, tej moov aav thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv txawm txa ua yoov qab ntsauv tuabneeg hab tej tsaj.
Cov Iziv kws txawj yeegsiv, puab ua taag zug kuas muaj yoov qab, tabsis puab ua tsi tau le. Yoov qab yaa lug puv nkaus txhua qhov chaw,

hab cov tuabneeg kws txawj khawvkoob has rua Falaus has tas, “Vaajtswv yog tug kws ua tej xwm nuav tag!” Tabsis Falaus tseem muaj lub sab tawv heev, nwg tsi noog Mauxes hab Aloos obtug lug lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Pigkig sawv ntxuv koj ca le moog cuag Falaus, thaus kws nwg taabtom moog nraag haav dlej, hab koj qha tug TSWV tej lug rua nwg has tas, ‘Koj ca le tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, puab txhaj tau moog pehawm kuv.

Kuv ceebtoom rua koj has tas, yog koj tsi kaam, kuv yuav rau txim rua koj kws yog tso yoov lug tsaws koj, koj cov numtswv, hab koj cov pejxeem. Cov Iziv tej tsev los yuav muaj yoov puv nkaus, hab yuav yaa lug tsaws puv nkaus sau npoo aav.

Tabsis kuv yuav tseg cheebtsaam Nkausees, thaaj chaw kws kuv tsaav tuabneeg nyob, yuav tsi pub kuas muaj yoov hlo le. Kuv yuav ua le nuav koj txhaj paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws ua tej nuav nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav.
“ ‘Kuv yuav ua ib yaam lug cais  kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab koj tsaav tuabneeg. Pigkig yuav muaj yaam txujci nuav tshwmsim lug.’ ”
Tug TSWV tso yoov yaa poog ntwg lug tsaws puv nkaus rua huv Falaus lub loog hab huv nwg cov numtswv tej tsev. Cov yoov nuav ua rua cov pejxeem thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv tau kev ntxhuv sab heev.
Falaus txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tuaj cuag nwg, hab nwg has rua obtug tas, “Mej ca le moog muab khoom hlawv fij rua mej tug Vaajtswv nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav.”

Mauxes teb has tas, “Ua le ntawd tsi yog cai, rua qhov tej tsaj kws peb tua fij rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, yog ib yaam kws qas heev rua cov Iziv. Yog peb muab tej tsaj kws cov Iziv tsi nyam lug tua ua khoom fij nyob qhov twg, thaus puab pum peb, puab yuav muab pobzeb ntaus kuas peb tuag.
Yog le ntawd, peb yuavtsum moog peb nub ke rua tom taj suabpuam, peb maam tua tsaj fij rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, lawv le nwg tau has rua peb lawm.”
Falaus has tas, “Yog mej moog tsi dleb, kuv yuav tso mej moog tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tom taj suabpuam. Mej thov Vaajtswv paab kuv hab.”

Mauxes teb has tas, “Thaus kuv rov moog, kuv yuav thov tug TSWV kuas pigkig nwg tshem cov yoov nuav tawm ntawm koj, koj cov numtswv hab koj cov pejxeem moog kuas taag. Tabsis koj tsi xob dlaag peb ntxiv lawm, hab pheej txwv tsi pub cov Yixalayees moog tua tsaj fij rua tug TSWV.”
Mauxes tawm ntawm Falaus lub tsev lug hab thov tug TSWV,
hab tug TSWV ua lawv le Mauxes tej lug thov. Tej yoov yaa tawm ntawm Falaus, ntawm nwg cov numtswv hab ntawm nwg cov pejxeem moog taag tsi tshuav ib tug seem nyob qhov twg le lawm.
Tabsis zag nuav los Falaus tseem muaj lub sab tawv ib yaam le qub, nwg yeej tsi kaam tso cov Yixalayees moog le.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le rov moog cuag Falaus hab has rua nwg has tas, tug TSWV kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Koj ca le tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, puab txhaj tau moog pehawm kuv.
Yog koj tseem tsi pub puab moog,
kuv yuav rau txim rua koj kws yog tso mob aws lug rua mej tej tsaj kws yog mej tej neeg, tej neeg luav, tej ntxhuav, tej nyuj, tej yaaj hab tej tshis.
Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Iziv tej tsaj txhu tuag taag, tabsis kuv yuav tsi pub cov Yixalayees tej tsaj ib tug tuag le.
Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv tub teem sijhawm ca lawm, pigkig kuv yuav ua tej txujci nuav.’ ”
Nub tom qaab, tug TSWV txawm ua lawv le nwg tau has ntawd, ces cov Iziv tej tsaj tuag taag huv tuabsi, tabsis cov Yixalayees tej tsaj tsi tuag ib tug le.
Falaus tso tuabneeg moog tshuaj saib tej xwm ntawd, puab pum has tas, cov Yixalayees tej tsaj tsi tuag ib tug le. Tabsis Falaus tseem muaj lub sab tawv tsi tso cov Yixalayees moog le.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tas, “Meb ca le tsuab ob peb taus tshauv huv qhovcub muab rua Mauxes w rua sau nruab ntug taabmeeg Falaus.

Cov moov tshauv ntawd yuav yaa ri nab moog thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv, hab tej moov tshauv ntawd yaa moog txug thaaj tsaam twg, cov tuabneeg hab tej tsaj kws nyob thaaj tsaam ntawd yuav mob rwj ua paug thoob plawg ib ce.”

Yog le ntawd, obtug txhaj moog tsuab ib leeg ib taus tshauv, obtug lug sawv ze ntawm Falaus xubndlag, Mauxes muab cov tshauv ntawd w rua sau nruab ntug, cov tshauv ntawd txawm ua rua tuabneeg hab tej tsaj mob rwj thoob plawg ib ce.
Cov tuabneeg kws txawj ua yeegsiv, puab tsi muaj peevxwm lug cuag Mauxes, rua qhov puab mob rwj thoob plawg ib ce ib yaam le cov Iziv hab.
Tabsis tug TSWV ua rua Falaus muaj lub sab tawv, lawv le kws tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm, Falaus txhaj tsi noog Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tej lug.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Pigkig koj ca le sawv ntxuv moog cuag Falaus hab has rua nwg tas, tug TSWV kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Ca le tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, puab yuav moog pehawm kuv.

Zag nuav tsi yog kuv yuav rau txim rua koj cov numtswv hab koj cov pejxeem xwb, tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua koj ntaag, koj txhaj yuav paub has tas, nyob huv nplajteb nuav yeej tsi muaj ib tug kws yuav muaj fwjchim luj npaum le kuv.
Yog kuv tsaa teg lug tawmtsaam koj hab tso kaab mob lug rua koj cov pejxeem, ces mej yeej yuav tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Tabsis kuv tsi pub koj tuag, rua qhov kuv xaav kuas koj pum kuv lub fwjchim, kuv lub koob meej txhaj yuav nrov nchaa moo lug moog thoob plawg lub nplajteb.
Nwgnuav koj tseem muaj lub sab tawv hab tsi kaam tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog.
Pigkig lub sijhawm nuav kuv yuav tso lawg lug hlub heev, txij thaus muaj lub tebchaws Iziv nuav lug, yeej tsi tau muaj dlua ib zag lawg lug hlub npaum le zag nuav.

Koj yuavtsum kuas suavdlawg muab tej tsaj txhu lawv lug rua huv nkuaj hab muab txhua yaam kws koj muaj coj lug tso rua huv tsev, rua qhov lawg yuav lug ntaus cov tuabneeg hab tej tsaj kws nyob ntawm tej tshaav puam kuas tuag taag huv tuabsi.’ ”
Falaus cov numtswv qee leej ntshai heev vim tej lug kws tug TSWV has ntawd, puab txhaj coj puab cov qhev lug tsev hab caab puab tej tsaj lug rua huv nkuaj.
Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tsi quavntsej Vaajtswv tej lug, puab tso puab cov qhev hab tej tsaj nwg nyob nwg rua huv tej teb.

Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau ntuj, lawg yuav poob lug thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv, lawg yuav ntaus tuabneeg, ntaus tej tsaj txhu hab tej qoobloo kws nyob huv tej teb kuas puamtsuaj taag.”
Mauxes txawm muab nwg tug paas nreg taw rua sau ntuj, tug TSWV ua xub nroo hab tsaglig xub laim lug ti nkaus rua huv aav. Tug TSWV tso

lawg lug hlub heev nchuav nthwv ib tog tuaj hab xub laim lab pis vog, cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj nrov nroo ntwg ib tog tuaj. Txij thaus muaj lub tebchaws Iziv lug, cov Iziv yeej tsi tau pum muaj dlua ib zag le nuav.

Tej tuabneeg, tej tsaj txhu hab txhua yaam kws nyob tom tej taj nraag thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv, raug lawg ntaus puamtsuaj taag. Lawg tseem ntaus tej qoobloo kws cog rua huv tej teb hab txhua tsob ntoo ntsoog taag huv tuabsi.
Tsuas tshuav cheebtsaam Nkausees kws cov Yixalayees nyob txhaj tsi muaj lawg poob lug raug xwb.
Falaus khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tuaj cuag nwg, nwg has rua obtug tas, “Zag nuav kuv ua txhum lawm; tug TSWV yeej ua yog lawm, kuv hab kuv cov pejxeem puavleej ua txhum.
Thov tug TSWV lauj! Peb tiv tsi taug tej suab xub nroo hab tej lawg nuav lawm! Kuv thov coglug tso mej moog, tsi pub mej nyob huv nuav ntxiv lawm.”

Mauxes teb Falaus has tas, “Thaus kuv tawm huv lub nroog nuav moog, kuv yuav tsaa teg thov tug TSWV. Xub yuav tsi nroo, hab lawg yuav tsi lug ntxiv lawm, koj txhaj yuav paub has tas lub nplajteb nuav yog tug TSWV tug.
Tabsis kuv tub paub lawm has tas, koj hab koj cov numtswv yuav tsi ntshai tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv.”
Tej maaj hab nplej raug puamtsuaj taag, rua qhov lub caij ntawd nplej taabtom sav, hab maaj taabtom tawg paaj.
Tabsis tej mog tsi raug puamtsuaj, rua qhov tseem tuaj tsi tau nto npoo aav.
Mauxes tawm huv Falaus lub loog moog, nwg moog rua nrau ntug nroog, nwg tsaa teg thov tug TSWV. Xub txawm ntsag, lawg hab naag txawm tu.
Thaus Falaus pum has tas, xub tsi nroo, lawg hab naag tsi lug lawm, nwg rov ua txhum dlua. Nwg hab nwg cov numtswv rov muaj lub sab tawv le qub,
hab ua lawv le kws Vaajtswv tau has rua Mauxes lawm, mas Falaus yeej tsi kaam tso cov Yixalayees moog le.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le moog cuag Falaus. Kuv ua rua Falaus hab nwg cov numtswv kuas muaj lub sab tawv, kuv txhaj tau ua kuv tej txujci tseemceeb rua puab pum
hab mej txhaj yuav tau pav rua mej tej xeebntxwv noog has tas, thaus kuv ua kuv tej txujci ntawd, cov Iziv poob ntsejmuag luj kawg nkaus. Mej txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”

Mauxes hab Aloos moog cuag Falaus hab has rua nwg tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Henplais tug Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Koj yuav tawv moog txug thaus twg koj maam le fwm kuv? Ca le tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, puab yuav moog pehawm kuv.
Yog koj tseem tawv tsi kaam tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, mas pigkig kuv yuav tso kooj lug puv nkaus koj lub tebchaws.
Cov kooj ntawd yuav coob heev plooj nkaus sau npoo aav. Cov kooj ntawd yuav noj txhua yaam kws lawg ntaus tuag tsi taag hab noj tej ntoo kuas taag huv tuabsi.

Cov kooj ntawd yuav yaa lug puv nkaus huv koj lub loog hab huv koj cov numtswv hab koj cov pejxeem tej tsev. Cov kooj ntawd yuav ua phem tshaaj plawg tej kws koj cov yawmkoob ibtxwm pum lug lawm.’ ” Ces Mauxes txawm tawm lug lawm.

Falaus cov numtswv has rua Falaus has tas, “Koj tseem yuav ca tug tuabneeg nuav ua rua peb raug kev txomnyem moog txug thaus twg? Ca le tso cov Yixalayees nuav moog, puab txhaj tau moog pe tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv. Koj tsi pum lub tebchaws Iziv tub puamtsuaj taag lawm los?”
Falaus khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tuaj cuag nwg, nwg has rua obtug tas, “Ca le moog pehawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Tabsis cov twg yuav moog?”

Mauxes teb has tas, “Peb suavdlawg yuav moog taagnrho, moog kuas taag peb tej mivnyuas hab tej laug huv tuabsi. Peb yuav coj peb cov tub cov ntxhais, tej yaaj tej tshis hab tej nyuj moog huv tuabsi, rua qhov peb yuav moog ua ib rooj mov noj qhuas tug TSWV.”
Falaus teb has tas, “Kuv coglug rua tug TSWV has tas kuv yuav tsi pub mej coj mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas moog! Kuv paub has tas, mej taabtom tuavhuv yuav ua phem.
Tsi tau, tsi pub moog! Yog has tas mej xaav moog tag, tsuas pub cov txivneej moog xwb.” Ces Falaus txawm ntab Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tawm huv nwg lub loog moog lawm.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le tsaa teg rua lub tebchaws Iziv, kuas kooj lug rua huv tebchaws Iziv nuav. Kooj yuav lug noj txhua tsaav txhua yaam qoobloo hab noj tej kws lawg ntaus puamtsuaj tsi taag.”
Mauxes txawm muab nwg tug paas nreg tsaa rua lub tebchaws Iziv, tug TSWV tso cua ntsawj saab nubtuaj tuaj, nub ntawd ib nub hab ib mos. Taagkig sawv ntxuv cua txawm ntsawj kooj yaa ua npoj ntwg lug.
Cov kooj ntawd yaa ua tsheej ntshuas lug tsaws puv nkaus lub tebchaws Iziv. Zag nuav kooj txomfaav coob tshaaj plawg dlua le kws txeev pum lug lossis yuav tsi pum ib zag ntxiv le lawm.

Tej kooj ntawd yaa lug tsaws plooj nkaus aav, tsi pum ib qhov aav tshwm le. Tej kooj ntawd noj tej txiv ntoo hab txhua yaam kws lawg ntaus puamtsuaj tsi taag dlu lug thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv tsi seem ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Falaus khaiv tuabneeg ceev heev moog hu Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tuaj hab has rua obtug tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab ua txhum rua mej lawm.
Nwgnuav thov zaam txim rua kuv ib zag ntxiv hab thov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tshem lub txim kws yuav coj kuv moog rua txujkev tuag tawm ntawm kuv moog.”
Mauxes txawm tawm huv Falaus lub loog moog thov tug TSWV.

Hab tug TSWV muab cov cua kws ntsawj saab nubtuaj tuaj hloov kuas ntsawj saab nubpoob tuaj, ntsawj tej kooj ntawd kuas moog poob taag rua huv Havtxwv Lab.  Tsi pub kuas seem ib tug kooj nyob qhov twg le.
Tabsis tug TSWV ua rua Falaus muaj lub sab tawv tsi kaam tso cov Yixalayees moog le hab.
Vaajtswv has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau ntuj, yuav tsaus ntuj nti thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv.”
Mauxes tsaa teg rua sau ntuj, txawm tsaus ntuj nti thoob plawg lub tebchaws Iziv tau peb nub.
Cov Iziv ib tug saib tsi pum ib tug le, hab lub sijhawm ntawd ua rua cov Iziv tawm tsi tau huv puab tej tsev moog rua qhov twg, tabsis thaaj tsaam kws cov Yixalayees nyob pum kev kaaj nrig.

Falaus khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Mauxes tuaj cuag nwg hab has tas, “Mej ca le moog pehawm tug TSWV; txawm yog mej yuav coj mej cov quaspuj mivnyuas nrug mej moog los tau. Tabsis mej tej yaaj, tej tshis, hab tej nyuj ca nyob ntawm nuav.”
Mauxes teb has tas, “Yog le ntawd, koj yuavtsum muab tsaj rua peb coj moog tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv.

Yeej tsi tau le, peb yuavtsum caab peb tej tsaj nrug peb moog kuas taag xwb; tsi pub seem ib tug rua qhov twg le. Peb yuavtsum xaiv tej tsaj zoo tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv. Nwgnuav peb tseem tsi tau paub yuav muab tug tsaj twg, thaus peb moog txug tod lawm peb maam xaiv, peb txhaj paub muab tug zoo lug tua fij rua nwg.”
Tug TSWV ua rua Falaus muaj lub sab tawv, nwg txhaj tsi kaam tso cov Yixalayees moog.
Falaus has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le tsiv tawm moog, tsi xob tuaj tshwm ntsejmuag rua kuv pum ib zag ntxiv lawm. Nub twg yog kuv pum koj, mas koj tuag xwb!”
Mauxes teb has tas, “Ca ua le koj has los mas!”
Ces Vaajtswv has rua Mauxes has tas, “Kuv yuav rau txim rua Falaus hab cov Iziv ib zag ntxiv hab. Tom qaab ntawd Falaus yuav tso mej moog. Nwg yuav ntab mej tawm huv nuav moog kuas taag.
Koj ca le moog has rua cov Yixalayees txhua tug has tas, kuas puab moog thov cov tuabneeg zej zog, tej saw nyaj saw kub.”
Tug TSWV ua rua cov Iziv fwm cov Yixalayees, ua rua Falaus cov numtswv hab taagnrho cov Iziv suav has tas, Mauxes yog ib tug tuabneeg tseemceeb heev.
Mauxes txawm has rua Falaus has tas, “Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, ‘Thaus ib taag mo kuv yuav lug saib cov Iziv.
Cov Iziv tej tub hlub yuav tuag taagnrho, suav txij le Falaus tug tub hlub moog txug rua tug puj qhev kws zum zeb tug tub hlub. Tej tsaj txhu thawj tug mivnyuas los yuav tuag taag huv tuabsi hab.
Yuav muaj suab quaj suab nyav ntshu nrooj thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws Iziv kws ibtxwm yeej tsi tau muaj dlua lossis yuav tsi muaj ib zag ntxiv le lawm.

Tabsis cov Yixalayees nyob ntsag tu, tub tsi nov ib lub suab dlev tum tej tuabneeg lossis puab tej tsaj txhu le. Ces koj txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws tau muab ib yaam lug cais cov Iziv hab cov Yixalayees.’ ”

Mauxes xaus lug has tas, “Taagnrho koj cov numtswv yuavtsum tuaj qhau cev hlo pe kuv hab puab yuav tsaa teg thov kuas kuv coj taagnrho kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog. Tom qaab ntawd kuv maam le tawm moog.” Ces Mauxes npautawg heev ua ntsejmuag dlub txig tawm huv Falaus lub loog moog lawm.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Falaus yuav tsi kaam noog koj lug, kuas kuv txhaj tau ua kuv tej txujci rua huv tebchaws Iziv nuav ntxiv.”
Mauxes hab Aloos ua tej txujci tseemceeb nuav taabmeeg Falaus, tabsis tug TSWV ua rua Falaus muaj lub sab tawv, nwg txhaj tsi tso cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog le.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos thaus obtug tseem nyob huv lub tebchaws Iziv has tas,
“Lub hlis nuav yog lub ib hlis ntuj ntawm lub xyoo rua mej.
Meb ca le has rua cov Yixalayees kuas paub has tas, lub hlis nuav nub xab kaug, kuas ib tug txivtsev twg yuavtsum xaiv ib tug mivnyuas yaaj lossis ib tug mivnyuas tshis npaaj rua nwg tsev tuabneeg.

Yog yim tuabneeg twg tsawg noj tsi taag tug tsaj ntawd, kuas nwg hab yim kws nyob ze nwg koom tua ib tug tsaj, puab yuavtsum ntsuag saib yuav noj taag tug tsaj luaj le caag, hab puab yuavtsum suav puab cov tuabneeg kws noj tug tsaj ntawd huv tuabsi.
Mej muab tug mivnyuas yaaj lossis tug mivnyuas tshis ntawd tua noj, tabsis yuavtsum yog tug kws tsi muaj ib qho phem le; hab yog tug txiv kws muaj noobnyoog ib xyoos xwb.
Ces lub hlis nuav nub kaum plaub thaus tsaus ntuj, taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuavtsum tua cov tsaj ntawd noj.
Kuas puab txhua yim kws tua tsaj noj, muab tej ntshaav tsaj coj lug pleev rua sau hau qhovrooj hab ob tug ncej qhovrooj.
Mo ntawd yuavtsum muab cov nqaj ci noj ntxuag cov ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb hab noj ntxuag tej zaub ab kuas taag.
Mej yuavtsum tsi xob noj nqaj nyoog lossis muab hau noj, tabsis mej yuavtsum muab ci kheej, tsi xob kaus plaab nyuv hab sab ntsws hlo le.
Mej yuavtsum noj kuas taag tsi xob pub seem ib qho moog txug rua taagkig kaaj ntug le; yog mej noj tsi taag, mej ca le muab hlawv huv tuabsi povtseg.

Mej yuavtsum noj kawgkag kuas taag, rua qhov mej yuav tu nraa sawv kev moog, rau khau hab tuav rawv mej tug paas nreg rua ntawm mej txhais teg. Pluag mo nuav yog mej noj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau fwm kuv kws yog tug TSWV.”

“Mo ntawd kuv yuav moog thoob plawg huv tebchaws Iziv, tua cov Iziv txhua tug tub hlub hab tej tsaj thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv kuas tuag taag huv tuabsi, hab rau txim kuas txhua nrho rua cov Iziv tej vaajtswv. Kuv yog tug TSWV.
Tej ntshaav kws mej pleev ntawm qhovrooj yuav ua lub cim, cim mej tej tsev. Thaus kuv pum cov ntshaav ntawd kuv yuav hlaa mej moog hab rau txim rua cov Iziv, kuas mej txhaj tsi raug kev puamtsuaj.
Mej ncu ntsoov muab nub nua ua nub tseemceeb rua mej. Mej yuav ua kevcai ncu txug tej kws tug TSWV tau ua rua mej pum taag lug lawm. Mej ua kevcai le nuav moog ibtxhis le.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Mej yuavtsum noj tej ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb kuas puv xyaa nub. Thawj nub, mej yuavtsum muab tej keeb kws nyob huv tsev povtseg huv tuabsi, yog xyaa nub ntawd leejtwg tseem noj ncuav xyaw keeb, mej tsi xob suav has tas tug ntawd yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg lawm.
Thawj nub hab nub xyaa mej yuavtsum kuas suavdlawg tuaj sis sau ua ke suav ua nub dlawbhuv. Tsi pub mej ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi rua ob nub ntawd, tsuas pub mej ua pluag noj pluag haus xwb.

Mej yuavtsum muab nub kws mej ua kevcai noj ncuav tsi xyaw keeb nuav teem ua nub kws tseemceeb, rua qhov nub nuav yog nub kws kuv coj mej txhua xeem tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog. Txhua xyoo rov txug nub nua, mej hab mej cov xeebntxwv yuavtsum ncu ntsoov ua txuj kevcai nuav.
Lub ib hlis ntuj, suav txij le mo kaum plaub moog txug mo neeg nkaum ib, mej yuavtsum noj ncuav tsi xyaw keeb.

Xyaa nub ntawd tsi pub muaj ib qho keeb nyob huv mej tej tsev hlo le. Txawm yog tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees lossis lwm tsaav tuabneeg los xij, yog leejtwg tseem noj ncuav xyaw keeb, mej tsi xob suav has tas, tug ntawd yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg lawm.
Txawm yog mej nyob qhov twg los xij. Mej tsi xob noj tej ncuav kws xyaw keeb le, mej yuavtsum noj tej ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb xwb.”

Mauxes hu cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj tuaj ua ke hab has rua puab tas, “Mej txhua tug nyag ca le moog xaiv nyag ib tug mivnyuas yaaj lossis mivnyuas tshis lug rua mej tej tsev tuabneeg tua noj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau.

Mej muab ib re nplooj hixauv moog raus rua huv lub phab kws rau  cov ntshaav tsaj, hab coj cov ntshaav ntawd moog pleev rua ob tug ncej qhovrooj hab sau hau qhovrooj. Mo ntawd tsi pub mej ib tug twg tawm rua nrau zoov moog txug taagkig kaaj ntug.

Thaus tug TSWV lug tua cov Iziv, nwg yuav pum tej ntshaav kws mej pleev rua sau hau qhovrooj hab ob tug ncej qhovrooj, nwg yuav tsi pub tug timtswv kws yog Txujkev Tuag nkaag lug rua huv mej tej tsev tua mej povtseg.
Mej hab mej cov tubki yuavtsum fwm txuj kevcai nuav moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le.
Thaus mej moog txug huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV coglug muab pub rua mej, mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov ua txuj kevcai nuav.
Thaus mej cov mivnyuas nug mej has tas, ‘Tej kevcai nuav lub ntsab yog le caag?’

Mej yuavtsum pav qha rua puab has tas, ‘Yog txuj Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau kws peb ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov tug TSWV hlaa dlhau peb cov Yixalayees tej vaaj tse moog tua cov Iziv, nwg tua cov Iziv tabsis nwg tseg peb ca.’ ” Ib tsoom pejxeem Yixalayees txawm txhus caug ndlua rua huv aav hab pehawm Vaajtswv.
Ces puab txawm rov qaab lug tsev hab ua le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug lawm.

Thaus ib taag mo tug TSWV lug tua cov Iziv cov tub hlub tuag taagnrho, suav txij le Falaus tug tub hlub, tug kws yuav lug nyob sau lub zwmtxwv lug txug rua cov tuabneeg raug txim kws nyob huv qhov tsaus ntuj cov tub hlub; hab taagnrho tej tsaj txhu thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv puavleej raug tua tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Mo ntawd Falaus, nwg cov numtswv hab taagnrho cov Iziv sawv lug quaj nyav ntshu nrooj, rua qhov puab tej tub hlub tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Mo ntawd Falaus khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Mauxes hab Aloos tuaj cuag nwg, nwg has rua obtug tas, “Meb hab cov Yixalayees ca le tsiv tawm huv peb lub tebchaws nuav moog pe tug TSWV lawv le mej thov kuv.
Mej ca le caab mej tej yaaj, tej tshis hab tej nyuj moog kuas taag. Meb thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua kuv hab.”
Cov Iziv txhib ceev nrooj kuas cov Yixalayees ca le tsiv tawm huv puab lub tebchaws hab has tas, “Yog mej tsi tawm mas peb yuav tuag taag le lauj!.”
Cov Yixalayees txhaj le muab tej moov nplej tsi xyaw keeb kws puab tub muab ntse tau lawm qhwv rua huv tej khaub dluag hab kwv sau xubpwg moog.
Puab ua txhua yaam lawv le Mauxes tub has rua puab lawm, puab thov cov Iziv tej nyaj, tej kub hab tej tsoog tsho nqaa moog huv tuabsi.

Tug TSWV ua rua cov Iziv fwm cov Yixalayees heev, puab txhaj muab puab tej nyaj tej kub rua cov Yixalayees lawv le cov Yixalayees thov. Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj sau cov Iziv tej nyaj txag coj nrug puab moog.
Cov Yixalayees tawm huv lub nroog Lamexes moog rua nraag lub nroog Xukaus. Cov txivneej muaj kwvyees le rau pua txheeb leej, tsi xaam cov quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas.
Muaj lwm tsaav tuabneeg coob heev nrug puab moog hab, puab caab yaaj, caab tshis hab caab nyuj coob ua npoj ntwg nrug puab moog.

Puab muab tej moov nplej tsi xyaw keeb kws puab tub muab ntse tau huv tebchaws Iziv lawm coj lug cub ua ncuav noj, rua qhov cov Iziv ntab puab tsiv tawm sai heev, puab npaaj tsi yeej tej ncuav kws xyaw keeb hab tej khoom noj le.
Cov Yixalayees nyob huv lub tebchaws Iziv tau plaub puas peb caug xyoo.
Thaus txug nub kws txwm nkaus plaub puas peb caug xyoo, txhua xeem kws yog tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg txawm tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog.
Thaus ib taag mo tug TSWV coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog. Cov Yixalayees txhaj muab mo ntawd lug zuv mo, hab ua kevcai ncu txug tug TSWV ib tam dlhau rua ib tam.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tas, “Ntawm nuav yog ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau: Tsi pub cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws noj rooj mov ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau nuav,
tabsis txhua tug tubqhe kws mej yuav lug, yog mej tub muab ua kevcai txav tawv lawm, tug ntawd noj tau.
Tabsis tug tuaj ua qhua lossis tug tuaj nrhav zug kws lug su huv mej tsev, mej tsi xob pub nrug mej noj.
Pluag mo nuav nyag yuavtsum noj huv nyag tsev xwb, tsi xob nqaa tej nqaj tawm moog noj nrau zoov. Hab mej tsi xob muab tug tsaj ntawd tej pobtxhaa luv le.
Cov Yixalayees txhua tug yuavtsum tuaj koom ua txuj kevcai nuav,

tabsis tsi pub cov txivneej kws tsi tau ua kevcai txav tawv noj rooj mov nuav le. Yog cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob tug twg xaav nrug mej koom ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau ua tug TSWV tsaug, mej yuavtsum xub muab nwg tsev tuabneeg txhua tug txivneej ua kevcai txav tawv tsaiv, mej maam le pub nwg nrug mej noj. Nwg yuavtsum ua kevcai txav tawv ib yaam le tug kws yug huv tsev tuabneeg Yixalayees.
Cov Yixalayees hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws lug nrug mej nyob, suavdlawg yuavtsum coj txuj kevcai nuav.”
Cov Yixalayees txhua tug puavleej ua lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV has rua Mauxes hab Aloos obtug.
Nub ntawd yog nub kws tug TSWV coj cov Yixalayees txhua xeem tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Mej yuavtsum muab mej cov Yixalayees tej tub hlub fij rua kuv moog ibtxhis, hab mej yuavtsum muab tej tsaj thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv fij rua kuv ua kuv tug.”

Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees tas, “Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov nub ntawd, rua qhov nub ntawd tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus tau coj mej tawm huv tebchaws Iziv qhov chaw kws mej ua luas qhev lug. Nub ntawd mej tsi xob noj tej ncuav kws xyaw keeb hlo le.
Nub ntawd yog lub ib hlis ntuj kws yog lub hli Anpis kws mej tsiv tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug.

Tug TSWV tau coglug tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob has tas nwg yuav muab cov Kana-aas, cov Hitis, cov Amoos, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus lub tebchaws rua mej nyob. Thaus Vaajtswv coj mej moog txug rua huv lub tebchaws vaammeej kws aav rog hab zoo qoob, txhua xyoo thaus lub ib hlis ntuj mej yuavtsum ua kevcai noj ncuav tsi xyaw keeb le nuav.
Xyaa nub ntawd mej yuavtsum noj cov ncuav tsi xyaw keeb nkaus xwb, mas nub xyaa mej yuavtsum ua rooj mov noj ua tug TSWV tsaug.
Mej yuavtsum noj ncuav tsi xyaw keeb kuas txwm nkaus xyaa nub; tsi pub kuas muaj keeb lossis ncuav xyaw keeb nyob huv mej lub tebchaws le.
Nub kws pib ua kevcai ntawd, koj yuavtsum qha txhua yaam rua koj cov mivnyuas has tas, Kuv ua le nuav, rua qhov tug TSWV tau ua rua kuv thaus kuv tsiv tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug.

Txuj kevcai nuav yuav ua rua mej ncu ntsoov kawm hab ncu tug TSWV tej lug, ib yaam le tej kws mej coj rawv ntawm mej teg lossis coj rawv sau mej hauvplaj, ua rua mej ncu ntsoov tug TSWV tej lug, rua qhov tug TSWV, tug kws muaj fwjchim tau coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Mej yuavtsum ua txuj kevcai nuav rua txhua xyoo thaus txug lub caij nuav, tsi xob tso tseg le.
“Tug TSWV yuav coj mej moog nyob huv cov Kana-aas lub tebchaws kws nwg tub coglug rua mej hab mej cov yawmkoob lawm. Thaus nwg muab lub tebchaws ntawd pub rua mej,
mej yuavtsum muab mej tej tub hlub fij rua tug TSWV. Mej tej tsaj thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv puavleej yog tug TSWV tug,

tabsis txhua tug mivnyuas txiv neeg luav mej yuavtsum coj ib tug mivnyuas yaaj moog hloov chaw txhwv ntawm tug TSWV rov qaab. Yog mej tsi xaav txhwv tug mivnyuas neeg luav rov qaab, mej ca le muab luv cejdlaab kuas tuag. Mej yuavtsum txhwv mej cov tub hlub txhua tug rov qaab huv tuabsi hab.

Lwm nub, thaus koj tug tub nug koj has tas, ‘Ua le nuav lub ntsab yog le caag?’ Koj qha rua nwg has tas, ‘Tug TSWV tau siv nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv qhov chaw kws peb ua luas qhev lug.

Thaus Falaus muaj lub sab tawv tsi kaam tso peb tawm, tug TSWV txhaj le tua cov Iziv cov tub hlub huv lub tebchaws ntawd hab tej tsaj thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv tuag taag huv tuabsi. Vim le nuav, peb txhaj le muab peb tej tsaj thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv tua fij rua tug TSWV, hab txhwv peb tej tub hlub rov qaab.’

Txuj kevcai nuav, yog ua ib qhov rua mej ncu ntsoov rua nruab sab ib yaam le tej kws peb coj ntawm peb txhais teg lossis sau peb hauvplaj, ua rua peb ncu ntsoov nub kws tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus tau coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.”

Thaus Falaus tso cov Yixalayees moog lawm, Vaajtswv tsi coj puab taug txujkev kws lawv ntug havtxwv ncaaj nraim moog rua peg tebchaws Filitees, txawm yog txujkev ntawd ze los nwg tsi coj puab moog txuj ntawd. Vaajtswv xaav has tas, “Kuv tsi xaav kuas cov Yixalayees hloov sab tsiv rov qaab moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv thaus muaj kev sis ntaus sis tua ntawm kev.”

Yog le ntawd, Vaajtswv txhaj coj puab taug kev lawv taj suabpuam moog rua tom Havtxwv Lab.  Thaus cov Yixalayees taug kev tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug, puab yeej npaaj cuabyeej ua rog nrug nraim tog sis tua xwb.

Mauxes coj Yauxej cov pobtxhaa nrug nwg lug, lawv le Yauxej kuas cov Yixalayees coglug rua Yauxej has tas, “Thaus Vaajtswv lug paab mej dlim lawm, mej yuavtsum coj kuv tej pobtxhaa tawm huv tebchaws Iziv nuav nrug mej moog.”
Cov Yixalayees tsiv tawm huv Xukaus moog tsuam chaw su rua ntawm Ethas kws nyob ntawm ntug taj suabpuam.

Nruab nub tug TSWV ua ib tauv fuab moog ua puab ntej coj puab kev, hab thaus mo ntuj nwg ua ib tug nplaim tawg cig laam lug moog ua puab ntej kuas puab pum kev, puab taug kev moog nruab nub mo ntuj los tau huv tuabsi.
Nruab nub tauv fuab coj puab kev moog taag nub, hab mo ntuj tug nplaim tawg cig laam lug coj puab kev moog taag mo.
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj ca le kuas cov Yixalayees rov qaab moog tsuam chaw su rua ntawm Pis Hahilaus nyob huv ntu nruab nraab ntawm Midaules hab Havtxwv Lab kws nyob ze Npa-aas Xefoos.
Falaus xaav has tas, cov Yixalayees yuav moog moog lug lug tom taj suabpuam hab nrhav tsi tau kev hlaa taj suabpuam tawm moog.

Kuv yuav ua kuas Falaus muaj lub sab tawv, hab nwg yuav caum mej qaab tuaj, qhov kws kuv yeej Falaus hab nwg tej tubrog, yuav ua rua kuv tau koob meej. Cov Iziv yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.” Cov Yixalayees ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws has rua puab lawm.

Thaus muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Falaus has tas, cov Yixalayees tsiv taag lawm, nwg hab nwg cov numtswv hloov dlua sab hab has tas, “Ua caag peb laam ua le nuav? Peb txawm tso cov Yixalayees tsiv taag, hab peb tsi tau puab lug ua qhev le lawm!”
Falaus txhaj txhij tubrog hab tej tsheb neeg caij ntaus rog nrug nwg moog caum cov Yixalayees qaab.
Nwg kuas cov thawj tubrog caij rau pua lub tsheb neeg caij ntaus rog kws zoo kawg nkaus, hab lwm yaam tsheb caij ntaus rog nrug nwg moog hab.
Tug TSWV ua rua Falaus muaj lub sab tawv, hab nwg txawm moog caum cov Yixalayees kws muaj Vaajtswv ua tug tsomkwm puab.

Cov Iziv cov tubrog caij neeg, hab cov tubrog tsaav tsheb neeg tuaj caum cov Yixalayees qaab. Puab tuaj caum cuag cov Yixalayees ntawm ntug Havtxwv Lab, qhov chaw kws puab tsuam chaw su hab ze rua ntawm Pis Hahilaus hab Npa-aas Xefoos.
Thaus cov Yixalayees pum Falaus hab nwg cov tubrog caum tuaj yuav cuag, mas puab ntshai kawg le, puab txhaj quaj zum zawg thov tug TSWV paab puab.

Puab ywg Mauxes has tas, “Nyob tom tebchaws Iziv tsi muaj toj ntxaas lawm los? Koj txhaj coj peb lug tuag rua huv taj suabpuam nuav puas yog? Ua caag koj tseem coj peb tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug ua dlaabtsi hab?

Peb tub has rua koj thaus tseem nyob tom tebchaws Iziv lawm has tas, ‘Ca peb nyob tuabywv; peb zoo sab ua cov Iziv qhev nua ne!’ Peb ua cov Iziv qhev zoo dlua peb tuag taag rua huv taj suabpuam nuav.”
Mauxes ua tuab zoo has rua puab has tas, “Mej tsi xob ntshai! Mej ca le nyob tuabywv saib nub nua tug TSWV yuav paab mej le caag; mej yuav tsi pum cov Iziv nuav ib zag ntxiv le lawm.
Tug TSWV yuav paab mej tawmtsaam, mej ca le ua tuabywv.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Vim le caag mej yuav quaj thov kuv paab? Kuas cov tuabneeg ca le txaav moog lawm tom ntej.
Muab koj tug paas nreg tsaa rua sau nplaim dlej havtxwv. Dlej yuav faib rua ob saab, cov Yixalayees txhaj yuav tau taug kev aav qhuav qhawv moog lawm saab tim u.

Kuv yuav ua rua cov Iziv muaj lub sab tawv, kuas puab caum mej qaab, hab kuv yuav tau koob meej lug ntawm qhov kws kuv yeej Falaus, nwg cov tubrog, nwg tej tsheb neeg hab nwg cov tubrog tsaav tsheb neeg.
Thaus kuv kovyeej puab lawm, cov Iziv txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV tug timtswv kws moog ua cov tubrog Yixalayees ntej, txaav tuaj tom qaab lawm. Tauv fuab txawm tshem lug thaiv

nruab nraab ntawm cov tubrog Iziv hab cov Yixalayees. Tauv fuab ua rua cov tubrog Iziv saab tsaus ntuj nti, tabsis ua rua cov Yixalayees saab pum kev kaaj nrig,  hab ua rua ob tog txaav tsi tau lug sis ze ib mos.
Mauxes tsaa teg rua sau tug dlej havtxwv, tug TSWV tso cua tuaj saab nubtuaj tuaj ntsawj havtxwv ib mos kaaj ntug ua rua dlej havtxwv faib hlo rua ob saab ua kev qhuav qhawv,
hab cov Yixalayees taug kev aav qhuav qhawv huv plawv havtxwv moog rua saab tim u, muaj dlej nphau nphwv thaiv ob saab.
Cov tubrog Iziv, tej neeg, tej tsheb neeg hab cov tuabneeg tsaav tsheb neeg, caum cov Yixalayees qaab tuaj rua huv havtxwv.
Thaus kaaj ntug txoog tug TSWV nyob huv cov nplaim tawg hab huv tauv fuab saib cov tubrog Iziv hab ua rua cov tubrog Iziv ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo.
Hab nwg ua rua puab tej lug tsheb neeg ndlog tsi taug, puab sis thaam zum zawg has tas, “Peb ca le tsiv rov qaab tsi xob caum cov Yixalayees, rua qhov tug TSWV paab puab tawmtsaam peb lawm.”
Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le tsaa koj txhais teg rua sau dlej havtxwv, kuas dlej nphau lug npug cov Iziv, puab tej tsheb hab cov tuabneeg tsaav tsheb huv tuabsi.”
Mauxes txawm tsaa teg rua sau dlej havtxwv, thaus kaaj ntug ua cav dlej rov ntum nkaus le qub. Cov Iziv tsiv taag zug kuas dlim, tabsis tug TSWV muab puab pov rua huv havtxwv.
Dlej nphau lug npug tej tsheb neeg, cov tuabneeg tsaav tsheb neeg, hab cov tubrog Iziv kws taabtom tuaj caum cov Yixalayees txug huv plawv havtxwv tuag taag tsi seem ib tug le.
Tabsis cov Yixalayees taug kev qhuav qhawv huv havtxwv moog rua saab tim u, muaj dlej nphau nphwv ntawm ob saab ntug kev.
Nub ntawd tug TSWV paab cov Yixalayees dlim ntawm cov Iziv txhais teg, cov Yixalayees pum cov Iziv tuag ua saab ua sua lawv ntug havtxwv.
Thaus cov Yixalayees pum tug TSWV lub fwjchim kws nwg yeej cov Iziv, cov Yixalayees ntshai kawg, puab muab sab npuab tug TSWV hab ca sab rua Mauxes tug kws yog tug TSWV tug tubkhai.

Thaus ntawd Mauxes hab cov Yixalayees hu nkauj ua tug TSWV tsaug has tas: “Kuv yuav hu nkauj ua tug TSWV tsaug, rua qhov nwg tau kovyeej cov yeebncuab; nwg tau muab cov neeg hab cov tuabneeg caij neeg pov rua huv havtxwv.

Tug TSWV yog kuv tug zug hab yog tug tiv thaiv kuv; nwg yog tug kws cawm kuv dlim. Nwg yog kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav hu nkauj ua nwg tsaug, Nwg yog kuv cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav hu nkauj qhuas nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus.
Tug TSWV yog tug thawj tubrog; nwg lub npe hu ua tug TSWV.
“Nwg muab cov tubrog Iziv hab puab tej tsheb neeg pov rua huv havtxwv; puab tej thawj tubrog kws tseemceeb tau tog hab tuag taag rua huv plawv Havtxwv Lab.
Havtxwv tub nphau lug npug nkaus puab; puab tog rua huv qaab thu ib yaam le pobzeb.
“Tug TSWV, koj saab teg xis muaj fwjchim heev; koj nyem tej yeebncuab tawg txua lawm.
Koj lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus ua rua koj cov yeebncuab tawg ua saab ua sua; koj txujkev chim hlawv puab kub nyab taag ib yaam le tej quavnyaab.
Koj tshuab paa rua sau havtxwv ua rua dlej faib ua aav qhuav qhawv; dlej sawv tau le tug ntsaa yeej; huv qaab thu havtxwv aav qhuav qhawv le sau nruab nqhuab.

Cov yeebncuab has tas, ‘Kuv yuav caum puab qaab hab nteg kuas tau puab; kuv yuav muab puab tej nyaj txag lug sis faib hab fuab txhua yaam kws kuv xaav tau; kuv yuav rhu kuv raab ntaaj hab txeeb taagnrho tej kws puab muaj.’
Tabsis tug TSWV, koj tshuab ib paas xwb, ua rua cov Iziv tog taagnrho rua huv qaab thu dlej ib yaam le tej quav txhuas.
“Tug TSWV, puas muaj lwm tug tswv kws yuav zoo npaum le koj? Leejtwg txhaj ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb le koj?
Koj tsaa hlo koj saab teg xis, ces aav txawm nqog kag peb cov yeebncuab.
Koj ncu ntsoov tej lug kws koj cog tseg, koj coj cov tuabneeg kws koj txhwv lawm, txhua leej tsiv tawm lug; koj lub fwjchim tsomkwm puab moog nyob lub tebchaws kws zoo kawg nkaus.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nov tej nuav, puab ntshai hab poob sab ua ib ce tshee nyo; cov tuabneeg Filitees ntshai kev puamtsuaj ua ib ce tshee nyo.
Cov tuabneeg Edoos tej numtswv los puavleej ntshai; Mau-am cov thawj tubrog ntshai ua ib ce tshee quas nyo; cov tuabneeg Kana-aas tsi muaj kev ca sab.

Tej kev poob sab tau ua rua puab ntshai kawg. Tug TSWV, puab pum koj lub fwjchim, puab ib ce txhaav taag ib yaam le phaab zeb ca moog txug thaus koj tsaav tuabneeg moog dlhau lawm, yog tsaav tuabneeg kws koj tau coj tawm huv txujkev ua luas qhev lug.
Koj coj puab lug hab tso puab nyob rua sau koj lub roob, qhov chaw ntawd yeej yog koj qhov chaw, tug TSWV, koj xaiv qhov chaw ntawd ua koj lub tsev, lub Tuamtsev kws koj tau ua.
Tug TSWV, koj yuav ua Vaajntxwv moog ibtxhis tsi kawg le.”

Cov Yixalayees taug kev qhuav qhawv huv havtxwv moog rua saab tim u, tabsis thaus cov tubrog Iziv tej tsheb hab cov tuabneeg tsaav tsheb neeg moog huv havtxwv, tug TSWV ua kuas dlej nphau lug npug puab tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Milias kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug, nwg yog Aloos tug muam, nwg nqaa ib lub nruag npuaj moog ua ntej, cov quaspuj ib leeg nqaa ib lub nruag npuaj seev cev lawv nwg qaab.
Milias hu nkauj rua puab noog has tas: “Hu nkauj ua Vaajtswv tsaug, rua qhov nwg tau kovyeej yeebncuab; nwg tau muab cov neeg hab cov tuabneeg caij neeg pov taag rua huv qaab thu havtxwv.”
Mauxes txawm coj cov Yixalayees sawv kev tawm ntawm ntug Havtxwv Lab moog rua tom taj suabpuam Sules. Puab moog tau peb nub ke rua tom taj suabpuam, tabsis nrhav tsi muaj dlej haus le.
Puab moog txug ntawm ib qhov chaw npe hu ua Malas, tabsis lub qhovdlej kws nyob ntawd ab heev, puab haus tsi taug le. Vim le ntawd, txhaj tis npe rua qhov chaw ntawd hu ua Malas.
Cov Yixalayees ywg Mauxes hab nug has tas, “Peb yuav haus dlaabtsi?”

Mauxes thov tug TSWV hab tug TSWV qha ib yaav ntoo rua Mauxes, ces Mauxes muab yaav ntoo ntawd pov rua huv lub qhovdlej, dlej txawm zoo haus tsi ab lawm. Tug TSWV tau muab kevcai rua puab hab nwg sim puab sab ntawm qhov chaw ntawd.

Tug TSWV has rua puab tas, “Yog mej noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le kuv lub sab nyam, hab muab sab npuab kuv tej kevcai txhua nqai huv tuabsi, kuv yuav tsi rau txim rua mej kuas muaj mob muaj nkeeg le kws kuv tso rua cov Iziv. Kuv yog tug TSWV, tug kws khu mej tej mob tej nkeeg.”
Tom qaab ntawd puab lug txug rua ntawm Elimes, nyob rua qhov ntawd muaj kaum ob lub qhovdlej cag, hab muaj xyaa caum tsob toovlaaj; puab tsuam chaw su ze rua ntawm cov qhovdlej ntawd.

Cov Yixalayees sawv kev ntawm Elimes lug, yog nub kaum tsib, lub ob hlis ntuj tom qaab kws puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Puab txhaj lug txug rua huv lub taj suabpuam Xees kws nyob ntawm Elimes hab lub roob Xinais ntu nruab nraab.
Puab ywg Mauxes hab Aloos obtug tom taj suabpuam kawg le

hab has rua obtug tas, “Peb txaus sab ca tug TSWV muab peb tua kuas tuag taag rua nraag tebchaws Iziv. Peb nyob nraag, peb yeej tau zaub, tau nqaj, hab tau mov noj lawv le peb sab xaav. Tabsis meb coj peb lug nyob rua ntawm taj suabpuam nuav, kuas peb tuag tshaib taag huv tuabsi xwb.”

Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv yuav tso mov poob sau ntuj lug rua mej noj ib yaam le naag lug. Cov tuabneeg naj nub yuav tau moog khaws, hab khaws ib zag kuas txaus noj ib nub xwb. Kuv ua le nuav, yog kuv sim saib puab puas ua lawv le kuv tej lug.
Nub rau, puab yuavtsum khaws kuas tshaaj qhov kws puab naj nub khaws ib npaug ntxiv npaaj tseg ca.”
Mauxes hab Aloos obtug txhaj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Nub nua thaus tsaus ntuj, mej yuav paub has tas tug TSWV yog tug kws coj mej tsiv tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.

Thaus sawv ntxuv mej yuav pum tug TSWV tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab, nwg tub nov tej lug kws mej ywg nwg lawm, qhov tseeb, yeej yog mej ywg tug TSWV, rua qhov wb tsuas yog ob tug kws cev nwg tej lug xwb.”

Mauxes has ntxiv tas, “Tug TSWV yog tug kws yuav muab nqaj lug rua mej noj mo nuav, hab thaus sawv ntxuv los mej yuav tau mov noj tsi taag le, rua qhov nwg nov tej lug kws mej ywg nwg lawm. Thaus mej ywg wb, tub yog mej ywg tug TSWV ntaag.”
Mauxes has rua Aloos has tas, “Koj has kuas suavdlawg ca le tuaj sawv taabmeeg tug TSWV, rua qhov nwg tub nov puab tej lug ywg lawm.”
Thaus Aloos tseem taabtom has rua suavdlawg, puab txawm tig moog saib tom taj suabpuam, hab taamsim ntawd puab txawm pum tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm sau cov fuab tuaj.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,

“Kuv nov cov Yixalayees tej lug ywg lawm. Ca le qha rua puab has tas, thaus tsaus ntuj zuag puab yuav tau nqaj noj, hab thaus sawv ntxuv puab yuav tau ncuav noj txaus nkaus le puab lub sab nyam. Ces puab yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.”
Thaus tsaus ntuj zuag txawm muaj ncuab coob heev yaa ua npoj ntwg lug tsaws puv nkaus rua huv puab lub yeej, hab thaus sawv ntxuv muaj lwg ntsu thoob plawg puab lub yeej.
Thaus lwg yaaj taag lawm, muaj tej dlaim zoo le te khov dlawb paug rua sau tej suabpuam.

Thaus cov Yixalayees pum tej ntawd, puab tsi paub sov yog dlaabtsi hab puab sis nug zum zawg has tas, “Cov nuav yog dlaabtsi?” Mauxes teb has tas, “Cov ntawd yog tej mov kws tug TSWV tso lug rua mej noj ntaag.
Tug TSWV kuas mej nyag moog khaws kuas txaus nyag tsev tuabneeg noj. Khaws ib leeg ob taig kuas txhua nwg tsev tuabneeg xwb.”
Cov Yixalayees ua lawv le Mauxes has, muaj ibtxha khaws tau ntau ibtxha khaws tau tsawg.
Thaus puab muab lug luj, cov kws khaws tau ntau kuj tsi muaj tshaaj, cov kws khaws tau tsawg kuj muaj txaus. Suavdlawg nyag khaws txaus nyag noj xwb.
Mauxes has rua puab tas, “Tsi xob khaws lug npaaj ca rua pigkig.”
Tabsis muaj qee leej tsi noog Mauxes lug, puab txawm qee ib nraab ca npaaj rua pigkig. Taagkig kaaj ntug tej mov ntawd ua kaas hab lwj lawm, Mauxes chim rua puab heev.
Cov Yixalayees naj taagkig sawv ntxuv moog khaws, puab nyag khaws txaus nyag noj; thaus tshaav ntuj tuaj kub lawm, tej mov kws puab khaws tsi taag yaaj huv tuabsi lawm.
Thaus txug nub rau, puab ib leeg khaws plaub taig kuas txaus txhua tug huv tsev tuabneeg. Cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj tuaj pav zaaj nuav qha rua Mauxes noog,

Mauxes teb puab has tas, “Tej lug nuav yog tug TSWV saamfwm ca: pigkig yog nub su kws yog tug TSWV nub. Yog le ntawd, tej kws zoo ci, ca le muab ci hab tej kws zoo hau, ca le muab hau. Tej kws seem ca le muab khaws tseg ca rua pigkig.”
Cov Yixalayees ua lawv le Mauxes has, puab khaws tej mov ntawd ca txug taagkig los cov mov ntawd tsi lwj lossis tsi ua kaas le.
Mauxes has rua puab tas, “Nub nua mej yuavtsum noj tej mov ntawd, rua qhov nub nua yog nub Xanpataus kws yog tug TSWV nub, hab mej yuav tsi pum muaj mov nyob tom tshaav puam lawm.
Mej tsuas tau khaws rau nub xwb, tabsis nub xyaa, yog nub Xanpataus, yuav tsi muaj mov rua mej khaws lawm.”
Nub xyaa muaj qee leej tseem moog nrhav khaws mov, tabsis tsi pum muaj ib lub mov nyob qhov twg le.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Mej tseem yuav tawv tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug hab kuv tej kevcai moog txug thaus twg?

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas tug TSWV pub mej muaj nub Xanpataus, yog le ntawd, nub rau kuv txhaj pub mov kuas txaus mej noj ob nub. Nub xyaa txhua tug nyag yuavtsum nyob tuabywv huv nyag tsev, nwg yuavtsum tsi xob tawm moog nrau zoov hlo le.”
Yog le ntawd, nub xyaa cov tuabneeg suavdlawg txhaj su, tsi ua ib yaam num dlaabtsi le.
Cov Yixalayees hu cov mov ntawd ua manas.  Cov mov ntawd ua tej lub dlawb dlawb luaj le noob zaub txhwb qab, qaab ib yaam le mov xyaw zib ntaab.

Mauxes has tas, “Tug TSWV saamfwm rua peb, kuas peb khaws ib co manas tseg ca rua peb tej xeebntxwv tau saib, puab txhaj le pum tej mov kws tug TSWV pub rua peb noj tom taj suabpuam thaus nwg coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.”
Mauxes has rua Aloos has tas, “Muab ib lub hub lug yawm ob taig manas ntim rua huv, hab nqaa moog txawb rua huv tug TSWV lub tsevntaub, khaws tseg rua peb tej xeebntxwv tau saib.”
Lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm, Aloos txhaj muab lub hub kws ntim cov manas ntawd coj moog txawb rua ntawm lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg.
Cov Yixalayees noj cov manas ntawd tau plaub caug xyoo, puab txhaj lug txug rua huv tebchaws Kana-aas qhov chaw kws puab lug ua vaaj ua tsev nyob.
(Lub thoob kws ibtxwm yeem nplej ntim tau neeg nkaum taig.)

Cov Yixalayees sawv kev ntawm taj suabpuam Xees lug, puab tshais chaw ib qho rua ib qho ua ntu zug lawv le tug TSWV has. Puab lug tsuam chaw rua ntawm Lefidees, tabsis thaaj tsaam ntawd tsi muaj dlej haus hlo le.
Puab txhaj tuaj ywg Mauxes has tas, “Ca le nrhav dlej rua peb haus!” Mauxes teb puab has tas, “Vim le caag mej yuav ywg le ko? Ua caag mej yuav sim tug TSWV sab?”

Tabsis cov tuabneeg nqhes dlej heev, mas puab txhaj pheej ywg Mauxes tsi tseg le. Puab ywg has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug? Koj puas paub has tas, peb cov mivnyuas, peb tej tsaj txhu hab peb tub yuav tuag dlej?”
Mauxes thov tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav ua le caag rua cov tuabneeg nuav txhaj le zoo? Puab tub yuav muab pobzeb ntaus kuas kuv tuag.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Coj cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj qee leej nrug koj, hab mej ca le moog ua suavdlawg ntej. Nqaa koj tug paas nreg kws koj nplawm tug dlej Niles nrug koj moog.
Kuv yuav sawv sau lub pobzeb kws nyob sau roob Xinais. Ca le ntaus lub pobzeb ntawd, dlej yuav tawm huv lug rua cov tuabneeg haus.” Mauxes ua le ntawd rua cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj saib ntsoov.
Txhaj tis npe rua qhov chaw ntawd hu ua Maxas hab Melinpas,  rua qhov cov Yixalayees tau ywg hab sim tug TSWV sab thaus puab nug has tas, “Tug TSWV nrug peb nyob los tsi nrug?”
Cov tubrog Amalej tuaj tua cov Yixalayees ntawm Lefidees.
Mauxes has rua Yausuas has tas, “Pigkig koj ca le xaiv peb cov txivneej ibtxha moog tua cov Amalej. Kuv yuav moog sawv sau ncov roob hab tsaa tug paas nreg kws Vaajtswv kuas kuv nqaa.”
Yausuas ua lawv le Mauxes tau saamfwm rua nwg hab tawm moog tua cov Amalej. Mauxes, Aloos, hab Hules puab nce moog sau roob.
Thaus Mauxes tsaa nwg txhais teg, cov Yixalayees tua yeej, tabsis thaus nwg tso teg, cov Amalej tua yeej zuj zug.
Thaus Mauxes tsaug npaab lawm, Aloos hab Hules obtug txhaj moog nqaa pobzeb lug rua Mauxes nyob, obtug ib leeg sawv ib saab tuav Mauxes ob txhais npaab, hab tsaa moog txug thaus nub poob qho.
Puab ua le ntawd, Yausuas txhaj tua yeej cov Amalej.

Ces tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le sau zaaj nuav tseg ca, suavdlawg txhaj le yuav ncu ntsoov moog ibtxhis. Qha rua Yausuas paub has tas, kuv yuav ua kuas cov Amalej puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi moog.”
Mauxes ua tau ib lub thaaj hab tis npe rua lub thaaj ntawd hu ua, “Tug TSWV yog kuv tug Chij.”
Mauxes has tas, “Tsaa tug TSWV tug chij kuas sab!  Tug TSWV yuav tawmtsaam cov Amalej ib tam dlhau ib tam moog ibtxhis!”
Mauxes yawmtxiv Yethoos kws yog tug povthawj huv tebchaws Midias, nov txug tej kws Vaajtswv ua paab Mauxes hab paab cov Yixalayees thaus nwg coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Yethoos coj Mauxes tug quaspuj Xipaulas kws thaus Mauxes xaa rov qaab moog nrug nwg nyob,

hab xaa Nkesoos, Eli-exes kws yog Xipaulas ob tug tub tuaj rua Mauxes. (Mauxes has tas, “Kuv yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, moog nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv ibtxwm tsi tau paub dlua”; yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj tis nwg tug tub hlub npe hu ua Nkesoos).
Mauxes tseem has ntxiv tas, “Kuv txiv tug Vaajtswv paab kuv hab cawm kuv dlim ntawm cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv raab ntaaj kws yuav tua kuv povtseg”, nwg txhaj tis tug tub yau npe hu ua Eli-exes. )
Mauxes yawmtxiv Yethoos, coj Mauxes tug quaspuj hab Mauxes ob tug tub tuaj rua Mauxes huv taj suabpuam, ntawm thaaj chaw kws Mauxes lug tsuam yeej nyob ze rua ntawm Vaajtswv lub roob dlawbhuv.
Yethoos khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Mauxes has tas, “Kuv kws yog koj yawmtxiv Yethoos, kuv tuaj saib koj hab kuv coj koj quaspuj hab nwg ob tug tub tuaj txug lawm.”
Mauxes txhaj tawm moog ntsib nwg yawmtxiv hawm hab nwj nwg. Ces puab txawm sis nug txug kev noj qaab nyob zoo, hab puab moog rua huv Mauxes lub tsevntaub lawm.

Mauxes pav txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tau cawm cov Yixalayees ua ntu zug ntawm Falaus hab cov Iziv rua nwg yawmtxiv Yethoos noog. Mauxes tseem pav tej kev nyuaj sab kws cov Yixalayees raug thaus puab taug kev lug hab tej kws tug TSWV cawm puab dlim rua Yethoos noog huv tuabsi.
Thaus Yethoos nov txhua yaam nuav, nwg zoo sab kawg le
hab nwg has tas, “Ua tug TSWV tsaug kws nwg tau cawm mej dlim ntawm Falaus hab cov Iziv lug! Ua tug TSWV tsaug kws nwg tau cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg dlim ntawm txujkev ua luas qhev lug lawm!
Nwgnuav kuv paub has tas tug TSWV yog tug kws muaj fwjchim luj tshaaj plawg tej vaajtswv huv tuabsi, rua qhov nwg tau ua tej nuav rua cov Iziv, thaus kws puab tsimtxom cov Yixalayees nyaav heev.”
Yethoos coj tsaj tuaj tua hlawv kheej hab coj khoom tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv, ces Aloos hab cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj txhaj tuaj nrug nwg noj rooj mov tseemceeb kws ua Vaajtswv tsaug ntawd.
Nub tom qaab Mauxes txawm moog nyob tu cov pejxeem tej plaub, hab nwg tu plaub thaus sawv ntxuv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.

Thaus Yethoos pum txhua yaam kws Mauxes ua ntawd, nwg txawm nug has tas, “Koj ua dlaabtsi le nuav rua cov pejxeem? Vim le caag koj tuab leeg yuav tu plaub rua cov pejxeem, hab nrug cov pejxeem sawv ntawm nuav thaus sawv ntxuv moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj le?”
