Mauxes teb has tas, “Kuv yuavtsum ua le nuav, rua qhov cov pejxeem tuaj cuag kuv, mas yog puab xaav paub qhov kws ua hum Vaajtswv sab nyam.

Thaus muaj ob tug tuabneeg sis caav sis tshe, obtug tuaj cuag kuv, kuv ua tug taug obtug tej lug, hab txav txim rua obtug saib leejtwg yog tug muaj cai, hab kuv muab Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm hab kevcai lug qha rua obtug.”
Yethoos teb has tas, “Koj ua le nuav tsi yog lawm.
Koj hab cov pejxeem kws tuaj cuag koj yuav qaug zug heev. Tej num nuav nyaav heev rua koj, koj ib leeg xwb yuav tsi muaj peevxwm ua tau.
Koj noog kuv has, kuv yuav paab tswvyim qee yaam rua koj, hab thov Vaajtswv nrug nraim koj. Koj yuavtsum ua tug sawv cev cov tuabneeg rua ntawm Vaajtswv hab coj puab tej plaub ntug moog cuag nwg xwb.
Koj yuavtsum qha Vaajtswv txuj kevcai rua puab, hab qha rua puab ua puab lub neej kuas lawv le kevcai.

Tabsis koj yuavtsum xaiv ib cov txivneej kws muaj peevxwm huv cov Yixalayees hab tsaa puab ua cov thawj kaav cov pejxeem: tsaa cov kws kaav ib txheeb leej, ib puas leej, tsib caug leej hab kaum leej. Puab cov nuav yuavtsum yog cov kws fwm Vaajtswv, yog cov kws suavdlawg ca sab tau rua hab yog cov kws tsi yuav luas tej nyaj xab.

Ca puab ua cov tu plaub ntug rua cov pejxeem moog le. Tej plaub ntug luj maam kuas puab coj tuaj cuag koj, tabsis tej plaub ntug miv, ca rua puab tu. Ua le nuav koj lub nraa txhaj yuav sib, rua qhov puab yuav paab koj ris koj lub nraa.
Yog koj ua lawv le Vaajtswv has, koj lub zug yuav tsi ntaug, hab cov pejxeem yuav rov moog tsev zoo sab hlo.”
Mauxes noog nwg yawmtxiv tej lug qha
hab xaiv cov tuabneeg kws muaj peevxwm huv cov Yixalayees. Nwg muab puab tsaa ua cov thawj kaav ib txheeb leej, ib puas leej, tsib caug leej, hab kaum leej.
Puab ua cov tu tej plaub ntug miv rua cov pejxeem moog le, tabsis tej plaub ntug luj puab coj tuaj rua Mauxes tu.
Ces Mauxes txawm xaa nwg yawmtxiv Yethoos sawv kev, hab Yethoos moog tsev lawm.

Cov Yixalayees tawm huv Lefidees lug txug rua ntawm taj suabpuam Xinais, yog nub xab ib lub peb hli ntuj tom qaab kws puab tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Puab tsaa tsevntaub nyob rua ntawm taw Roob Xinais,
hab Mauxes nce moog cuag Vaajtswv sau roob, tug TSWV hu sau roob tuaj rua Mauxes hab qha kuas nwg moog has rua cov Yixalayees kws yog Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv has tas,
“Mej tub pum kuv kws yog tug TSWV, ua rua cov Iziv hab kuv tau puag rawv mej lug ib yaam le tug dlaav puag rawv nwg cov mivnyuas huv nwg ob saab qaab tis.

Nwgnuav, yog mej noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg, mej txhaj yuav yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Taagnrho lub nplajteb nuav yeej yog kuv le, tabsis mej yog cov kws raug xaiv lug ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg,
mej yog cov kws yuav tau ua povthawj ua kuv teg num hab yog ib tsaav tuabneeg dlawbhuv. Ntawm nuav yog tej lug kws koj coj moog has rua cov Yixalayees.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj nqeg lug hab hu taagnrho cov pejxeem hab cov thawjcoj tuaj ua ke, nwg pav tej lug kws tug TSWV has rua nwg rua puab noog.
Ces puab txawm thooj txhij teb has tas, “Peb yuav txaus sab ua txhua yaam le tug TSWV has,” Mauxes txhaj pav tej lug kws puab leeg ntawd rua tug TSWV.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas, “Kuv yuav lug cuag koj huv tauv fuab kws dlub tsaus nti, kuas cov pejxeem txhaj le nov kuv lub suab nrug koj thaam hab txij nuav moog yaav tom ntej puab txhaj yuav ntseeg koj tej lug.” Mauxes pav cov pejxeem tej lug rua tug TSWV noog,

hab tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Ca le moog cuag cov pejxeem hab has rua puab tas, puab muab nub nua hab pigkig lug tu puab lub sab kuas zoo moog pehawm Vaajtswv, puab yuavtsum ntxhua puab tej khaub dluag huv tuabsi,
hab quasneeg puab tu cev kuas txhij. Nub ntawd kuv yuav lug sau Roob Xinais rua suavdlawg pum kuv.

Koj yuavtsum kem nrim ncig lub taw roob, kuas cov pejxeem tsi xob hlaa tug nrim ntawd, hab has rua puab kuas tsi xob nce moog sau roob lossis moog ze lub taw roob. Yog leejtwg cev taw moog tsuj lub taw roob, tug ntawd yuav raug tua povtseg;

yuavtsum muab pobzeb ntaus lossis muab neevnti tua nwg kuas tuag, tsi pub ib tug twg moog chwv nwg le. Txawm yog tuabneeg lossis tsaj los yuavtsum raug muab tua kuas tuag. Thaus nov suab raaj nrov lawm, maam pub cov pejxeem nce moog sau roob.”
Ces Mauxes nqeg sau roob lug hab has rua cov pejxeem kuas puab npaaj moog pehawm Vaajtswv. Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj le ntxhua puab tej rig tsho,
hab Mauxes has rua puab tas, “Mej suavdlawg tu cev hab npaaj kuas txhij rua quasneeg, hab tsi pub leejtwg nrug quaspuj pw le.”

Nub peb thaus sawv ntxuv txawm muaj xub nroo hab tsaglig xub lab pis vog, fuab pus tsaus nti npug nkaus sau roob, hab nov ib lub suab raaj nrov heev. Ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv puab lub yeej ntshai ib ce tshee nyo.
Mauxes coj puab tawm huv yeej moog ntsib Vaajtswv, puab moog sawv rua ntawm taw roob.
Paa nchu auv nab tsaus nti puv nkaus sau Roob Xinais, rua qhov tug TSWV ua suavtawg lug sau roob. Tej paa nchu auv nab ib yaam le ib cub suavtawg, hab lub roob cu ua zug koog.
Lub suab raaj txawm nrov heev zuj zug tuaj. Mauxes has rua Vaajtswv, hab Vaajtswv teb Mauxes huv lub suab xub tuaj.
Tug TSWV lug rua sau Roob Xinais hab nwg hu Mauxes moog cuag nwg rua sau roob. Mauxes txhaj nce moog rua sau roob
hab tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj rov qaab moog rua nraag cov pejxeem hab ceebtoom rua suavdlawg kuas tsi xob hlaa tug nrim tuaj cuag kuv, yog puab tsi noog, coob leej yuav raug tua tuag.
Txawm yog cov povthawj los puab yuavtsum ua kevcai ntxuav puab kuas huv tsaiv, puab maam tuaj cuag kuv, yog puab tsi ua le ntawd, kuv yuav rau txim rua puab.”
Mauxes has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Cov pejxeem tuaj tsi tau, rua qhov koj tub saamfwm rua peb suavdlawg kuas kem nrim ncig lub roob, ca ua qhov chaw tseemceeb lawm.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le nqeg moog coj Aloos nrug koj tuaj, tabsis tsi xob pub cov povthawj hab cov pejxeem hlaa dlhau tug nrim tuaj cuag kuv, yog puab tsi noog kuv lug, kuv yuav rau txim rua puab.”
Ces Mauxes nqeg rov qaab lug rua nraag cov pejxeem hab qha rua puab paub tej kws tug TSWV tau has rua nwg lawm.
Cov lug nuav yog Vaajtswv lug, hab Vaajtswv yog tug has:
“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, tug kws coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv kws mej ua luas qhev lug.”
“Tsi xob pe lwm tug vaajtswv, tabsis pe kuv tuab leeg xwb.
“Tsi xob puab tej mlom kuas zoo le tej kws nyob sau nruab ntug lossis huv nplajteb nuav lossis huv tivtxwv rua mej pe.

Tsi xob pe ib tug mlom twg le, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv khib mej heev, kuv yog tug TSWV kws rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws ntxub kuv hab rua puab cov xeebntxwv moog txug peb hab plaub tam tuabneeg.
Tabsis kuv hlub cov kws muab sab npuab kuv hab coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai ib tam dlhau ib tam moog ntau txheeb tam tuabneeg.
“Tsi xob muab kuv lub npe moog has ua dlog ua dlig, rua qhov kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws muab kuv lub npe moog has ua dlog ua dlig.
“Ncu ntsoov nub Xanpataus ua nub tseemceeb.
Mej ua mej tej num rau nub,

tabsis nub xyaa yog nub su hab pehawm tug TSWV. Nub ntawd tsi pub leejtwg ua num le, tsi has mej tej tub tej ntxhais, mej tej tubqhe, mej tej tsaj txhu lossis lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob huv mej lub tebchaws.

Kuv kws yog tug TSWV, rau nub ntawd kuv tsim lub nplajteb, lub ntuj, dlej havtxwv, txhua yaam kws nyob sau nruab ntug, nyob huv nplajteb nuav hab huv havtxwv, tabsis nub xyaa yog nub kws kuv su. Yog le ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV txhaj foom koob moov rua nub Xanpataus hab muab nub ntawd ua nub tseemceeb.
“Yuavtsum fwm mej nam mej txiv, mej txhaj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab pub rua mej nyob.
“Tsi xob tua tuabneeg.
“Tsi xob ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg.
“Tsi xob ua tubsaab.
“Tsi xob ua timkhawv tsi tseeb ntxo kwvtij zej zog.
“Tsi xob ntshaw luas vaaj luas tsev, tsi xob ntshaw luas quaspuj, luas tej tubqhe, luas tej nyuj, luas tej neeg luav lossis tej kws yog luas tug.”
Thaus suavdlawg nov xub nroo hab nov suab raaj nrov, puab pum tsaglig xub laim hab paa nchu auv nab sau roob, puab ntshai ua ib ce tuag taag hab sawv dleb dleb saib xwb.
Puab has rua Mauxes has tas, “Yog koj qha peb, peb yuav noog koj lug; tabsis peb ntshai heev yog tug TSWV has rua peb, mas ntshai peb yuav tuag taag.”
Mauxes teb has tas, “Tsi xob ntshai; Vaajtswv lug sim mej sab hab ua kuas mej fwm nwg, kuas mej tsi xob moog ua txhum xwb.”
Tabsis cov pejxeem tseem sawv nrug dleb heev, tsuas yog Mauxes tuab leeg xwb txhaj le moog ze tauv fuab dlub tsaus nti kws Vaajtswv nyob.
Vaajtswv kuas Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Mej tub pum kuv kws yog tug TSWV has sau ntuj tuaj rua mej lawm.
Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob nchuav mlom nyaj mlom kub lug rua mej pe.

Muab aav lug puab ua ib lub thaaj ua qhov chaw kws coj mej tej yaaj, tej nyuj tuaj tua hlawv kheej theej txhoj hab ua kev sis raug zoo nrug kuv. Txhua qhov chaw kws kuv kuas mej pehawm kuv, kuv yuav nrug mej nyob hab foom koob moov rua mej.
Yog mej muab pobzeb teeb ua kuv lub thaaj, tsi xob muab tej pobzeb kws txaug tau lawm lug ua, rua qhov tsi tsimnyog muab tej pobzeb kws txaug tau lawm lug ua kuv lub thaaj.
Mej tsi xob ua kuv lub thaaj kuas muaj qeb ntai nce rua sau; yog mej ua le ntawd, thaus mej nce moog rua sau, luas yuav pum mej chaw txaajmuag.
“Muab cov kevcai nraag nuav rua cov pejxeem Yixalayees:
Yog mej yuav cov Henplais lug ua qhev, nwg yuavtsum ua mej qhev kuas txwm nkaus rau xyoos. Xyoo xyaa, nwg maam le nyob ywj sab hab tsi raug them nqe txhwv dlaabtsi.

Yog nwg tsi tau yuav quaspuj ua ntej kws nwg lug ua mej qhev, thaus nwg rov qaab moog nwg yuavtsum tsi xob coj tug quaspuj nrug nwg moog, tabsis yog nwg muaj quaspuj ua ntej nwg lug ua mej qhev, thaus nwg rov qaab moog nwg yuavtsum coj nwg tug quaspuj nrug nwg moog.

Yog has tas, tug tswv yuav quaspuj rua nwg hab nwg tug quaspuj yug tau tub lossis ntxhais rua nwg, mas tug quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas yog tug tswv le tuabneeg, ces tug qhev nwg tsuas tawm moog tuab leeg xwb.
Tabsis yog tug qhev has tas, nwg hlub nwg tug tswv, nwg tug quaspuj, nwg cov mivnyuas hab tsi xaav tawm moog nyob ywj sab,

ces ca nwg tug tswv coj nwg moog rua ntawm qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv. Kuas nwg sawv ntawm qhovrooj lossis ntawm tug ncej qhovrooj hab muab nwg lub nploojntseg tho qhov. Ces nwg yuavtsum ua nwg tug tswv qhev moog taag nwg lub neej le.
“Yog leejtwg muag nwg tug ntxhais moog ua luas qhev, mas tug ntxhais ntawd yuav tsi tau tawm moog ywj sab le tug txivneej.

Yog muab tug ntxhais ntawd muag rua lwm tug kws xaav yuav nwg moog ua quaspuj, tabsis yog tug txivneej ntawd tsi nyam, nwg yuavtsum muab tug quaspuj ntawd muag rov rua nwg txiv, tug txivneej ntawd tsi muaj cai muab nwg muag rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, rua qhov nwg tau ua tsi ncaaj rua tug quaspuj ntawd lawm.
Yog tug tswv twg yuav ib tug ntxhais lug ua qhev hab muab txis rua nwg tug tub, nwg yuavtsum saib taug tug ntxhais ntawd ib yaam le yog nwg yug.
Yog tug txivneej ntawd yuav nam yau, nwg yuavtsum pub tug nam hlub kuas muaj noj muaj naav hab pub rua nwg muaj cai ib yaam le yaav taag lug.
Yog nwg tsi ua le tej kws tau has lug sau nuav rua nwg tug nam hlub, nwg yuavtsum xaa tug nam hlub ntawd rov qaab hab tsi pub kuas them nyaj rua tug quasyawg le.
“Leejtwg ntaus hab tua ib tug tuabneeg twg tuag, ca le muab tug ntawd tua kuas tuag hab.
Tabsis yog tua yuam kev raug, tsi yog nwg txhobtxwm tua tug tuabneeg ntawd, nwg yuavtsum tsiv moog nyob huv qhov chaw kws kuv xaiv rua mej lawm, nwg txhaj yuav dlim.
Tabsis yog tug txivneej ntawd chim hab txhobtxwm tua lwm tug, txawm yog nwg tsiv moog cawm sav rua ntawm kuv lub thaaj los ca le muab nwg tua kuas tuag.
“Yog leejtwg ntaus nwg nam lossis nwg txiv, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.
“Yog leejtwg moog nyag ib tug tuabneeg coj moog muag rua luas lwm tug lossis ca nyob ua nwg qhev los ca le muab tug kws nyag ntawd tua povtseg.
“Yog leejtwg foom phem rua nwg nam lossis nwg txiv, ca le muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.
“Yog muaj ob tug txivneej sis tshe, hab muaj ib tug muab pobzeb ntaus ib tug lossis nkaug nrig rua, tabsis nwg tsi tuag, tsuas yog raug mob hab pw xwb, tug ntawd yuav tsi raug txim,
tabsis tom qaab kws tug raug mob sawv taug nreg paas tawm moog rua nrau zoov, tug kws ntaus tug ntawd yuavtsum them nqe rua nwg lub sijhawm kws nwg raug mob hab tu nwg moog txug thaus nwg zoo.
“Yog tug txivneej twg muab paas ntoo ntaus nwg tug tubqhe lossis ntxhais qhev tuag taamsim ntawd, tug txivneej ntawd yuav raug txim.
Tabsis yog tug qhev ntawd tseem nyob tau ib nub lossis ob nub, maam le tuag, mas tug tswv yuav tsi raug txim; rua qhov tug qhev ntawd yog nwg yuav lug.

“Yog muaj tej txivneej sis ntaus raug ib tug quaspuj kws suab mivnyuas huv plaab, ua rua nwg tug mivnyuas pob, tabsis nwg tsi mob ntxiv, mas yuavtsum muab tug kws ntaus raug tug quaspuj ntawd nplua lawv le nwg tug quasyawg xaav tau hab lawv le cov tu plaub pum zoo.
Tabsis yog tug quaspuj ntawd raug mob ib qho twg, mas yuavtsum rau txim sav pauj sav,
qhovmuag pauj qhovmuag, nav pauj nav, teg pauj teg, kutaw pauj kutaw,
qhov kub nyab pauj qhov kub nyab, qhov txhaab pauj qhov txhaab, hab qhov nqaj pauj qhov nqaj xwb.
“Yog tug txivneej twg ntaus nwg tug tubqhe lossis nwg tug ntxhais qhev qhovmuag dlig, nwg yuavtsum tso tug ntxhais qhev ntawd moog ywj sab, vim nwg muab ntaus dligmuag lawm.
Yog nwg ntaus nwg tug tubqhe lossis tug ntxhais qhev luv nav, nwg yuavtsum muab tso moog vim nwg muab ntaus luv nav lawm.
“Yog nyuj nrau ib tug tuabneeg twg tuag, yuavtsum muab pobzeb ntaus tug nyuj ntawd kuas tuag, hab tsi xob noj tug nyuj ntawd tej nqaj, tabsis tsi xob rau txim rua tug tswv nyuj.

Yog tug nyuj ntawd tub yeej txeev nrau tuabneeg lug lawm hab tub muaj tuabneeg moog has rua tug tswv nyuj paub lawm, tabsis nwg tsi ceev tug nyuj ntawd rua huv nkuaj, txhaj moog nrau tuabneeg tuag, yuavtsum muab pobzeb ntaus tug nyuj hab tug tswv nyuj kuas tuag huv tuabsi.
Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, yog tug tswv txaus sab muab nyaj txhwv nwg txujsa, mas nwg yuavtsum them lawv le luas kuas nwg them.
Yog tug nyuj ntawd nrau tug tub lossis tug ntxhais twg tuag los yeej ua lawv nraim le tuab txuj kevcai nuav hab.

Yog tug nyuj ntawd nrau tug tubqhe lossis tug ntxhais qhev twg tuag, tug tswv nyuj yuavtsum them peb caug dlaim nyaj nqe taubhau rua tug qhev ntawd tug tswv, hab yuavtsum muab pobzeb ntaus tug nyuj ntawd kuas tuag.
“Yog leejtwg qheb qhov lossis khawb qhov ca tsi muab npug, ib tug nyuj lossis ib tug neeg luav poob rua huv lub qhov ntawd,
nwg yuavtsum them tug nqe tsaj ntawd. Nwg them nyaj rua tug tswv tsaj hab nwg yuav tug tsaj ntawd.
Yog leejtwg tug nyuj moog nrau lwm tug, tug nyuj tuag, mas muab tug nyuj ntawd muag hab muab cov nyaj lug faib rua obtug ob leeg, hab muab tug nyuj tuag lug faib ib leeg ib saab.

Tabsis yog tug tswv nyuj tub paub has tas, nwg tug nyuj txeev nrau lwm tug lug lawm, tabsis nwg tsi ceev rua huv nkuaj, nwg yuav tau muab ib tug nyuj pauj tug nyuj kws tuag ntawd, hab nwg yuav tug nyuj kws tuag ntawd.
“Yog leejtwg nyag luas ib tug nyuj lossis ib tug yaaj hab muab tug tsaj ntawd tua lossis muab muag lawm, nwg yuavtsum them tsib tug nyuj pauj ib tug nyuj, hab plaub tug yaaj pauj ib tug yaaj.
“Yog muaj tubsaab tuaj tsoo tsev mo ntuj hab raug tua tuag, tug kws tua tug tubsaab ntawd tsi txhum;

Tabsis yog nwg tua nruab nub, mas nwg txhum. “Tug tubsaab yuavtsum raug them tej kws nwg moog nyag lug. Yog nwg tsi muaj nyaj them, nwg yuavtsum muab nwg muag moog ua luas qhev hab muab cov nyaj lug them tej nqe kws nwg nyag ntawd.
“Yog tug tubsaab ntawd nyag tsaj, tsi has nyuj, neeg luav, lossis yaaj kws moog nrhav tau tseem caj sa hab nwg caab rawv ntawm nwg teg, mas nwg yuavtsum them ob tug pauj ib tug.

“Yog leejtwg tso nwg tej tsaj moog noj zaub huv teb lossis vaaj txiv maab, hab cov tsaj ntawd moog noj luas lwm tug tej qoob  huv luas thaaj teb, nwg yuavtsum muab tej qoob kws zoo tshaaj plawg huv nwg thaaj teb lossis huv nwg lub vaaj txiv maab moog them.

“Yog leejtwg hlawv nwg thaaj teb hab kis moog kub luas tej pawg nplej huv luas tej teb, hab kub luas tej nplej kws tsi tau sav lossis tub hlais taag hab muab sau ua pawg lawm, tug kws ua suavtawg kub ntawd yuavtsum them tej kws nwg ua suavtawg kub ntawd.

“Yog leejtwg zoo sab khaws lwm tug tej nyaj lossis tej khoom muaj nqes ca rua huv nwg tsev hab muaj tubsaab tuaj nyag tej ntawd huv nwg tsev lawm, yog nwg nteg tau, mas tug tubsaab ntawd yuavtsum them ob npaug.
Tabsis yog nteg tsi tau tug tubsaab ntawd, mas yuav tau coj tug kws ca cov nyaj ntawd moog rua tom qhov chaw kws pehawm Vaajtswv, hab kuas nwg twv has tas, nwg yeej tsi tau nyag cov nyaj ntawd.

“Txhua rooj plaub kws yog sis txeeb tej cuabtxhaj cuabtaam, xws le nyuj, neeg luav, yaaj, rig tsho lossis lwm yaam kws pluj lawm, yuavtsum coj ob tug txivneej kws sis txeeb tej ntawd moog sawv tim ntsej tim muag rua ntawm Vaajtswv. Yog Vaajtswv txav txim rua tug twg, tug ntawd yuavtsum them ob npaug rua tug kws yeej cai.

“Yog leejtwg pum zoo coj lwm tug tej neeg luav, nyuj, yaaj lossis lwm yaam tsaj lug tu, yog tug tsaj ntawd tuag lossis raug mob lossis muaj lwm tug muab lawv tsiv lawm, hab tsi muaj tuabneeg ua timkhawv pum,

ces nwg yuavtsum moog rua ntawm qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv hab tsaa teg twv has tas, nwg tsi tau nyag. Yog tsi muaj tuabneeg nyag tug tsaj ntawd, mas tug tswv tsaj yuavtsum zoo sab ca tug tsaj ntawd pluj moog, hab tug kws saib tug tsaj ntawd txhaj tsi tau them,
tabsis yog muaj tuabneeg nyag tug tsaj ntawd lawm, nwg yuavtsum them rua tug tswv tsaj.
Yog muaj tsaj qus tum tug tsaj ntawd lawm, tug kws saib tug tsaj ntawd tsuas nqaa cov nqaj kws seem moog qha rua tug tswv paub xwb, yog tsaj tum tuag ces nwg tsi tau them.
“Yog leejtwg moog qev lwm tug ib tug tsaj lug ua raug mob lossis ua tuag thaus tug tswv tsi nyob ntawd pum, tug qev yuavtsum them tug tsaj ntawd.
Tabsis yog tuag thaus tug tswv pum ntsoov, tug qev yuav tsi tau them. Yog nwg ndlav, ces cov nqe ntawd yeej npug tug tsaj nqe lawm.
“Yog leejtwg moog ntxag ib tug nkaujxwb kws tsi tau muaj tuabneeg qhab hab moog nrug nwg pw lawm, tug ntawd yuavtsum them tug ntxhais ntawd nqe tshoob hab yuav nwg ua quaspuj.
Tabsis yog leej txiv tsi kaam muab nwg tug ntxhais rua tug ntawd yuav ua quaspuj los nwg yuavtsum them nyaj kuas txaus nkaus tug ntxhais ntawd cov nqe tshoob.
“Cov quaspuj kws txawj ua khawvkoob hab saib yaig, yuavtsum muab tua povtseg.
“Tug txivneej twg ntxag tsaj, mas yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.
“Yog leejtwg fij khoom rua lwm tug vaajtswv kws tsi yog tug TSWV, yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.
“Mej tsi xob tsimtxom lossis quab yuam cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob, rua qhov thaus mej nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, mej tub yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws hab.
Mej tsi xob tsimtxom ib tug puj ntsuag lossis ib tug mivnyuas ntsuag twg.
Yog mej tsimtxom puab, thaus puab quaj thov kuv, kuv kws yog tug TSWV nov puab tej suab quaj,
kuv yuav npautawg rua mej hab kuv yuav tua mej huv tshaav rog. Mej cov quaspuj yuav ua puj ntsuag hab mej cov mivnyuas yuav ua mivnyuas ntsuag.
“Yog mej qev nyaj rua kuv cov tuabneeg kws yog cov pluag, tsi xob tsub paaj rua nwg them.
Yog leejtwg muab nwg lub tsho ntev tuaj yuam nqe rua koj hab nwg coglug yuav txhwv rov qaab, thaus tsaus ntuj koj yuavtsum xaa rua nwg,
rua qhov nwg muaj tuab lub tsho ntawd naav kuas suv xwb. Nwg yuav ua le caag pw tsaug zug? Thaus nwg quaj thov kuv, kuv yuav teb nwg tej lug thov, rua qhov kuv yog tug kws muaj lub sab taabncuab.
“Mej tsi xob has lug phem rua Vaajtswv,  hab tsi xob foom phem rua tej numtswv kws tswjfwm mej.
“Muab mej tej qoobloo, mej tej txiv maab, hab mej tej roj txiv ntoo, coj tuaj fij rua kuv thaus kws tej ntawd sav lawm. “Muab mej cov tub hlub pub rua kuv.

Muab mej tej nyuj hab tej yaaj thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv coj tuaj fij rua kuv. Thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv, mas ca nrug tug nam nyob xyaa nub xwb, nub yim yuavtsum coj tuaj fij rua kuv.
“Mej yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg, mej tej tsaj kws raug tsaj qus tum tuag rua huv tshaav zaub, mej tsi xob muab tej nqaj lug ua noj, ca le muab pov rua dlev noj xwb.
“Tsi xob coj tej zaaj tsi tseeb moog has rua nrau toj nrau peg, hab tsi xob ua timkhawv tsi tseeb paab tug tuabneeg txhum.
Tsi xob nrug paab tuabneeg coob moog ua txhum lossis nrug feem coob ua timkhawv tsi ncaaj huv tsev tu plaub,
hab tsi xob xaiv cov tuabneeg pluag ntsejmuag huv tsev tu plaub.
“Yog koj moog pum koj tug yeebncuab, tug nyuj lossis tug neeg luav kws pluj lawm, koj ca le caab rov qaab lug rua nwg.
Yog koj pum nwg tug neeg luav thauj nraa qaug, koj yuavtsum moog paab tsaa tug neeg luav ntawd sawv; tsi xob dlhau moog.
“Tsi xob txav txim tsi ncaaj rua tug tuabneeg pluag thaus nwg tuaj rua huv tsev tu plaub.
Tsi xob laam nrhav lug tsi tseeb lam rua lwm tug, hab tsi xob tua cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim dlaabtsi povtseg. Kuv yuav rau txim rua txhua tug kws ua phem le ntawd.
Tsi xob yuav luas tej nyaj xab, rua qhov tej nyaj ntawd ua rua cov numtswv qhovmuag faam, txav txim tsi ncaaj hab ua rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg swb cai.

“Tsi xob tsimtxom cov tuabneeg poob tebchaws; mej yeej paub has tas, ua tuabneeg txawv tebchaws zoo le caag, rua qhov thaus u mej yeej tau moog ua tuabneeg poob tebchaws nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm hab.
“Mej muab rau xyoo lug tseb nplej hab sau mej tej qoobloo huv mej tej teb.

Tabsis xyoo xyaa ca tej teb su, hab tsi xob sau ib yaam dlaabtsi kws tuaj huv mej tej teb ntawd le. Cov tuabneeg pluag yuav noj tej khoom kws tuaj huv tej teb ntawd, hab tej tsaj qus yuav tau noj tej kws seem. Mej tej vaaj txiv maab hab mej tej txiv ntoo roj los ua ib yaam le ntawd.
“Mej ua mej tej num rau nub, tabsis nub xyaa mej su tsi xob ua num, ca mej tej tubqhe hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws ua num rua mej hab mej tej tsaj tau su.
“Ncu ntsoov txhua yaam kws kuv has rua mej lawm. Tsi xob thov lwm tug Vaajtswv; hab tsi xob has txug puab tej npe hlo le.
“Yuavtsum ua kevcai ua kuv tsaug ib xyoos twg peb zag.

Lub hli Anpis, yog lub hli kws mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, mej ua kevcai noj Ncuav Tsi Xyaw Keeb lawv le kuv tub tau saamfwm tseg rua mej lawm. Xyaa nub kws mej ua kevcai ntawd mej tsi xob noj tej ncuav xyaw keeb hlo le. Mej tsi xob tuaj pehawm kuv teg dlawb teg nplag.
“Ua Kevcai Sau Qoobloo rua thaus lub caij kws mej pib sau mej tej qoob. “Ua Kevcai Nyob Tsev Pheebsuab rua lub caij nplooj ntoos zeeg hab thaus mej dle mej tej txiv maab txiv ntoo huv mej tej vaaj.
Mej yuavtsum ua kevcai ib xyoos peb zag hab taagnrho mej cov txivneej ca le tuaj pehawm kuv kws yog tug TSWV mej tug Vaajtswv.

“Tsi xob muab ncuav xyaw keeb fij rua kuv thaus mej muab tsaj tua hlawv fij rua kuv. Cov roj tsaj kws tua theej txhoj fij rua kuv thaus mej ua cov kevcai nuav, tsi pub seem moog txug taagkig sawv ntxuv le.

“Txhua xyoo mej yuavtsum coj tej qoob kws mej xub sau tau lug tuaj fij rua huv tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub tsev. “Tsi xob muab mivnyuas yaaj lossis mivnyuas tshis cov nqaj lug hau nrug leej nam cov kua mig.
“Kuv yuav khaiv ib tug timtswv moog ua mej ntej, tsomkwm mej thaus mej taabtom taug kev hab nwg yuav coj mej moog kuas txug qhov chaw kws kuv tub tau npaaj tseg rua mej lawm.
Mej yuavtsum noog nwg lug hab fwm nwg. Tsi xob ntxeev sab tawmtsaam nwg, rua qhov kuv yog tug tso nwg lug, hab nwg yuav tsi zaam txim rua mej.
Tabsis yog mej fwm nwg hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm, kuv yuav tawmtsaam mej tej yeebncuab.

Kuv tug timtswv yuav moog ua mej ntej hab coj mej moog kuas txug huv lub tebchaws kws cov Amaules, cov Hitis, cov Pelixes, cov Kana-aas, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus nyob, hab kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag.
Mej tsi xob pe puab tej mlom, hab tsi xob moog xyum coj puab tej kevcai. Muab puab tej mlom rhuav povtseg hab muab puab tej ncej zeb tseemceeb tsoo povtseg.
Yog mej pehawm kuv kws yog tug TSWV, mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav foom koob moov kuas mej muaj mov noj hab dlej haus nplua mag hab yuav tshem mej tej kaab mob kev nkeeg moog huv tuabsi.
Nyob huv mej lub tebchaws, mej cov quaspuj yuav tsi pob mivnyuas lossis txhua tug quaspuj yuav muaj tub muaj ki, kuv yuav pub kuas mej muaj sa nyob ntev.

“Kuv yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg kws thaiv mej kev kuas puab ntshai kuv; kuv yuav coj kev ntxhuv sab lug rua cov tuabneeg kws mej yuav moog tua ntawd hab kuv yuav ua kuas mej cov yeebncuab tsiv tawm ntawm mej moog.
Kuv yuav ua kuas mej cov yeebncuab ntshai yoog taag;  kuv yuav lawv cov Hivis, cov Kana-aas hab cov Hitis tsiv ua ntej mej moog txug.
Kuv yuav tsi lawv puab tsiv kuas taag huv ib lub xyoos. Yog kuv ua le ntawd, lub tebchaws yuav caj nroj tsuag hab yuav muaj tsaj qus coob heev.
Kuv yuav lawv puab tawm ib zag mivntsiv moog txug thaus mej fuamvaam coob zuj zug, maam le muab hlo lub tebchaws rua mej.

Kuv yuav tu nrim rua mej lub tebchaws pib kag ntawm ceg Havtxwv Lab moog txug ndlua ntawm Havtxwv Meditelanees, hab pib kag ntawm taj suabpuam moog txug ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates. Kuv yuav muab fwjchim rua mej lawv cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd kuas tsiv ua ntej kws mej moog nyob.
Mej tsi xob koom teg nrug puab lossis teev puab tej mlom hlo le.

Mej tsi xob ca cov tuabneeg ntawd nrug mej nyob huv mej lub tebchaws; yog mej ca puab nrug mej nyob, puab yuav coj mej moog ua txhum tawmtsaam kuv. Yog mej pe puab tej mlom, tej mlom ntawd yuav yog ib rooj ntxab kws tais mej cejdlaab.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le tuaj cuag kuv sau roob nuav, coj Aloos, Nadas, Anpihus hab cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj xyaa caum leej nrug koj tuaj; hab mej tuaj dleb dleb pehawm kuv xwb.
Tsuas pub koj txaav tuaj ze kuv xwb, tsi pub lwm tug txaav tuaj ze kuv. Tsi xob pub cov pejxeem nce tuaj rua sau roob nuav hlo le.”
Mauxes txhaj coj tug TSWV tej lug hab tej kevcai lug pav qha rua cov pejxeem, hab taagnrho cov pejxeem thooj txhij teb has tas, “Peb yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV has.”

Mauxes sau tug TSWV tej lug huv tuabsi ca. Nub tom qaab thaus sawv ntxuv, Mauxes moog teeb ib lub thaaj rua tim taw roob, hab muab kaum ob lub pobzeb lawv le cov Yixalayees kaum ob xeem lug teeb tseg ca ua chaw ncu txug.
Mauxes khaiv cov tub hluas Yixalayees kuas moog hlawv tej khoom fij, hab tua nyuj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV ua kev sis raug zoo.
Mauxes muab cov ntshaav nyuj ib nraab tso rua huv cov phab hab muab ib nraab ndluav rua lub thaaj.

Nwg muab phoo ntawv kws sau cov lug cog tseg kws tug TSWV saamfwm kuas sau, lug nyeem rua cov pejxeem noog. Cov pejxeem leeg lug rua nwg has tas, “Peb yuav noog hab ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV has.”
Ces Mauxes muab cov ntshaav kws nyob huv cov phab nchus rua cov pejxeem. Mauxes has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog cov ntshaav kws tug TSWV muab ua lub cim coglug tseg rua mej lawv le cov lug saamfwm nuav.”
Mauxes, Aloos, Nadas, Anpihus, hab cov Yixalayees xyaa caum leej thawjcoj txhaj nce moog sau roob
hab puab pum cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv. Qhov chaw kws nwg tsuj pua cov hlaws ntsuab le ntuj ntsuab.
Vaajtswv tsi tau ua le caag rua cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj kuas raug kev puamtsuaj; puab puavleej pum Vaajtswv, hab cov thawjcoj ntawd noj haus ua ke.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le nce tuaj cuag kuv sau roob, koj tuaj nyob sau nuav tog, kuv yuav muab ob dlaim txag zeb kws kuv sau kuv tej lug hab kuv tej kevcai txhua nqai rua koj, kuv sau tej nuav tseg ca qha suavdlawg.”
Mauxes hab Yausuas tug kws yog Mauxes tug tubkhai txawm sawv kev moog, hab Mauxes txawm nce moog sau Vaajtswv lub roob lawm.

Mauxes has rua cov thawjcoj tas, “Mej nyob ntawm lub yeej nuav tog txug thaus wb rov qaab lug. Aloos hab Hules obtug nrug mej nyob ntawm nuav; hab yog mej leejtwg muaj plaub ntug dlaabtsi ca le moog cuag obtug.”
Mauxes nce moog sau roob hab muaj fuab pus tsaus nti sau.
Tug TSWV tug tshwjchim nyob sau Roob Xinais, hab fuab pus tsaus nti tau rau nub; hab nub xyaa tug TSWV hu huv tauv fuab tuaj rua Mauxes.
Tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm lug rua cov Yixalayees pum zoo ib yaam le nplaim tawg cig laam lug sau roob tuaj.
Mauxes txawm nce moog sau roob hab nkaag moog rua huv tauv fuab. Nwg moog nyob sau roob tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj has rua cov Yixalayees kuas coj khoom tuaj fij rua kuv. Koj ca le txais txhua yaam kws cov tuabneeg txaus sab coj tuaj fij.
Cov khoom kws coj tuaj fij nuav mas yog: kub, nyaj, tooj;
xuv xav, xuv tsaamxem, xuv lab hab tej rig tsho kws muab plaub tshis lug ntus ua;
hab tej tawv yaaj kws muab zaas tshuaj paajyeeb tej tawv nyuj kws zoo heev, ntoo kubtwg;
hab roj saam teeb, tej roj pleev txhawb meejthawj hab tej moov tshuaj kws tsw qaab;
tej qai zeb hab tej hlaws kws muaj nqes tshaaj plawg kws coj moog dlai rua ntawm tug Povthawj Hlub lub tsho efaus  hab nwg dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab.
Puab yuavtsum ua ib lub Tsevntaub rua kuv, kuv txhaj nrug puab nyob.
Ua lub Tsevntaub nuav hab npaaj ua tej khoom siv rua huv lub Tsevntaub ntawd lawv le kuv yuav qha koj ua ntaag.
“Muab cov ntoo kubtwg lug ua ib lub Phijxaab, qhov ntev ob tshim hab ib dlus, qhov dlaav ib tshim hab ib dlus, hab qhov sab ib tshim hab ib dlus.
Muab cov tseem kub vuam lub phijxaab ntawd saab nrau hab saab huv nruab nrog, hab muab kub lug ua tug ntug thoob plawg.
Muab kub ua plaub lub khawb ntsa rua ntawm plaub tug ceg, ntsa ib saab ob lub khawb.
Muab ntoo kubtwg ua ob tug laag kws kwv hab muab kub vuam ob tug laag ntoo ntawd huv tuabsi,
hab muab ob tug laag ntawd ntxig rua huv cov khawb ntawm lub phijxaab ib saab ib tug laag.
Thaus ntxig rua huv cov khawb lawm tsi xob rhu le.
Ca le muab ob dlaim txag zeb kws kuv sau kuv cov lug saamfwm kws kuv yuav muab rua koj tso rua huv lub Phijxaab ntawd.
“Muab cov tseem kub ua dlaim khwb, qhov ntev ob tshim hab ib dlus, qhov dlaav ib tshim hab ib dlus.
Muab kub ntaus ua ob tug qhelunpees muaj tis,
txawb ib tug rua ib tog hau phijxaab. Muab ob tug qhelunpees cog keevxeeb rua lub hau phijxaab ib tug rua ib tog.
Tso ob tug qhelunpees ntawd tig xubndlag tuaj ua ke, kuas cov koojtis nthuav lug roog lub phijxaab.
Muab ob dlaim txag zeb ca rua huv lub Phijxaab hab muab lub hau khwb lub phijxaab.
Kuv yuav ntsib koj qhov ntawd, hab kuv nyob sau lub hau Phijxaab kis nruab nraab ntawm ob saab qaab koojtis qhelunpees. Kuv yuav muab kuv tej kevcai rua koj coj moog qha cov Yixalayees.
“Muab ntoo kubtwg lug ua ib lub rooj ntev ob tshim, dlaav ib tshim, sab ib tshim hab ib dlus.
Muab kub vuam lub rooj ntawd, hab muab kub nchuav ua ib tug ntug ncig thoob plawg lub npoo rooj.
Lub npoo rooj ntawd ua tuab le ib xib, hab muab kub ua ib tug ntswg thoob plawg lub npoo rooj.
Muab kub ntaus ua plaub lub khawb ntsa rua plaub lub kaum rooj ntawm plaub tug ceg.
Cov khawb kws ntxig laag kwv lub rooj ntawd, muab ntsa kuas ze rua ntawm tug npoo.
Muab ntoo kubtwg lug txua ua ob tug laag hab muab kub vuam rua ob tug laag ntawd.
Ua phaaj, khob, hub hab taig lug tau laub cawv txiv maab ua khoom fij. Tej twj taig nuav yuavtsum muab cov tseem kub ua xwb.
Lub rooj ntawd yuavtsum txawb rua ntawm hauv ntej lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab cov ncuav dlawbhuv kws fij rua kuv yuavtsum ca nyob sau lub rooj.
“Muab cov tseem kub ntaus ua ib lub teeb. Lub taw hab tug ncej txawb teeb los muab tej tseem kub ntaus ua paaj, cos paaj, hab nplai paaj, kuas keevxeeb rua ntawm tug ncej txawb teeb.
Hab ua kuas ncau ua rau ceg, ib saab peb ceg.
Rau ceg ntawd ib ceg ua peb lub paaj zoo le paaj txiv dluaj, nrug cov cos paaj hab nplooj.
Tug ncej txawb teeb mas zaig ua plaub lub paaj zoo le paaj txiv dluaj, nrug cov cos paaj hab cov nplooj.
Ntawm rau tug ceg teeb ntawd, ua ib lub paaj rua huv qaab ntawm cov ceg ncau.
Cov cos paaj, cov ceg hab tug ncej txawb teeb yog muab tuab thooj kub ntaus ua xwb.
Ua xyaa lub teeb rua ntawm tug ncej txawb teeb, hab taws kuas cig pum kev laam lug rua tom hauv ntej.
Muab cov tseem kub ntaus ua raab txab kws txav cov teebxeeb hab ua lub phaaj rau txab.
Muab xyaa caum tsib choj kub lug ntaus ua tej ceg teeb, hab tej twj taig kws siv rua lub teeb.
Yuavtsum ua txhua yaam nuav lawv le kuv tau qha rua koj sau roob lawm.
“Muab kaum dlaim ntaub maag xav kws zoo heev, ntaub tsaamxem, hab xuv lab lug ua lub tsevntaub. Xaws ib cov qhelunpees rua ntawm cov ntaub ntawd.
Txav cov ntaub ntawd kuas sis luag zog, ib dlaim ntev neeg nkaum yim tshim, dlaav plaub tshim.
Muab tsib dlaim xaws ua ib dlaig, muab kaum dlaim xaws ua ob dlaig.
Xub muab dlaim ntaub xav xaws rua txhua dlaim ntaub cov ntug saab nrau.
Ua tsib caug lub ntsej rua thawj dlaim ntaub hab tsib caug lub ntsej rua dlaim ob, yuavtsum ntsuag kuas sis ncaag zog.
Muab kub ntaus ua tsib caug lub khawb khawm ob dlaim ntaub ua ib dlaig.
“Muab kaum ib dlaim ntaub plaub tshis xaws ua ib dlaig vuv lub Tsevntaub ntawd.
Txav cov ntaub ntawd kuas sis luag zog, ib dlaim ntev peb caug tshim hab dlaav plaub tshim.
Muab tsib dlaim ntaub plaub tshis xaws ua ib dlaig, hab muab rau dlaim xaws ua ib dlaig. Dlaim rau yog dlaim kws dlauv ua lub hauvmum Tsevntaub.
Ua tsib caug lub ntsej tis rua tog taw tom nuav, hab ua tsib caug lub ntsej tis rua tog taw tom u.
Muab tooj ntaus ua tsib caug lub khawb khawm ob dlaim ntaub ntawd ua ib dlaig vuv lub tsev.
Dlaim ntaub kws vuv lub tsev, tseg ib nraab nqug moog thaiv saab peg qaum Tsevntaub.
Tseg tw dlauv rua ob saab, ib saab twg tseg ntev le ib tshim, dlauv lug npug lub Tsevntaub.
“Vuv ob txheej tuaj sau, ib txheej yog muab cov tawv laug yaaj kws zaas lab, hab ib txheej yog muab cov tawv kws zoo heev.
“Txav ntoo kubtwg lug ua cov taab kws sawv ntsug txheem lub Tsevntaub.
Txhua tug taab ntev kaum tshim hab dlaav ib tshim hab ib dlus,
muab ob saab npoo qhais ua qwb dla sis dlhos, kuas cov taab ntawd sis dlhos ua ke. Taagnrho cov taab ntawd puavleej muab qhais ua qwb dla huv tuabsi.
Muab neeg nkaum tug taab txhus rua saab nraag,
muab plaub caug pluaj nyaj ua taw tag rua neeg nkaum tug taab, ob pluaj tag ib tug taab, kuas ob tug taab ntawd txhaj sis dlhos ruaj.
Muab neeg nkaum tug taab txheem lub Tsevntaub saab peg,
hab muab plaub caug pluaj nyaj ua taw tag, ob pluaj tag ib tug taab.
Lub Tsevntaub saab tom qaab kws yog saab nubpoob, txheem rau tug taab,
hab muab ob tug taab txheem lub kaum tsev tom kawg.
Cov taw taab puavleej txawb rua sau cov taw nyaj ntawd. Ob tug taab huv taw los yuavtsum txawb sis dlhos ib yaam nkaus.
Yog le ntawd, muaj yim tug taab hab kaum rau pluaj nyaj, ob pluaj tag ib tug taab.
“Txua kaum tsib tug laag ntoo kubtwg, muab tsib tug ua taab rua saab phaab ntsaa Tsevntaub saab peg,
muab tsib tug ua taab rua saab phaab ntsaa saab nraag, hab muab tsib tug ua taab rua saab hauvmum tom qaab kawg kws yog saab nubpoob.
Tug laag nruab nraab, yog tug kws yuam cov phaab ntsaa ntu nruab nraab, tom nuav moog ti nkaus rua tom u.
Muab cov tseem kub vuam cov taab hab muab cov khawb kub khawm cov taab rua ntawm cov nqaaj, cov nqaaj ntawd puavleej muab kub vuam huv tuabsi.
Tsaa lub Tsevntaub lawv le kuv tau qha rua koj sau Roob Xinais.
“Muab ib dlaim ntaub maag zoo heev kws txaij xav, txaij paajyeeb lab hab cov plaub yaaj kws zaas lab lug ua dlaim ntaub thaiv. Xaws cov dluab qhelunpees rua ntawm dlaim ntaub ntawd.
Muab cov nqailauj kub dlai rua hab coj moog khuab rua ntawm plaub tug ncej ntoo kubtwg kws vuam kub, hab muab txawb rua sau plaub pluaj nyaj kws tag taw.

Muab dlaim ntaub ntawd dlai rua ntawm cov khawb huv lub tsev, hab muab lub Phijxaab kws ntim ob dlaim txag zeb kws kuv sau tej lug cog tseg txawb rua ntawm dlaim ntaub saab tod. Dlaim ntaub ntawd quas Chaav Dlawbhuv hab Chaav kws Dlawbhuv kawg nkaus.
Muab lub hau moog khwb lub Phijxaab kws ntim tej lug cog tseg.
Muab lub rooj moog txawb rua saab nrau dlaim ntaub saab peg, hab muab tug ncej txawb teeb txawb rua saab nraag.
“Muab ib dlaim ntaub maag zoo heev kws txaij xav, txaij paajyeeb hab xuv lab kws xaws ua paaj ntaub txaij nraug zeeg lug ua dlaim ntaub npug lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub.
Koj yuavtsum ua tsib tug ncej ntoo kubtwg hab muab tej tseem kub vuam rua hab ua ib co nqailauj kub dlai dlaim ntaub nuav rua sau; hab ua tsib tug taw tooj tag cov ncej ntawd.
“Muab ntoo kubtwg lug ua lub thaaj. Ua qhov ntev hab qhov dlaav tsib tshim hab qhov sab peb tshim.
Ua plaub tug kub rua sau plaub ceg kaum thaaj. Plaub tug kub ntawd, txua koom hlo nrug lub thaaj hab muab tooj vuam rua huv tuabsi.
Ua ib co laujkaub ntim tshauv, ib co dluav, ib co taig, ib co dlav rawg hab ib cov yag rau ncaig tawg. Tej cuabyeej nuav puavleej yog muab tooj ua.
Muab tooj hab ua dlaim ntxaij; hab muab tooj ntaus ua plaub lub khawb ntsa rua plaub ceg kaum ua teg nqaa.
Muab dlaim ntxaij tooj ntawd pua rua huv lub thaaj kuas txug ndlua ib nraab.
Muab ntoo kubtwg ua ob tug laag kws kwv lub thaaj, hab muab tooj vuam rua,
hab muab ntxig rua ntawm plaub lub khawb kws ntsa rua ntawm lub thaaj ob saab.
Muab txag ntoo ua lub thaaj hab tseg huv plawv khoob, lawv nraim le tug qauv kws kuv tau qha rua koj sau roob lawm.
“Koj yuavtsum xov vaaj ncig lub Tsevntaub. Muab dlaim ntaub maag kws ntev ib puas tshim xov saab nraag,
muab neeg nkaum tug kaav tooj ua ncej, muab neeg nkaum tug kaav tooj tag taw, tabsis cov khawb hab cov hlua yog muab nyaj ua.
Xov zoo ib yaam le ntawd rua saab ntsaa vaaj peg hab.
Muab dlaim ntaub kws ntev tsib caug tshim xov saab nubpoob, txhus kaum tug ncej hab kaum tug tag taw.
Saab nub tuaj, yog lub roojvaag kws nkaag moog rua huv, saab ntawd xov tsib caug tshim dlaav ib yaam nkaus.
Ib saab roojvaag twg ntev kaum tsib tshim, txhus peb tug ncej hab peb tug tag taw.
Saab roojvaag tod los ntev kaum tsib tshim, txhus peb tug ncej hab peb tug tag taw.

Dlaim ntaub maag kws npug lub roojvaag ntev neeg nkaum tshim hab txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab, hab muab xaws ua paaj ntaub txaij nraug zeeg rua. Txhus plaub tug ncej hab plaub tug tag taw dlai dlaim ntaub ntawd.
Taagnrho cov ncej kws xov ncig lub tsev, puavleej muab xuv nyaj paav, tej khawb khawm los yog khawb nyaj, hab cov tag taw puavleej yog tooj.
Lub vaaj, qhov ntev muaj ib puas tshim, qhov dlaav muaj tsib caug tshim, hab qhov sab muaj tsib tshim. Muab cov ntaub maag kws zoo heev xaws ua ntsaa vaaj hab muab tooj ua cov tag taw.
Taagnrho txhua yaam cuabyeej siv huv lub Tsevntaub, tej tswg kws txhus nqug lub Tsevntaub hab tug ntsaa vaaj puavleej yog muab tooj ua.
“Ca le saamfwm rua cov Yixalayees kuas puab nqaa cov roj txiv ntoo kws zoo tshaaj plawg tuaj rua koj saam rua lub teeb, txhaj tau taws txhua mo.

Aloos hab nwg cov tub ua cov kws tu hab taws lub teeb huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib kws ncaaj lub Phijxaab ntawm dlaim ntaub saab nrau nuav kuas cig taabmeeg kuv ib mos kaaj ntug. Cov Yixalayees hab puab cov xeebntxwv yuavtsum ceev cov lug saamfwm nuav moog ibtxhis le.”
“Ca le hu koj tug tijlaug Aloos hab nwg cov tub: Nadas, Anpihus, Ele-axas hab Ithamas tuaj. Muab puab cais tawm huv cov Yixalayees, hab muab puab tsaa ua cov povthawj ua kuv teg num.
Xaws cov tsho povthawj rua koj tug tijlaug Aloos naav, tsaav nwg lub meejmom kuas suavdlawg fwm.
Koj hu taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws kuv pub puab muaj peevxwm ua txhua yaam tuaj, hab qha kuas puab xaws cov tsho ntev rua Aloos naav, muab nwg tsaa ua povthawj ua kuv teg num.

Qha kuas puab ua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab, lub tsho efaus, lub tsho ntev, lub tsho txaij, txuj phuam kws ntoo hab txuj hlaab sa. Puab ua cov tsho povthawj nuav rua koj tug tijlaug Aloos hab nwg cov tub naav, kuas puab ua cov povthawj ua kuv teg num.
Cov tuabneeg ntawd muab ntaub xav, ntaub tsaamxem, xuv lab, xuv kub hab cov ntaub maag kws zoo heev xaws ua cov tsoog tsho ntawd.
“Puab muab ntaub xav, ntaub tsaamxem, xuv lab, xuv kub, hab muab cov ntaub maag kws zoo heev xaws ua lub tsho efaus hab xaws paaj ntaub txaij nraug zeeg rua.
Ob txuj hlaab kws khuam xubpwg, muab sis rig rua nrau nrausqaum moog khawm rua nraag ob saab nthaa.
Txuj hlaab sa yog muab cov ntaub kws xaws lub tsho efaus ua, hab muab xaws rua ntawm lub tsho efaus.
Muab ob lub qai zeb ci ci txaug Yakhauj kaum ob tug tub cov npe rua,
txaug kuas lawv le puab tej noobnyoog ib tug zuj zug, txaug rau leej npe rua ib lub qai zeb.
Yuavtsum yog tug kws txawj ntaus nplhaib, txhaj txaug tau Yakhauj cov tub tej npe rua ntawm ob lub qai zeb, hab yuavtsum nchuav ob dlaim phaj cog ob lub qai zeb ntawd.

Muab ob lub qai zeb ntawd dlai rua ntawm lub tsho efaus ob txuj hlaab sau xubpwg, ua lub cim ncu txug kaum ob xeem Yixalayees. Ua le ntawd Aloos txhaj tau coj rawv puab tej npe rua sau nwg ob saab xubpwg, kuas kuv kws yog tug TSWV, ncu ntsoov kuv tsaav tuabneeg.
Muab tej tseem kub nchuav ua ob lub hum txaij nraug zeeg,
hab ua ob txuj saw kub ntswj zoo le txuj hlua, hab muab tis rua ntawm ob dlaim phaj ntawd.

“Ua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab rua tug Povthawj Hlub tau siv npug hauvsab le Vaajtswv lub sab nyam. Muab cov ntaub kws xaws lub tsho efaus ua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab hab xaws paaj ntaub txaij nraug zeeg rua hab.
Dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab ntawd ua xwmfaab xwmmeem hab muab tais ua ob tsem, ntev ib dlus hab dlaav ib dlus.
Cog plaub leej qai zeb kws muaj nqes rua ntawm dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab; thawj leej cog ib lub lab dlaaj lig, ib lub dlaaj ntshab si, hab ib lub lab tshab tshab;
leej ob, cog ib lub ntsuab ci hob, ib lub xav hab ib lub dlawb ci hob;
leej peb, cog ib lub lab ntshab si, ib lub txho tawg, hab ib lub lab ua paajyeeb ntshaa;
hab leej plaub, cog ib lub txho xav, ib lub dlawb txho hab ib lub dlawb ci ntshab si. Cov qai zeb nuav puavleej muab cog rua ntawm ob dlaim phaj kub.
Kaum ob lub qai zeb ntawd puavleej txaug Yakhauj kaum ob leeg tub npe rua, cov qai zeb ntawd zoo ib yaam le tej homthawj kws txaug kaum ob xeem ntawd npe rua.
Muab cov tseem kub nchuav ua ob txuj saw, hab muab ntswj zoo le txuj hlua, tis rua ntawm dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab.
Ua ob lub khawb kub tis rua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab ob lub ntsej saab sau,
hab muab ob txuj saw kub tis rua ntawm ob lub khawb kub.
Muab ob tog qaab tis rua ob dlaim phaj, ua le nuav kuas ob txuj saw lu rua lub tsho efaus ob dlaim tag xubpwg ntawm xubndlag.
Ua dlua ob lub khawb kub tis rua ntawm dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab ob lub kaum huv qaab ntawm tug npoo kws npuab nkaus lub tsho efaus.
Ua dlua ob lub khawb kub tis ntxiv rua lub tsho khuam ob txuj hlaab khuam xubpwg ob tog tw kawg tom xubndlag kws ze kaab xaws hab txuas nkaus txuj hlaab kws muab ntaub plaub yaaj xaws.

Muab ob txuj hlaab ntaub xav khi dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab ob lub khawb rua ntawm lub tsho efaus ob lub khawb, kuas txuas nkaus rua ntawm txuj hlaab lab, hab kuas dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab nyob ncaaj rua ntawm lub tsho efaus.

“Thaus Aloos moog rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv, nwg yuavtsum naav rawv dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab kws txaug taagnrho cov Yixalayees kaum ob xeem npe rua lawm, kuas kuv kws yog tug TSWV, ncu qaab ntsoov kuv tsaav tuabneeg.

Muab lub Ulees hab lub Thumees  ntsaws rua huv dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab, kuas thaus Aloos tuaj rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv kws yog kuv qhov chaw nyob, nwg txhaj nqaa rawv ob yaam ntawd. Txhua zag nwg yuavtsum npua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab tuaj, nwg txhaj yuav paub qha rua cov Yixalayees ua tej yaam kws hum kuv sab.
“Muab cov xuv xav xaws ua lub tsho ntev naav npug tuaj sau lub tsho efaus.
Lub tsho ntawd, xaws looj sau taubhau tuaj, hab foob lub cejdlaab tsho kuas thoob plawg txhaj tsi ndluag.
Muab xuv xav, xuv tsaamxem hab xuv lab khi ua tej lub txiv ntsab pobkws, dlai ib lub txiv ntsab pobkws quas ib lub tswb kub, thoob plawg lub tw tsho ntev.

Hab muab lub tsho ntev ntawd rua Aloos naav thaus nwg moog ua teg num povthawj, txhaj yuav nov tej tswb ntawd nrov thaus nwg moog rua huv Chaav Dlawbhuv tim ntsej tim muag tug TSWV hab thaus nwg tawm rov qaab, nwg txhaj tsi raug tua tuag.
“Hab koj muab cov tseem kub ntaus ua ib dlaim phaj, hab txaug ib cov lug rua ntawm dlaim phaj kub has tas, ‘Dlawbhuv rua tug TSWV.’
Muab ib txuj hlaab ntaub xav khi dlaim phaj kub ntawd rua sau txuj phuam kws ntoo sau taubhau.

Aloos coj rawv dlaim phaj kub ntawd rua sau nwg hauvplaj, ces txawm yog cov pejxeem fij tej yaam khoom yuam kev mivntsiv los kuv kws yog tug TSWV txhaj yuav txais cov Yixalayees tej khoom kws puab coj tuaj fij rua kuv ntawd.
“Muab cov xuv maaj kws zoo heev ntus ua ib lub tsho rua Aloos naav hab ntus ua ib txuj phuam rua Aloos ntoo, hab xaws paaj ntaub rua txuj hlaab kuas txaij nraug zeeg.
“Koj ca le ua ib cov tsho, ib cov hlaab hab ib cov mom rua Aloos cov tub, koj yuavtsum ua kuas zoo tsimnyog rua puab naav kuas suavdlawg fwm puab.
Muab cov tsho nuav rua koj tug tijlaug Aloos hab nwg cov tub naav. Ca le muab roj txiv ntoo pleev puab hab tsaa puab ua cov povthawj ua kuv teg num.
Koj muab ntaub maag xaws ib cov rig tuab lu rua puab naav tuaj huv qaab kuas txij ndlua ntawm dluav rua nraag ncej qaab, txhaj tsi pum puab chaw txaajmuag.

Aloos hab nwg cov tub yuavtsum naav cov rig nuav thaus puab moog rua huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib lossis thaus puab moog sawv ntawm lub thaaj ua teg num povthawj huv Chaav Dlawbhuv, puab txhaj tsi raug tua vim pum puab tej chaw txaajmuag. Qhov nuav yog txuj kevcai kws Aloos hab nwg cov xeebntxwv yuav tau coj moog ibtxhis le.
“Ntawm nuav yog tej kws koj yuavtsum ua rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub, muab puab tsaa ua povthawj ua kuv teg num. Muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj hab ob tug laug yaaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le.
Muab cov tseem moov nplej kws tsi xyaw keeb zuaj ua ib cov ncuav, muab ib cov moov ntse roj txiv ntoo ua dlua ib cov ncuav, muab ib cov puab ua tej lub nyag nyag muab roj txiv ntoo pleev rua sau.
Koj ca le muab cov ncuav ntawd ntim rua huv tawb coj tuaj fij rua kuv thaus kws koj muab tug ntsuag nyuj hab ob tug laug yaaj tua fij.
“Koj ca le coj Aloos hab nwg cov tub moog rua tom lub qhovrooj kws yuav moog rua huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib, hab muab dlej lug ua kevcai ntxuav puab.
Koj muab cov tsoog tsho rua Aloos naav kws yog lub tsho ntev, lub tsho efaus, lub tsho kws naav npug lub tsho efaus, dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab hab txuj hlaab rua nwg sa.
Khu txuj phuam rua Aloos ntoo sau taubhau, hab muab dlaim phaj kub dlawbhuv kws txaug cov lug has tas, ‘Dlawbhuv rua tug TSWV,’ khi rua sau txuj phuam.
Ces koj muab cov roj kws txhawb meejthawj laub rua Aloos taubhau hab muab nwg tsaa ua povthawj.
“Koj coj Aloos cov tub tuaj hab muab cov tsho nuav rua puab naav;
muab hlaab rua puab sa hab muab mom rua puab ntoo. Ua le ntawd yog koj tsaa Aloos hab nwg cov tub ntaag. Ces puab hab puab cov xeebntxwv yuav ua povthawj ua kuv teg num moog ibtxhis le.
“Caab tug txiv nyuj moog rua ntawm hauv ntej lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib, has rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub kuas tsaa teg rua sau tug txiv nyuj taubhau.
Muab tug txiv nyuj ntawd tua taabmeeg tug TSWV rua ntawm lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub sis ntsib.
Muab koj tug ntivteg tub tug txiv nyuj ntawd cov ntshaav moog pleev rua lub thaaj cov kub. Ces dlua le cov ntshaav kws seem muab laub ywg lub taw thaaj kuas taag.
Koj muab cov paavywj, nplooj sab kws zoo tshaaj plawg hab ob lub raum nrug cov npluag roj kws qhwv ob lub raum, coj moog hlawv rua sau lub thaaj fij rua kuv.
Tabsis tug nyuj cov nqaj, dlaim tawv hab cov plaab nyuv mas muab coj moog hlawv rua saab nrau ntug yeej. Qhov nuav yog muab fij tshem cov povthawj lub txim povtseg.
“Muab ib tug yaaj lug hab has rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub, kuas puab tsaa teg rua sau tug yaaj ntawd taubhau,
hab koj ca le muab tug yaaj ntawd tua, muab cov ntshaav coj moog ywg rua lub thaaj.
Ces muab tug yaaj ntawd txav ua tej dlaim; ntxuav tej plaab nyuv hab cov cegqaab kuas huv, coj moog tso tshooj rua sau lub taubhau hab sau cov nqaj.
Muab taagnrho tug yaaj ntawd coj moog hlawv rua sau lub thaaj fij rua tug TSWV, kuas tej paa tsw qaab ntxag rua tug TSWV.
“Koj muab dlua ib tug yaaj lug hab has kuas Aloos hab nwg cov tub tsaa teg rua sau tug yaaj ntawd taubhau.

Koj muab tug yaaj ntawd tua, hab muab mivntsiv ntshaav coj moog pleev rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub cov tsho ntev lub ntsej saab xis hab pleev rua puab cov ntivtaw xoo saab xis. Muab cov ntshaav kws seem coj moog ywg rua lub thaaj plaub saab ntawd huv tuabsi.

Koj muab mivntsiv ntshaav sau lub thaaj hab mivntsiv roj txhawb meejthawj nchus rua Aloos hab nwg lub tsho, nwg cov tub hab puab cov tsho. Ces nwg hab nwg cov tub hab puab tej tsoog tsho txhaj dlawbhuv txaus kuv sab.
“Muab tej roj yaaj hlais tseg, tej roj taubqaab, tej paavywj, nplooj sab, ob lub raum nrug cov npluag roj kws qhwv ob lub raum hab cegqaab saab xis.
Rhu cov ncuav kws tub muab fij rua kuv lawm huv lub tawb lug, muab ib yaam ib lub le nuav: muab ib lub ncuav xyaw roj txiv ntoo, muab ib lub ncuav tsi xyaw roj, muab ib lub ncuav nyag nyag,
hab koj muab taagnrho cov khoom fij nuav rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub, kuas puab muab yom fij rua kuv.

Ces koj rov txais cov zaub mov ntawm puab teg lug, hab muab coj moog hlawv rua sau lub thaaj, tso tshooj ntxiv rua sau cov zaub mov kws tub muab hlawv fij rua kuv lawm. Tej paa ntawd yuav tsw qaab ntxag txaus kuv sab heev.
“Koj muab lub hauv nrob yaaj coj lug yom fij tshwjxeeb rua kuv. Thooj nqaj hauv nrob nuav yog koj tug.
“Tug yaaj kws muab tua yom fij rua kuv, thaus ua kevcai tsaa tug povthawj, yuavtsum muab lub hauv nrob hab cegqaab tshwj rua ib caag, tseg rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub.
Thaus kuv tsaav tuabneeg fij puab tej khoom sis raug zoo, mas muab lub hauv nrob hab cegqaab ua cov povthawj tug, kuv txhaj tsi hloov sab. Qhov nuav yog cov pejxeem muab rua kuv kws yog tug TSWV.
“Thaus Aloos tuag, muab nwg cov rig tsho kws yog tug povthawj rua nwg cov tub naav, rua qhov puab yuav naav thaus kws tsaa puab ua povthawj.
Aloos tug tub kws ua povthawj hloov nwg chaw yuavtsum naav cev rig tsho ntawd xyaa nub, thaus kws nwg tuaj rua huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib hab ua kuv teg num huv Chaav Dlawbhuv.
“Coj tug yaaj kws tua ua kevcai tsaa Aloos hab nwg cov tub ntawd, moog hau rua huv chaav dlawbhuv.
Puab yuav noj cov nqaj yaaj hab cov ncuav kws tseg rua huv lub tawb nyob ntawm kuv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj.
Puab yuavtsum noj tej zaub mov kws ua kevcai ntxuav zaam txim thaus tsaa puab ntawd.
Tej nqaj lossis tej mov kws seem txug taagkig sawv ntxuv tsi xob noj lawm, ca le muab hlawv povtseg; rua qhov yog tej khoom kws dlawbhuv.
“Koj ua kevcai tsaa rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub kuas txwm nkaus xyaa nub, ib yaam le kuv tau saamfwm rua koj lawm.

Txhua nub twg koj yuavtsum muab ib tug txiv nyuj lug tua theej txhoj, ua kev zaam puab lub txim. Hab qhov nuav yog koj ua kevcai ntxuav lub thaaj. Koj ca le muab roj txiv ntoo laub rua lub thaaj ua kuas lub thaaj dlawbhuv.

Ua le nuav kuas txwm nkaus xyaa nub. Lub thaaj txhaj yuav dlawbhuv, hab txhua tug tuabneeg lossis txhua yaam kws moog chwv lub thaaj, lub thaaj yuav ua rua txhua tug tuabneeg lossis tej khoom ntawd dlawbhuv.
“Yuavtsum muab ob tug mivnyuas yaaj kws muaj ib xyoo moog tua hlawv rua sau lub thaaj, ib nub dlhau ib nub tsi tu le.
Muab ob tug mivnyuas yaaj ntawd ib tug tua hlawv theej txhoj rua thaus sawv ntxuv hab muab ib tug tua hlawv rua thaus yuav tsaus ntuj.
Luj ob choj moov nplej zuaj xyaw ib laamfwj tseem roj txiv ntoo, hab ib laamfwj cawv txiv maab fij nrug thawj tug mivnyuas yaaj.

Tug mivnyuas yaaj kws hlawv theej txhoj thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, muab moov nplej, roj txiv ntoo, hab cawv txiv maab coj moog fij nrug ib yaam le tug kws fij thaus sawv ntxuv. Cov nuav yog tej zaub mov kws fij rua kuv kws yog tug TSWV, hab tej paa ntawd yuav tsw qaab ntxag txaus kuv sab.

Yuavtsum ua kevcai hlawv khoom fij le nuav taabmeeg kuv rua ntawm lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib lub qhovrooj moog ibtxhis. Kuv yuav nrug koj thaam hab ntsib kuv tsaav tuabneeg ntawm qhov chaw ntawd.
Kuv yuav ntsib cov Yixalayees ntawm qhov chaw ntawd, hab kuv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab huv kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib yuav ua rua thaaj chaw ntawd dlawbhuv.
Kuv yuav ua kuas lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw sis ntsib hab lub thaaj dlawbhuv, hab kuv yuav tsaa Aloos hab nwg cov tub ua cov povthawj ua kuv teg num.
Kuv yuav nrug cov Yixalayees nyob, hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv.
Puab yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV, puab tug Vaajtswv kws coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, kuv txhaj nrug puab nyob. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv ntaag.
“Muab ntoo kubtwg ua ib lub thaaj hlawv tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab.
Lub thaaj ntawd txua ua plaub faab, ntev ib tshim hab dlaav ib tshim, hab sab ob tshim. Txua plaub tug kub koom hlo rua plaub ceg kaum thaaj.
Koj muab tej tseem kub vuam rua plaub saab, hab plaub tug kub huv tuabsi, hab muab ib pluaj kub ntsa puab tug ntug thoob plawg.
Ua plaub lub khawb kub rua lub thaaj, hab muab ntsa rua ob saab huv qaab tug ntug, ib saab twg ob lub ua chaw ntxig laag kwv lub thaaj.
Muab ntoo kubtwg txua ua laag kwv lub thaaj hab muab kub vuam ob tug laag ntawd huv tuabsi.
Muab lub thaaj ntawd txawb rua ntawm dlaim ntaub kws thaiv lub Phijxaab saab nrau nuav. Qhov chaw ntawd, txhaj yog qhov chaw kws kuv yuav ntsib koj.
Txhua taagkig kws Aloos tuaj tu cov teeb, nwg yuavtsum hlawv moov tshuaj kuas tsw qaab ntxag rua sau lub thaaj ntawd.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj kws Aloos tuaj taws cov teeb, nwg yuavtsum hlawv tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab ntawd ib yaam nkaus. Tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab nuav yuavtsum hlawv fij rua tug TSWV moog ibtxhis le.
Tsi xob muab tej yaam moov tshuaj tsw qaab kws tsi dlawbhuv lossis tsaj lossis qoobloo hlawv rua sau lub thaaj ntawd, hab tsi pub laub cawv txiv maab fij rua sau lub thaaj ntawd.

Aloos yuavtsum muab tej ntshaav tsaj kws tua theej txhoj, pleev lub thaaj plaub tug kub ua kevcai ntxuav ib xyoos ib zag. Yuavtsum ua le nuav txhua xyoo moog ibtxhis le. Lub thaaj nuav yog lub kws dlawbhuv kawg nkaus rua kuv kws yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas,
“Thaus koj txheeb cov Yixalayees npe, txhua tug txivneej yuavtsum them nyaj rua kuv txhwv nwg txujsa rov qaab, ua le nuav thaus koj taabtom txheeb npe, puab txhaj tsi raug kev puamtsuaj.
Txhua tug kws sau npe yuavtsum them nyaj kuas puv ntoob le kws tau kom tseg, muab luj kuas nyaav ntaus nqe lawv le numtswv kevcai. Txhua tug yuavtsum them cov nyaj nuav ua khoom fij rua kuv.
Txhua tug tuabneeg kws muaj noobnyoog neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws tub sau npe taag lawm, yuavtsum coj nyaj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV.
Thaus puab them cov nyaj nuav txhwv puab txujsa, kuas tug npluanuj tsi xob them ntau tshaaj, hab tug pluag tsi xob them tsawg tshaaj.

Txais cov nyaj kws cov pejxeem Yixalayees coj tuaj khaws tseg tau siv rua huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib. Cov nyaj nuav yog coj tuaj txhwv puab txujsa, kuv yuav ncu ntsoov tsomkwm puab.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Koj muab tooj ua ib lub phab hab lub taw phab. Coj moog txawb rua ntawm lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw sis ntsib hab lub thaaj kis nruab nraab, hab nqaa dlej lug laub kuas puv nkaus lub phab ntawd.
Aloos hab nwg cov tub txhaj tau cov dlej ntawd ntxuav teg ntxuav taw
ua ntej kws puab moog huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog qhov chaw sis ntsib lossis thaus puab moog sawv fij zaub mov rua ntawm lub thaaj. Puab txhaj tsi raug tua tuag.
Puab yuavtsum ncu ntsoov ntxuav teg hab ntxuav taw, puab txhaj yuav tsi tuag. Qhov nuav ua ib txuj kevcai rua puab hab puab tej xeebntxwv coj moog ibtxhis le.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas,
“Muab tej khoom tsw qaab nuav: kaum ob choj moov tshuaj tsw qaab, rau choj nroj tsw qaab, rau choj quavntsuas tauj tsw qaab,
hab kaum ob choj ntoo kubtwg (muab luj kuas nyaav ntaus nqe lawv le numtswv kevcai). Laub ib taub roj txiv ntoo ntxiv rua,
hab muab nyoj ua cov roj txhawb meejthawj, sis tov kuas zoo ib yaam le cov tshuaj tsw qaab.
Muab cov roj ntawd pleev lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib hab lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg,
lub rooj hab tej cuabyeej kws siv rua lub rooj, lub teeb hab tej cuabyeej kws siv rua lub teeb, lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab,
lub thaaj kws hlawv tej khoom fij hab tej cuabyeej kws siv rua lub thaaj ntawd, hab lub phab tooj kws ntxuav teg ntxuav taw hab lub taw phab.
Qhov kws koj ua le nuav yog muab tej ntawd fij kuas dlawbhuv, ces txhua tug tuabneeg lossis txhua yaam kws chwv tej ntawd txhaj le dlawbhuv, vim chwv raug yaam kws dlawbhuv.
Koj muab Aloos hab nwg cov tub txhawb meejthawj, hab muab puab tsaa ua cov povthawj ua kuv teg num.
Koj has rua cov pejxeem Yixalayees tas, ‘Mej yuavtsum siv cov roj txhawb meejthawj kws dlawbhuv nuav ua kuv teg num moog ibtxhis.

Cov roj nuav, koj tsi xob muab laub rua tej tug tuabneeg kws tsi raug tsaa hab koj tsi xob muab cov roj nuav ua qauv moog ua dlua ib co kuas zoo le cov nuav ntxiv lawm. Cov roj nuav dlawbhuv, mas koj yuavtsum saib taug cov roj dlawbhuv nuav.

Yog leejtwg txhobtxwm ua dlua ib cov roj kuas zoo le cov nuav lossis muab cov nuav moog laub rua tug tuabneeg kws tsi yog povthawj, tug ntawd yuav raug rhu tawm huv kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog.’ ”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le muab xatates, aunikes, nkanpanoos hab cov tseem roj ntoo tsw qaab kws tsw qaab ntxag nuav (txhua yaam muab luj kuas nyaav sis npaug zog),
coj moog zum ua ke ua ib cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab muab ntsev tov ntxiv rua kuas sis tov zoo txhaj dlawbhuv.

Muab zum kuas ua moov mog heev, hab nqaa moog ca rua huv lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib, hab muab nphoo rua ntawm hauv ntej lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg. Cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab nuav ua kuas mej dlawbhuv rua tug TSWV.
Tsi xob muab tug qauv nuav moog ua moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua mej siv ntxiv lawm. Tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab nuav ua kuas mej dlawbhuv rua tug TSWV.
Yog leejtwg tseem ua dlua ib cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab zoo le cov nuav lug rua nwg siv, ca le muab tug ntawd rhu tawm huv kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas,
“Kuv xaiv Hules tug xeebntxwv kws yog Ulis tug tub Npexalees kws yog xeem Yudas,
hab kuv pub rua nwg puv npo Vaaj ntsujplig.  Kuv pub rua nwg muaj kev totaub, kev txawj paub hab muaj peevxwm ua tau num txhua yaam,
kuas muaj tswvyim txawj muab qauv txua tau txhua yaam, nchuav kub, nchuav nyaj hab nchuav tooj;
txawj txav tej saw lug sis dlhos; txaug ntoo hab txawj ua tau txhua yaam khoom huv tuabsi.

Hab kuv tseem xaiv Ahixamas tug tub Auhauli-as kws yog xeem Daas lug nrug Npexalees ua num ua ke. Kuv pub tswvyim zoo rua lwm tug, kuas puab muaj peevxwm ua tau txhua yaam kws kuv has kuas puab ua, xws le:
Lub Tsevntaub kws yog kuv qhov chaw sis ntsib, lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab lub hau phijxaab, taagnrho tej cuabyeej kws siv huv lub Tsevntaub,
lub rooj hab tej cuabyeej kws siv rua lub rooj, tug ncej teeb kws tseem kub hab tej cuabyeej kws siv rua lub teeb, lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab,
lub thaaj kws hlawv khoom fij hab tej cuabyeej kws siv rua lub thaaj, lub phab ntxuav teg ntxuav taw hab lub taw phab,
cov tsho ntev kws Aloos hab nwg cov tub naav thaus puab ua cov povthawj teg num,
cov roj txhawb meejthawj, hab cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua Chaav Dlawbhuv Kawg Nkaus. Puab yuavtsum ua txhua yaam nuav, kuas tav lawv le kws kuv tau has rua koj lawm.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes

kuas qha rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Mej yuavtsum muab kuv nub Xanpataus ua nub su, rua qhov nub ntawd yog lub cim rua mej hab kuv moog ibtxhis, hab qha kuas mej paub has tas kuv yog mej tug TSWV, tug kws xaiv mej lug ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg.
Mej yuavtsum fwm nub Xanpataus, rua qhov nub ntawd yog nub tseemceeb heev rua mej. Tabsis yog leejtwg tsi fwm nub ntawd, nwg moog ua num nub ntawd, ca le muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.
Mej muaj rau nub ua mej tej num, tabsis nub xyaa yog nub su kws dlawbhuv rua tug TSWV; yog leejtwg tseem moog ua num nub Xanpataus, ca le muab tug ntawd tua povtseg.
Cov Yixalayees yuavtsum muab nub Xanpataus saib kuas muaj nqes moog ibtxhis, ncu ntsoov nub ntawd yog lub cim rua cov lug cog tseg.
Nub Xanpataus yog lub cim rua kuv hab cov Yixalayees moog ibtxhis le, rau nub ntawd kuv tsim lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb, tabsis nub xyaa kuv su, hab tsi tsim ib yaam dlaabtsi ntxiv lawm.”
Thaus Vaajtswv has txhua yaam rua Mauxes sau Roob Xinais lawm, Vaajtswv txhaj muab ob dlaim txag zeb kws Vaajtswv muab nwg tug ntivteg sau nwg cov lug saamfwm cob rua Mauxes.

Thaus cov tuabneeg pum has tas Mauxes pheej tsi nqeg sau roob lug, puab txawm sis sau tuaj cuag Aloos hab has rua nwg tas, “Peb tsi paub sov muaj xwm dlaabtsi rua Mauxes tug kws coj peb nraag tebchaws Iziv lug lawm; yog le ntawd, koj ca le nchuav ib tug vaajtswv  lug ua tug coj peb.”
Aloos teb puab has tas, “Ca le moog hle mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas tej qhws ntsej kub nqaa tuaj rua kuv.”
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj hle taagnrho puab tej qhws ntsej kub nqaa tuaj rua Aloos.

Aloos muab cov qhws ntsej kub ntawd moog hlawv huv lub yeejvub kuas yaaj, hab muab nchuav ua ib tug mlom nyuj. Puab has tas, “Ib tsoom Yixalayees, tug nuav yog tug vaajtswv kws coj peb nraag tebchaws Iziv lug!”
Tom qaab ntawd, Aloos ua ib lub thaaj rua ntawm tug mlom nyuj ntawd hauv ntej hab tshaajtawm rua suavdlawg has tas, “Pigkig peb yuav ua ib pluag noj haus ua tug TSWV tsaug.”

Taagkig thaus kaaj ntug txoog puab txhaj coj tsaj tuaj tua hlawv fij theej txhoj hab muab dlua ib cov tua fij ua kev sis raug zoo. Cov pejxeem txhaj nyob quastsawg noj tsau haus qaug, sawv dlha seev cev hab sis ntxag.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj ca le maaj nrooj nqeg rov qaab moog taamsim nuav, rua qhov cov pejxeem kws koj coj nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, puab ua txhum hab tso kuv tseg lawm.

Puab tso txujkev kws kuv kuas puab taug tseg lawm; puab muab kub nchuav ua ib tug mlom txiv nyuj, puab pe tug mlom nyuj ntawd, muab khoom fij rua tug mlom nyuj hab puab has tas, ib tsoom Yixalayees, tug nuav yog tug vaajtswv kws coj peb nraag tebchaws Iziv lug ntaag!
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, kuv paub cov tuabneeg nuav zoo lawm, puab yeej tawv ncauj heev.
Nwgnuav, tsi xob cheem kuv. Kuv chim rua puab heev, kuv yuav ua kuas puab raug kev puamtsuaj. Ces kuv yuav tsaa koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv ua tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb.”

Tabsis Mauxes thov tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV, koj tub tau siv koj tug zug hab lub fwjchim coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, vim le caag koj yuav chim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg ua luaj?

Cov Iziv yuav has tas, koj coj koj tsaav tuabneeg tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug, yog koj coj puab lug tua povtseg hab ua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag rua tom roob mojsaab qhua xwb! Thov koj ua sab ntev hab txu koj txujkev chim, tsi xob tso kev puamtsuaj lug rua koj tsaav tuabneeg.

Thov koj ncu ntsoov Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj kws yog koj cov tubkhai. Ncu ntsoov tej lug kws koj tau cog tseg lawm has tas, koj yuav pub rua puab muaj xeebntxwv coob ib yaam le cov nubqub sau ntuj hab koj yuav muab lub tebchaws kws koj coglug tseg rua puab cov xeebntxwv, hab ua puab tug moog ibtxhis le.”
Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj hloov sab hab tsi tso kev puamtsuaj lug rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg le kws nwg tau has lawm.
Mauxes txawm nqeg sau roob lug, nwg nqaa ob dlaim txag zeb kws sau cov lug saamfwm rua ob saab nrug nwg lug.
Vaajtswv yog tug txua ob dlaim txag zeb hab sau tej lug saamfwm, hab nwg txaug npe ntawv rua sau ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd.
Thaus Yausuas nov cov tuabneeg qw ua tsuj ua tsaug, nwg has rua Mauxes has tas, “Kuv nov suab sis ntaus sis tua qw ua tsuj ua tsaug nraag lub yeej tuaj.”
Mauxes teb has tas, “Tsi yog lub suab qw zoo le thaus ntaus yeej rog lossis lub suab quaj thaus swb rog; lub suab ntawd yog suab hu nkauj.”

Thaus Mauxes lug ze lub yeej, nwg pum tug mlom nyuj hab pum cov tuabneeg dlha seev cev lomzem xauv npo, nwg chim heev. Nwg txhaj muab ob dlaim txag zeb ntawm nwg teg ntsawm tawg ntsoog ntxawg rua ntawm taw roob.
Nwg coj tug mlom nyuj kws puab nchuav ntawd moog hlawv, muab zum ua moov mog nyoos, hab muab tov dlej rua cov Yixalayees haus.
Mauxes nug Aloos has tas, “Cov tuabneeg nuav ua le caag rua koj, koj txhaj coj puab ua kev txhum luj npaum le nuav?”
Aloos teb has tas, “Koj tsi xob chim rua kuv, koj yeej paub cov tuabneeg nuav, puab lub sab yeej nyam ua txujkev phem.
Puab tuaj thov kuv has tas, ‘Peb tsi paub sov muaj xwm dlaabtsi rua Mauxes tug kws coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug lawm; yog le ntawd, koj ca le nchuav ib tug mlom lug coj peb.’
Kuv txhaj has kuas puab nqaa puab tej saw kub hab tej qhws ntsej kub kws puab muaj tuaj rua kuv. Kuv txhaj coj moog hlawv rua huv qhovcub, ces txawm ua tau tug mlom nyuj nuav.”
Mauxes pum has tas, Aloos tsi tswj cov tuabneeg hab tso puab ua tej kev txaajmuag taabmeeg rua tej yeebncuab saib tsi taug puab.
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj le moog sawv ntawm roojvaag qw has tas, “Leejtwg tuaj tug TSWV tog ca le lug cuag kuv!” Taagnrho xeem Levis txawm sau nthwv lug vij Mauxes,

Mauxes has rua puab tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv saamfwm kuas mej nyag nqaa nyag raab ntaaj hab pib ntawm lub roojvaag nuav moog kuas thoob plawg lub yeej nuav muab mej tej kwvtij, tej phoojywg, hab mej tej tuabneeg zej zog tua povtseg kuas taag.”
Cov Levis noog Mauxes lug, nub ntawd puab txhaj muab cov txivneej tua tuag kwvyees le peb txheeb leej.

Mauxes has rua cov Levis has tas, “Nub nua mej rov tsaa mej  ua povthawj ua tug TSWV teg num, rua qhov mej muab mej tej tub hab tej kwvtij tua povtseg, yog le ntawd, nub nua tug TSWV txhaj foom koob moov rua mej.”
Nub tom qaab Mauxes has rua cov pejxeem has tas, “Mej ua kev txhum luj heev. Tabsis nwgnuav kuv yuav rov moog cuag tug TSWV sau roob dlua; tej zag kuv yuav moog thov tau tug TSWV zaam txim rua mej.”
Mauxes rov moog cuag tug TSWV hab thov has tas, “Cov tuabneeg nuav ua kev txhum luj kawg le. Puab muab kub nchuav ua ib tug vaajtswv hab puab pe tug vaajtswv ntawd.
Thov koj zaam puab tej kev txhum; tabsis yog koj zaam tsi tau, thov koj rhu kuv lub npe tawm huv phoo ntawv kws koj tub sau koj tsaav tuabneeg tej npe lawm.”
Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Cov twg ua txhum rua kuv, cov ntawd txhaj yog cov kws yuav raug rhu npe tawm huv kuv phoo ntawv moog xwb.

Taamsim nuav koj ca le rov qaab moog, coj cov pejxeem moog nyob qhov chaw kws kuv tub qha rua koj lawm. Ncu ntsoov, kuv tug timtswv yuav moog ua mej ntej coj mej kev, tabsis thaus txug lub sijhawm kuv txav txim, kuv yuav txav txim rua puab tej kev txhum.”
Tug TSWV tso kaab mob kis lug rua cov pejxeem, rua qhov puab yuam Aloos muab kub nchuav ua ib tug mlom nyuj rua puab pe.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj hab cov tuabneeg kws koj coj nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, ca le tawm ntawm qhov chaw nuav, hab moog nyob lub tebchaws kws kuv coglug tseg rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj has tas, kuv yuav muab rua puab cov xeebntxwv nyob.
Kuv yuav tso ib tug timtswv lug coj mej kev, kuv yuav ntab cov tuabneeg Kana-aas, cov Amaules, cov Hitis, cov Pelixes, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus kuas tsiv tawm moog.

Mej yuav moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob. Tabsis kuv yuav tsi nrug mej moog, rua qhov mej yog cov tuabneeg tawv ncauj heev, nyob tsaam kuv ua rua mej puamtsuaj taag tom ib tog kev.”
Thaus cov pejxeem nov zaaj xuv tsi zoo nuav, puab txawm pib quaj hab tsi coj saw nyaj saw kub le lawm.

Vim tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes kuas has rua puab tas, “Mej yog cov tuabneeg tawv ncauj. Yog kuv nrug mej moog, nyob tsaam kuv ua rua mej puamtsuaj taag. Nwgnuav ca le hle mej tej nyaj tej kub ca, kuv txhaj paub has tas yuav ua le caag rua mej.”
Yog le ntawd, tom qaab kws puab tawm ntawm Roob Xinais moog lawm, cov Yixalayees txhaj tsi coj nyaj tsi coj kub lawm.

Txhua qhov kws cov Yixalayees tsuam chaw su, Mauxes coj lub Tsevntaub moog tsaa rua tom ntug yeej. Lub tsev ntawd hu ua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, hab yog leejtwg xaav moog cuag tug TSWV nwg yuavtsum moog rua huv lub tsevntaub.
Yog thaus twg Mauxes tawm moog rua tom lub tsev ntawd, cov pejxeem tawm tuaj sawv ntawm puab tej qhovrooj tsevntaub hab saib Mauxes moog kuas nkaag plawg rua huv lub tsev ntawd.
Thaus Mauxes moog rua huv lub tsevntaub lawm, tauv fuab txawm txaav lug npug nkaus lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub, hab tug TSWV nrug Mauxes thaam huv tauv fuab tuaj.
Thaus cov pejxeem pum tauv fuab txaav lug rua ntawm lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub, puab suavdlawg tawm huv puab tej tsev tuaj sawv ntawm nyag lub qhovrooj pehawm tug TSWV.

Tug TSWV nrug Mauxes thaam tim ntsej tim muag ib yaam le ob tug phoojywg sis thaam. Ces thaus sis thaam taag, Mauxes maam rov qaab lug tsev. Tabsis Noos tug tub Yausuas kws yog tug tub hluas paab Mauxes, nwg yeej nyob rawv huv lub Tsevntaub ntawd le.

Mauxes has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Koj yeej kuas kuv coj cov tuabneeg nuav moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, tabsis koj tub tsi qha rua kuv paub tug kws koj yuav tso nrug kuv moog. Koj has tas koj paub kuv zoo hab txaus sab rua kuv.

Yog koj txaus sab rua kuv, thov qha tej kev kws koj npaaj sab yuav ua ntawd rua kuv paub, kuv txhaj yuav ua tau tej kws hum koj sab. Ncu ntsoov has tas koj tub xaiv tsaav tuabneeg nuav ua koj tug lawm.”
Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Kuv yuav nrug koj moog hab pub kuas koj muaj yeej.”
Mauxes teb tug TSWV has tas, “Yog koj tsi nrug peb moog, thov tsi xob tso peb tawm qhov chaw nuav moog.

Yog koj tsi nrug peb moog, leejtwg yuav paub has tas, koj txaus sab rua kuv hab rua koj tsaav tuabneeg? Koj nrug peb moog txhaj yuav cais tau peb tawm ntawm luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nplajteb nuav.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Kuv yuav ua lawv le koj thov, rua qhov kuv paub koj zoo hab kuv yeej txaus sab rua koj.”
Ces Mauxes txawm thov has tas, “Thov koj qha koj tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab rua kuv pum.”
Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Kuv yuav tso kuv tej kev zoo moog ua koj ntej, hab kuv yuav qha kuv lub npe kws yog tug TSWV taabmeeg koj; kuv yuav hlub tug kws kuv hlub hab taabncuab tug kws kuv taabncuab.
Kuv tsi pub koj pum kuv lub ntsejmuag, rua qhov yeej tsi muaj ib tug tuabneeg twg kws pum kuv es tseem muaj sa nyob,
tabsis muaj ib qhov chaw nyob ntawm kuv ib saab nuav, koj ca le nce moog sawv sau lub pobzeb ntawd.
Thaus kuv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab hlaa lug, kuv yuav muab koj tso rua huv kis pobzeb, hab muab kuv txhais teg thaiv koj moog txug thaus kws kuv hlaa dlhau koj moog lawm.
Ces kuv yuav tshem kuv txhais teg tawm, hab koj yuav pum kuv lub nrausqaum tabsis tsi pum kuv lub ntsejmuag.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Koj txav dlua ob dlaim txag zeb kuas zoo ib yaam le thawj ob dlaim, hab kuv yuav sau tej lug kws nyob huv thawj ob dlaim kws koj muab tsoo tawg lawm rua huv ob dlaim tshab ntawd.
Koj yuavtsum ua kuas tav rua pigkig, hab pigkig sawv ntxuv koj ca le tuaj rua sau Roob Xinais nuav, tuaj cuag kuv rua sau ncov roob.
Tsi xob pub leejtwg nrug koj tuaj; tsi pub kuas leejtwg tuaj rua kuv pum sau roob nuav le; hab tsi xob pub yaaj, tshis hab nyuj tuaj noj zaub ze ntawm lub taw roob nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj txav ob dlaim txag zeb zoo le thawj ob dlaim, hab taagkig sawv ntxuv nwg txhaj nqaa ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd nce moog rua sau Roob Xinais lawv le tug TSWV has rua nwg lawm.
Tug TSWV lug nyob huv tauv fuab, nrug Mauxes sawv ua ke, hab qha nwg lub npe dlawbhuv kws yog hu ua tug TSWV rua Mauxes.

Tug TSWV hlaa Mauxes xubndlag moog hab hu has tas, “Kuv yog tug TSWV, Vaajtswv tug kws muaj lub sab puv nkaus kev hlub hab taabncuab, yog tug kws tsi chim sai hab yog tug kws muaj kev hlub hab ncaaj nceeg.

Kuv txujkev hlub yuav nyob nrug ntau txheeb tam tuabneeg,  hab zaam txim rua tej tuabneeg ua phem hab muaj txim; tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua puab tej xeebntxwv moog txug peb hab plaub tam tuabneeg, rua qhov puab nam puab txiv tau ua txhum lug lawm.”
Mauxes txhus caug ndlua hab nyo ntshis rua huv aav pehawm.

Mauxes has tas, “Tug TSWV, yog koj txaus sab rua kuv tag, kuv thov koj nrug peb moog. Cov tuabneeg nuav yeej tawv ncauj heev, tabsis thov koj zaam tej kev phem kws peb ua hab lub txim kws peb muaj, hab thov koj leeg yuav peb ua koj tsaav tuabneeg.”

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Kuv coglug rua cov Yixalayees. Kuv yuav ua txujci tseemceeb rua suavdlawg pum, yog tej txujci kws kuv yeej tsi tau ua rua ib tsaav tuabneeg twg pum nyob huv nplajteb nuav le. Txhua tug yuav pum kuv kws yog tug TSWV ua tau txujci tseemceeb, rua qhov kuv yuav ua tej kws txaus ntshai rua mej pum.

Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le txuj kevcai kws kuv muab rua mej nub nua lawm. Kuv txhaj yuav ntab cov Amaules, cov Kana-aas, cov Hitis, cov Pelixes, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus kuas tsiv tawm ua ntej mej moog txug.
Mej tsi xob coglug nrug cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej yuav moog nyob ntawd, rua qhov tej ntawd yuav ua rooj hlua caws tog mej kev.
Mej ca le muab puab tej thaaj rhuav povtseg, muab puab tej ncej zeb tsoo kuas tawg taag, hab muab puab tej ncej mlom quaspuj Aselas ntuv povtseg huv tuabsi.
“Mej tsi xob pe ib tug vaajtswv twg, rua qhov kuv kws yog tug TSWV khib mej heev.

Tsi xob cog kev phoojywg nrug cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws ntawd, rua qhov thaus puab moog pe puab tej vaajtswv hab tua tsaj fij rua tej mlom ntawd, puab yuav caw mej moog koom nrug puab, hab puab yuav ntxag kuas mej nrug puab noj tej nqaj kws muab fij rua puab tej vaajtswv.
Thaus mej moog yuav puab cov ntxhais lug rua mej cov tub ua quaspuj, cov ntxhais ntawd puavleej ua namndlav rua puab tej vaajtswv, ces puab yuav coj mej cov tub moog ua ib yaam le puab ua ntawd hab.
“Mej tsi xob nchuav mlom tooj rua mej pe.

“Ncu ntsoov ua kevcai noj ncuav tsi xyaw keeb. Ib yaam le kuv tau saamfwm rua mej, lub hli Anpis mej ca le noj cov ncuav tsi xyaw keeb xyaa nub, rua qhov lub hli ntawd yog lub kws mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
“Mej tej tub hlub hab tej tsaj thawj tug mivnyuas kws yog tug txiv puavleej yog kuv tug huv tuabsi,

tabsis muab tug mivnyuas yaaj moog fij txhwv tug mivnyuas neeg luav. Yog mej tsi txhwv tug mivnyuas neeg luav rov qaab, mej ca le muab tug mivnyuas neeg luav ntawd luv cejdlaab kuas tuag. Hab txhwv mej cov tub hlub huv tuabsi rov qaab. “Tsi xob pub ib tug twg tuaj cuag kuv teg dlawb teg nplag le.
“Mej muaj rau nub ua num, nub xyaa mej yuavtsum su, txawm yog mej yuav maaj cog qoobloo lossis sau qoobloo npaum twg los xij, mej tsi xob moog ua num.
“Ncu ntsoov ua kevcai rua thaus mej pib hlais mej tej nplej caug, hab ua kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab rua thaus lub caij nplooj ntoos zeeg kws mej sau mej tej txiv maab.
“Mej txhua tug txivneej yuavtsum tuaj pehawm kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv ib xyoos twg peb zag.

Tom qaab kws kuv ntab lwm tsaav tuabneeg tsiv tawm ua ntej mej moog nyob, hab nthuav mej nrim dlej nrim aav dlaav lawm, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav tuaj txeeb mej lub tebchaws thaus kws mej ua peb zag kevcai ntawd le.
“Mej tsi xob muab ncuav xyaw keeb nqaa tuaj fij thaus mej tua tsaj fij rua kuv. Mej tsi xob tseg tej nqaj kws mej tua ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau moog txug taagkig kaaj ntug.

“Txhua xyoo mej yuavtsum muab mej tej qoobloo kws mej xub sau tau lug, nqaa tuaj tso rua huv tug TSWV lub tsev. “Mej tsi xob muab tej mivnyuas yaaj lossis mivnyuas tshis tej nqaj hau xyaw leej nam cov kua mig.”
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes has tas, “Ca le sau tej lug nuav tseg, rua qhov tej lug kws kuv cog tseg rua koj hab cov Yixalayees puavleej has lawv le tej lug nuav.”
Mauxes nrug tug TSWV nyob sau roob tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo, nwg tsi noj mov hab tsi haus dlej le. Hab Vaajtswv sau tej lug cog tseg kws yog Kaum Nqai Kevcai rua sau ob dlaim txag zeb.

Thaus Mauxes nqeg sau Roob Xinais lug, nwg nqaa ob dlaim txag zeb kws sau Kaum Nqai Kevcai ntawm nwg ob txhais teg, nwg lub ntsejmuag ci ntsaa ab, rua qhov nwg nrug tug TSWV thaam; tabsis nwg tsi paub has tas nwg lub ntsejmuag ci le ntawd.
Thaus Aloos hab cov Yixalayees pum Mauxes lub ntsejmuag ci ntsaa ab, puab ntshai heev hab tsi kaam txaav moog ze nwg le.
Tabsis Mauxes hu kuas puab tuaj cuag nwg, ces Aloos hab cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj txhaj moog cuag nwg, hab nwg nrug puab thaam.
Tom qaab ntawd, cov pejxeem Yixalayees sis sau lug sawv ncig Mauxes, hab Mauxes qha taagnrho tej kevcai kws tug TSWV muab rua nwg sau lub Roob Xinais rua puab noog.
Thaus Mauxes qha rua puab taag lawm, nwg txhaj muab ib dlaim ntaub npug nwg lub ntsejmuag.

Txhua zag kws Mauxes moog nrug tug TSWV thaam huv lub Tsevntaub, nwg muab dlaim ntaub kws npug nwg lub ntsejmuag yaws. Thaus nwg tawm lug, nwg pav tej kws tug TSWV saamfwm rua nwg rua cov Yixalayees noog
hab puab pum Mauxes lub ntsejmuag ci ntsaa ab. Mauxes rov muab ntaub npug nwg lub ntsejmuag moog txug thaus nwg rov moog cuag tug TSWV.
Mauxes hu taagnrho ib tsoom pejxeem Yixalayees tuaj sis sau ua ke hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV tej lug kws saamfwm kuas mej yuavtsum ua le nuav:
Mej muaj rau nub ua mej tej num, tabsis nub xyaa yog nub tseemceeb rua mej, nub Xanpataus yog nub kws mej su hab pehawm tug TSWV. Yog leejtwg tseem ua num nub ntawd, yuav raug tua tuag.
Txawm yog huv mej tej tsev los nub Xanpataus tsi xob rauv tawg hlo le.”
Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees tas, “Ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm:
Muab txhua yaam kws mej muaj coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV. Txhua tug kws xaav nqaa khoom tuaj fij rua tug TSWV mas yog nqaa kub, nyaj hab tooj;
tej tseem ntaub maag, ntaub xav, ntaub tsaamxem hab xuv lab; tej ntaub kws muab plaub tshis ntus;
tawv laug yaaj kws muab zaas lab; tej tseem tawv nyuj; ntoo kubtwg;
roj saam teeb; ntoo tsw qaab tso rua cov roj txhawb meejthawj hab tej moov tshuaj kws tsw qaab;
tej qai zeb hab lwm yaam hlaws kws muab xaws rua ntawm cov Povthawj Hlub lub tsho efaus hab dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab.
“Taagnrho mej cov kws muaj tswvyim ua txhua yaam yuavtsum tuaj hab ua tej kws tug TSWV saamfwm tseg nuav:
lub Tsevntaub, cov vuv lub tsev, cov xov lub tsev, cov khawb, cov laag, cov taab, cov puab, hab cov tag taw;
lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, ob tug laag, lub hau Phijxaab hab dlaim ntaub thaiv lub Phijxaab;
lub rooj, cov ceg rooj hab taagnrho tej khoom siv rua lub rooj; cov ncuav kws fij rua tug TSWV;
Lub teeb kws taws kuas cig pum kev hab tej khoom siv; cov teebxeeb hab cov roj;
lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab cov ceg; cov roj txhawb meejthawj, cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab; dlaim ntaub thaiv lub qhovrooj kws moog rua huv lub Tsevntaub;
lub thaaj hlawv khoom fij hab dlaim ntxaij tooj kws pua lub thaaj; cov ceg thaaj hab tej khoom siv rua lub thaaj; lub phab tooj ntxuav teg ntxuav taw hab lub taw phab;
dlaim ntaub xov vaaj, cov ncej vaaj hab cov tag taw, dlaim ntaub roojvaag;
lub Tsevntaub tej ntsa hab tej hlua paav lub Tsevntaub hab lub vaaj;
hab tej tsoog tsho rua cov povthawj naav thaus puab moog ua num huv Chaav Dlawbhuv, tej tsoog tsho rua Aloos kws yog tug Povthawj Hlub hab nwg cov tub naav.”
Ces cov Yixalayees txawm sawv kev moog,

hab puab txhua tug txaus sab hlo coj puab tej khoom tuaj fij ua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib. Puab puavleej nqaa txhua yaam khoom moog tso rua huv lub tsev ntawd, kuas tau siv hab ua tej tsoog tsho rua cov povthawj.
Taagnrho tej quaspuj txivneej kws xaav muab khoom fij ntawd, txhaj nqaa paaj ntaub, qhws ntsej, nplhaib, saw, paug cejdlaab hab txhua yaam kws yog saw kub tuaj fij rua tug TSWV.
Txhua tug kws muaj coj tej tseem ntaub maag, ntaub xav, ntaub tsaamxem, xuv lab lossis tej tseem tawv nyuj tuaj.
Cov kws txaus sab muab nyaj lossis tooj tuaj fij, kuas puab ca le nqaa tuaj fij rua tug TSWV, hab txhua tug kws muaj ntoo kubtwg kws zoo siv coj tuaj huv tuabsi.
Txhua tug quaspuj kws txawj ntus ntaub kuas puab nqaa tej tseem xuv maaj, xuv xav, xuv tsaamxem hab xuv lab lossis tej ntaub kws puab tub ntus tau lawm huv tuabsi tuaj.
Hab kuas puab muab tej plaub tshis xuab ua xuv.
Kuas cov thawjcoj nqaa qai zeb hab lwm yaam hlaws kws muaj nqes tuaj dlai rua lub tsho efaus hab dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab,
hab nqaa tej ntoo tsw qaab hab tej roj kws saam rua cov teeb, cov roj txhawb meejthawj, hab tej moov tshuaj kws tsw qaab tuaj.
Cov Yixalayees tej quaspuj hab txivneej kws txaus sab hlo puavleej nqaa puab tej khoom tuaj fij pub rua tug TSWV ua tej num kws tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes kuas puab ua ntawd.
Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Tug TSWV xaiv Npexalees kws yog Ulis tug tub hab yog Haules tug xeebntxwv huv xeem Yudas tuaj.
Vaajtswv pub rua nwg puv npo Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig,  muaj kev txawj, muaj peevxwm hab totaub ua tau txhua yaam,
muaj tswvyim paub muab qauv hab txawj nchuav kub nchuav, nyaj nchuav hab tooj;
txav tej qai zeb dlai ua tej tshaam, txawj txua ntoo; hab txawj ua tau txhua yaam.
Hab Vaajtswv pub rua Auhauli-as kws yog Ahixamas tug tub kws yog xeem Daas, hab Npexalees kuas muaj peevxwm qha tau lwm tug.
