Vaajtswv pub tswvyim rua obtug txawj ua txhua yaam kws yog txawj muab qauv, ntus tej tseem ntaub maag; ntaub xav, ntaub tsaamxem, hab ntaub plaub yaaj lab hab lwm yaam ntaub. Obtug muaj peevxwm ua tau txhua yaam hab txawj muab txhua yaam qauv.
“Npexalees, Auhauli-as hab txhua tug kws tug TSWV pub tswvyim kuas txawj hab totaub ua txhua yaam kws xaav tau lug ua lub Tsevntaub, puab ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV saamfwm tseg.”
Mauxes hu Npexalees, Auhauli-as hab taagnrho cov txivneej txawj ua num kws tug TSWV pub kuas muaj peevxwm hab cov kws txaus sab paab tuaj, hab Mauxes kuas puab ca le pib ua lub Tsevntaub.
Mauxes muab tej khoom kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj ua lub Tsevntaub rua puab hab cov Yixalayees tseem naj taagkig nqaa khoom fij tuaj rua Mauxes.
Ces cov txivneej kws txawj ua num txhaj moog cuag
Mauxes hab has rua nwg has tas, “Cov tuabneeg nqaa khoom tuaj ntau tshaaj tej kws peb xaav tau coj lug ua teg num kws tug TSWV saamfwm tseg kuas ua lawm.”
Ces Mauxes txhaj has rua cov pejxeem thoob plawg huv lub yeej, kuas tsi xob nqaa khoom tuaj ua lub Tsevntaub ntxiv lawm; yog le ntawd, cov pejxeem txhaj tseg tsi nqaa tuaj lawm.
Cov khoom kws puab xub nqaa tuaj, yeej txaus ua lub tsev tav lawm.
Cov txivneej kws ua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub puavleej yog cov kws paub hab txawj. Puab muab kaum dlaim ntaub maag kws txaij xav, tsaamxem, hab lab xaws ua dluab qhelunpees rua.
Cov ntaub ntawd puavleej luj sis luag, ntev neeg nkaum yim tshim hab dlaav plaub tshim.
Puab muab tsib dlaim ntaub xaws ua ib dlaig hab muab dlua tsib dlaim lug xaws ua ke ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.
Puab muab ntaub xav xaws ua ib cov ntsej tis lawv tug ntug thoob plawg dlaim ntaub ob saab ntug nrau.
Ces puab muab tsib caug lub ntsej tis rua thawj dlaim, hab muab tsib caug lub tis rua dlaim ob kuas sis ncaag zog.
Hab puab ntaus tsib caug lub khawb kub lug khawm ob dlaim ntaub ua ke.
Ces puab muab plaub tshis ntus ua kaum ib dlaim ntaub lug vuv lub Tsevntaub.
Hab puab ntus cov ntaub ntawd sis luag zog, ntev peb caug tshim hab dlaav plaub tshim.
Puab muab tsib dlaim lug xaws ua ke ua ib dlaig hab muab rau dlaim lug xaws ua ke ua ib dlaig.
Puab muab tsib caug lub ntsej tis rua thawj dlaim ntaub tug ntug ib saab hab muab dlua tsib caug lub ntsej tis rua dlaim ob tug ntug saab tod ib yaam nkaus.
Puab muab tooj ntaus ua tsib caug lub khawb khawm ob dlaim ntaub ua ib dlaig vuv lub tsev.
Puab tseem vuv ob txheej ntxiv tuaj saab sau, ib txheej yog cov tawv yaaj kws zaas lab hab ib txheej yog cov tawv kws zoo.
Puab phua ntoo kubtwg lug ua cov taab sawv ntsug rua lub Tsevntaub.
Txhua tug taab sab kaum tshim hab dlaav ib tshim hab ib dlus,
muab ob tug taab qhais ua qwb dla, kuas ob tug taab ntawd sis dlhos ua ke.
Puab ua neeg nkaum tug taab rua saab nraag
hab muab plaub caug pluaj nyaj ua taw tag cov taab, ob dlaim tag taw, tag ib tug taab kuas ob tug taab ruaj.
Saab peg qaum Tsevntaub los puab ua neeg nkaum tug taab,
hab muab plaub caug pluaj nyaj ua cov tag taw, ob dlaim ua taw tag ib tug taab.
Lub Tsevntaub tog saab nubpoob, puab ua rau tug taab
hab ua ob tug rua ntawm ob lub kaum.
Ob tug taab kws nyob ntawm kaum tsev, muab sis dlhos huv taw nto plawg rua sau. Ob tug taab ntawm ob lub kaum tsev puavleej ua zoo ib yaam nkaus.
Yog le ntawd, txhaj muab yim tug taab hab kaum rau pluaj nyaj lug ua taw, ob pluaj nyaj tag ib tug taab.
Puab muab ntoo kubtwg ua kaum tsib tug laag, tsib tug yuam ib saab phaab ntsaa Tsevntaub,
muab tsib tug yuam saab phaab ntsaa nraag, hab muab tsib tug yuam saab kws nyob saab nubpoob.
Tug laag ntoo kws yuam lub Tsevntaub saab phaab ntsaa ntu nruab nraab, yuam tog tom nuav moog ti nkaus tog tom u.
Puab muab kub lug vuam cov phaab ntsaa ntawd thoob plawg hab puab muab khawb kub khawm cov taab kws vuam kub huv tuabsi rua ntawm cov phaab ntsaa.
Dlaim ntaub thaiv, mas puab muab cov tseem ntaub maag kws txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab, xaws ua dluab qhelunpees rua ntawm dlaim ntaub ntawd huv tuabsi.
Puab muab ntoo kubtwg ua plaub tug ncej kws dlai dlaim ntaub, muab kub vuam huv tuabsi, hab muab tej khawb kub lug khawm rua. Ces puab muab nyaj ntaus ua plaub dlaim taw tag plaub tug taw ncej ntawd.
Puab muab cov tseem ntaub maag kws txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab, xaws ua paaj ntaub txaij nraug zeeg rua, lug ua dlaim npug lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub.
Puab ua tsib tug ncej dlai dlaim ntaub ntawd, muab khawb khawm rua, hab muab kub vuam cov hau ncej hab tej hlua paav ncej, hab muab tooj ua tsib dlaim taw tag tsib tug ncej ntawd.
Npexalees muab ntoo kubtwg lug txua ua lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, ntev ob tshim hab ib dlus, dlaav ib tshim hab ib dlus, sab ib tshim hab ib dlus.
Nwg muab cov tseem kub vuam saab huv, saab nrau hab ua ib tug ntug thi thoob plawg lub phijxaab.
Nwg ua plaub lub khawb kub rua lub phijxaab, hab muab ntsa rua ntawm plaub ceg kaum taw phijxaab ib saab ob lub.
Nwg muab ntoo kubtwg ua ob tug laag kwv lub Phijxaab, hab vuam kub huv tuabsi rua,
hab muab ob tug laag ntawd ntxig rua cov khawb, ib saab Phijxaab ib tug.
Nwg muab cov tseem kub lug ua lub hau phijxaab, ntev ob tshim hab ib dlus, dlaav ib tshim hab ib dlus.
Nwg muab kub ntaus ua ob tug qhelunpees,
ib tug txawb rua ib tog hau phijxaab. Nwg muab ob tug qhelunpees ntawd haam kag rua lub hau phijxaab.
Ob tug qhelunpees ntawd puavleej tig ntsejmuag tuaj ua ke, hab ob tug qhelunpees ntawd puavleej nthuav tis npug lub phijxaab.
Npexalees muab ntoo kubtwg txua ua ib lub rooj ntev ob tshim, dlaav ib tshim, sab ib tshim hab ib dlus.
Nwg muab cov tseem kub vuam lub rooj, hab muab kub ua ib tug ntug thi thoob plawg lub rooj ntawd.
Nwg ua ib tug npoo sab le ib xib ncig lub ntug hab muab kub ua tug ntug thoob plawg lub npoo.
Nwg ua plaub lub khawb kub ntsa rua plaub lub kaum rooj ntawm plaub tug ceg.
Cov khawb kws ntxig ob tug laag kwv lub rooj, muab ntsa ze rua ntawm tug ntug.
Nwg muab ntoo kubtwg ua ob tug laag kws kwv lub rooj hab muab kub vuam rua ob tug laag ntawd huv tuabsi.
Nwg tseem muab tej tseem kub nchuav ua ib cov twj taig tau siv rua lub rooj: phaaj, khob, hab taig tau siv rau cawv txiv maab ua khoom fij.
Npexalees muab cov tseem kub ua tug ncej txawb teeb. Nwg muab kub ntaus ua tug taw hab tug ncej txawb teeb; ntaus ua cov paaj, cos paaj, hab nplai paaj keevxeeb nrug tug ncej txawb teeb.
Hab ua kuas ncau ua rau ceg, ib saab peb ceg.
Rau ceg ntawd, ib ceg ua peb lub paaj zoo le paaj txiv dluaj, nrug cov cos paaj hab tej nplai paaj.
Tug ncej txawb teeb mas muab zaig ua plaub lub paaj zoo le paaj txiv dluaj, nrug cov cos paaj hab tej nplai paaj.
Ntawm rau tug ceg teeb ntawd, ua ib lub paaj rua huv qaab ntawm cov ceg ncau.
Cov cos paaj, cov ceg hab tug ncej txawb teeb yog muab tuab thooj kub ntaus ua xwb.
Ua xyaa lub teeb rua ntawm tug ncej txawb teeb, hab nwg muab tej tseem kub ntaus ua phaaj hab txab txav teebxeeb.
Nwg muab xyaa caum tsib choj kub ntaus ua tug ncej txawb teeb hab tej twj siv rua lub teeb.

Npexalees muab ntoo kubtwg txua ua lub thaaj hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab. Lub thaaj ntawd txua ua plaub faab, ntev ib tshim hab dlaav ib tshim, hab sab ob tshim. Txua plaub tug kub koom hlo rua plaub ceg kaum thaaj.
Nwg muab tej tseem kub vuam rua plaub saab hab plaub tug kub huv tuabsi, hab muab ib pluaj kub ntsa puab tug ntug thoob plawg.
Ua khawb kub rua lub thaaj hab muab ntsa rua ob saab huv qaab tug ntug, ib saab twg ob lub ua chaw ntxig tug laag kwv lub thaaj.
Nwg muab ntoo kubtwg txua ua ob tug laag kwv lub thaaj hab muab kub vuam ob tug laag ntawd huv tuabsi.
Npexalees tseem ua cov roj txhawb meejthawj dlawbhuv hab muab cov nroj tsw qaab lug tov ib yaam le tov tej tshuaj tsw qaab.
Npexalees muab ntoo kubtwg txua ua lub thaaj, qhov ntev tsib tshim, qhov dlaav tsib tshim hab sab peb tshim.
Nwg ua plaub tug kub rua sau plaub ceg kaum thaaj, plaub tug kub ntawd txua koom hlo nrug lub thaaj, hab muab tooj vuam huv tuabsi.
Nwg tseem ua tej twj siv rua lub thaaj: laujkaub, dluav, taig, nqailauj hab yag rau ncaig tawg. Tej cuabyeej nuav puavleej yog muab tooj ua xwb.
Nwg muab tooj hab ib dlaim ntxaij pua rua huv lub thaaj txug ndlua ib nraab.
Nwg Muab tooj ntaus ua plaub lub khawb ntsa rua ntawm plaub ceg kaum thaaj ua teg nqaa.
Nwg muab ntoo kubtwg txua ua ob tug laag kws kwv lub thaaj, hab muab tooj vuam rua,
hab muab ob tug laag ntawd ntxig rua ntawm plaub lub khawb kws ntsa rua ntawm lub thaaj ob saab. Muab txag ntoo ua lub thaaj hab tseg huv plawv khoob.
Npexalees ua lub phab ntxuav teg hab lub taw phab yog muab cov quaspuj kws ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj tej tsom av tooj lug nchuav ua.
Npexalees xov vaaj ncig tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub. Nwg muab dlaim ntaub maag kws ntev ib puas tshim xov saab nraag,
muab neeg nkaum tug kaav tooj ua ncej, muab neeg nkaum dlaim tooj tag taw, tabsis cov khawb hab cov hlua yog muab nyaj ua.
Xov zoo ib yaam le ntawd rua saab ntsaa vaaj peg hab.
Muab dlaim ntaub kws ntev tsib caug tshim xov saab nubpoob, txhus kaum tug ncej hab kaum dlaim tag taw, cov khawb hab cov hlua yog muab nyaj ua.
Saab nubtuaj, yog lub roojvaag kws nkaag noog rua huv, saab ntawd xov tsib caug tshim dlaav ib yaam nkaus.
Ib saab roojvaag twg ntev kaum tsib tshim, txhus peb tug ncej hab peb dlaim tag taw.
Saab roojvaag tom los ntev kaum tsib tshim, txhus peb tug ncej hab peb dlaim tag taw,
taagnrho cov ntaub kws xov ncig lub Tsevntaub yog muab tej ntaub maag zoo zoo xov xwb.
Cov tag taw ncej yog muab tooj ua, cov khawb, cov hlua paav hab cov hau khwb ncej yog muab nyaj ua. Taagnrho cov ncej laajkaab kws xov ncig lub tsev, yog muab xuv nyaj paav xwb.

Muab cov ntaub maag zoo kws txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab, xaws ua paaj ntaub txaij nraug zeeg thaiv lub roojvaag. Dlaim ntaub ntawd ntev neeg nkaum tshim hab sab tsib tshim, ib yaam le cov ntaub kws xov lub vaaj.
Plaub tug ncej hab plaub tug tag taw, cov khawb kws khawm tej ncej, cov hau khwb ncej hab cov hlua paav puavleej yog muab nyaj ua.
taagnrho cov ntsa kws ntsa lub Tsevntaub hab cov ncej laajkaab kws xov ncig lub Tsevntaub puavleej yog muab tooj ua.
Ntawm nuav moog yog teev tej khoom siv huv lub Tsevntaub. Mauxes kuas cov Levis ua txhua yaam num, hab puab nyob qaab tswjfwm ntawm Aloos tug tub Ithamas kws yog tug povthawj.
Ulis tug tub Npexalees kws yog Hules tug xeebntxwv hab yog xeem Yudas, ua txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tau saamfwm kuas ua ntawd tav taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Tug kws paab Npexalees yog Auhauli-as kws yog Ahixamas tug tub hab nwg yog xeem Daas, Auhauli-as yog tug kws txawj txaug ntoo, muab qauv hab ntus tej ntaub maag txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab.
Taagnrho tej kub kws coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV ua lub Tsevntaub ntawd nyaav ob txheeb cuaj caum tsib choj, yog luj lawv le numtswv kom tseg.
Cov nyaj kws tau lug ntawm cov pejxeem kws tuaj sau npe nyaav xyaa txheeb tsib puas tsib caug choj, yog luj lawv le numtswv kom tseg.

Taagnrho txhua tug tuabneeg kws tuaj sau npe ntawd puavleej tau them nqe sis npaug zog, hab txhua tug them tug nqe kuas lawv le numtswv kevcai. Cov txivneej kws noobnyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau, tuaj sau npe yog muaj rau pua peb txheeb tsib puas tsib caug leej.
Cov nyaj ntawd, puab muab xyaa txheeb tsib puas choj lug ua ib puas dlaim tag taw lub Tsevntaub hab ua taw rua cov ntaub xov, ib tug taw twg nyaav xyaa caum tsib choj.
Muab tsib caug choj nyaj rua Npexalees ua hlua, ua khawb khawm cov ncej, hab ua hau khwb cov ncej.
Cov tooj kws coj tuaj fij rua tug TSWV nyaav tsib txheeb peb puas kaum choj.
Npexalees muab cov tooj nuav ua cov tag taw qhovrooj rua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, ua lub thaaj, ua dlaim ntxaij hab ua taagnrho tej khoom kws siv rua lub thaaj,
cov tag ncej laajkaab kws xov ncig lub Tsevntaub hab cov tag taw ncej roojvaag, hab tej ntsaa laajkaab puavleej yog muab cov tooj ntawd ua.

Puab muab tej ntaub txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab lug xaws ua tsoog tsho rua cov povthawj naav thaus puab moog ua Vaajtswv teg num huv Chaav Dlawbhuv. Hab puab tseem xaws ib cev tsoog tsho povthawj rua Aloos, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Puab muab tej tseem ntaub maag kws txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab, hab xuv kub xaw rua lub tsho efaus.
Puab muab kub ntaus ua tej pluaj nyag nyag hab muab txav ua xuv coj lug ntus nrug cov tseem xuv maaj xav, xuv tsaamxem hab xuv lab.
Puab xaws ob txuj hlaab khuam rua sau xubpwg lu rua lub tsho efaus, hab muab ib txug khuam ib saab xubpwg, ua le ntawd txhaj muaj chaw khawm.
Muab cov xuv hab cov ntaub kws xaws lub tsho efaus lug ntus ua txuj hlaab sa kws muab xaws lu rua ntawm lub tsho efaus lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Puab muab ob lub qai zeb kws txaug Yakhauj kaum ob leeg tub cov npe rua; cog rua huv cov phaj kub.
Puab muab ob lub qai zeb ntawd ntsaws rua huv lub tsho efaus ob dlaim tag xubpwg, yog ob lub qai zeb ua kev ncu txug kaum ob xeem Yixalayees, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Puab muab tuab yaam xuv kws xaws ua lub tsho efaus, lug xaws ua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab, hab xaws paaj ntaub rua kuas zoo ib yaam nkaus.
Dlaim ntaub ntawd ua plaub faab hab muab tais ua ob tsem, ntev ib dlus hab dlaav ib dlus.
Puab cog plaub leej qai zeb rua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab: leej ib, cog ib lub lab dlaaj lig, ib lub dlaaj ntshab si hab ib lub lab tshab tshab;
leej ob, cog ib lub ntsuab ci hob, ib lub xav hab ib lub dlawb ci hob;
leej peb, cog ib lub lab ntshab si, ib lub txho tawg hab ib lub lab ua tsaamxem ntshaa;
leej plaub, cog ib lub txho xav, ib lub dlawb txho hab ib lub dlawb ntshab si. Taagnrho cov qai zeb nuav puavleej muab cog rua huv cov phaj kub.
Kaum ob lub qai zeb ntawd puavleej txaug Yakhauj kaum ob leeg tub cov npe rua, sawv cev kaum ob xeem Yixalayees.
Puab muab cov tseem kub lug ntaus ua ib txuj saw ntswj zoo le txuj hlua tis rua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab.
Puab muab kub ntaus ua ob dlaim phaj hab ob lub khawb kub, muab ob lub khawb kub tis rua ntawm dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab ob ceg kaum sau.
Puab muab ob txuj saw kub tis rua ntawm ob lub khawb kub,
hab muab ob tog tw tis rua ob dlaim phaj, ua le nuav kuas ob txuj saw lu lub tsho efaus ob dlaim tag xubpwg kws dlauv rua ntawm xubndlag.
Puab ua ob lub khawb kub tis rua dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab ob lub ntsej huv qaab ntawm tug ntug saab huv kws puab lub tsho efaus.
Puab ua dlua ob lub khawb kub tis rua lub tsho efaus ob dlaim tag xubpwg saab huv qaab ntawm xubndlag, ze rua ntawm kaab lejleeg nyob rua sau txuj hlaab kws sa lub tsho efaus.

Puab muab ntaub xav khi dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab ob lub khawb rua ntawm lub tsho efaus ob lub khawb kws txuas rua ntawm txuj hlaab, kuas dlaim ntaub npug hauvsab txhaj tsi txaav ntawm lub tsho efaus, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Lub tsho ntev kws naav tshooj sau lub tsho efaus, yog muab ntaub xav xaws.
Lub cejdlaab tshos, xaws looj sau taubhau tuaj, muab cov ntaub kws ntus sis qhab lug xaws ua lub cejdlaab tshos kuas tsi ndluag.
Puab muab ntaub txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab xaws ua ib cov txiv ntsab pobkws dlai rua ntawm lub tw tsho ntev.
Hab puab muab cov tseem kub lug ntaus ua ib cov tswb dlai rua ntawm lub tw tsho nruab nraab ntawm cov txiv ntsab pobkws,
muab cov tswb hab cov txiv ntsab pobkws dlai thoob plawg lub tw tsho, dlai ib lub txiv ntsab pobkws quas ib lub tswb, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Puab muab tej ntaub maag kws ntus tau zoo heev, xaws ib cov tsho luj rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub naav,
hab muab ntaub maag xaws phuam, mom, rig tuab lu,
hab muab cov ntaub maag kws txaij xav, tsaamxem hab lab xaws ua hlaab sa, hab xaws paaj ntaub rua kuas txaij nraug zeeg lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Puab muab cov tseem kub ntaus ua ib dlaim phaj, hab txaug npe ntawv rua sau dlaim phaj ntawd has tas, “Dlawbhuv rua tug TSWV.”
Puab muab ib txuj hlua ntaub xav khi dlaim phaj kub rua txuj phuam kws ntoo sau taubhau hab muab tig rua ntawm hauvplaj.
Txhua yaam num kws ua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib tub tav taag lawm. Cov Yixalayees ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes lawm.
Puab coj lub Tsevntaub, cov khawb, cov taab, cov laag, cov ncej hab tej tag taw ncej lug rua Mauxes;
cov tawv yaaj kws zaas lab hab cov tawv nyuj yog cov vuv; cov ntaub thaiv;
lub Phijxaab kws ntim ob dlaim txag zeb, ob tug laag, lub hau phijxaab;
lub rooj hab taagnrho tej khoom siv ntawm lub rooj, hab cov ncuav kws fij rua Vaajtswv;
tug ncej txawb teeb kws yog cov tseem kub, cov teeb, taagnrho tej khoom siv ntawm lub teeb hab cov roj saam teeb;
lub thaaj kub, cov roj txhawb meejthawj; cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab; dlaim ntaub thaiv lub qhovrooj moog rua huv lub Tsevntaub;
lub thaaj tooj nrug dlaim npug lub thaaj; cov ncej thaaj hab tej khoom siv ntawm lub thaaj; lub phab tooj ntxuav teg hab lub taw phab;

cov ntaub xov vaaj ncig lub tsevntaub hab cov ncej laajkaab hab tej tag taw ncej laajkaab; dlaim ntaub thaiv lub roojvaag hab cov hlua khi dlaim ntaub, cov ntsa hab taagnrho tej khoom kws siv rua tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib;
hab tej tsoog tsho kws xaws rua cov povthawj naav moog ua num huv Chaav Dlawbhuv, cov tsoog tsho povthawj rua Aloos hab nwg cov tub naav ua teg num povthawj.
Ces cov Yixalayees ua txhua yaam kws tug TSWV tau saamfwm rua Mauxes tav taag huv tuabsi lawm.
Mauxes tshuaj hab pum has tas txhua yaam kws cov Yixalayees ua tav taag le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg lawm tag. Yog le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj foom koob moov rua puab.
Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas,
“Koj ca le tsaa tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib rua lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab ib.
Hab muab lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg coj moog tso rua huv lub Tsevntaub hab muab dlaim ntaub dlai thaiv lub phijxaab.
Nqaa lub rooj lug teeb rua huv, muab tej cuabyeej tso rua sau lub rooj. Hab nqaa tug ncej teeb lug txawb hab muab cov teebxeeb rua huv lub teeb.
Muab lub thaaj kub kws hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab teeb rua ntawm lub Phijxaab hauv ntej hab dlai dlaim ntaub thaiv lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub.
Teeb ib lub thaaj rua ntawm lub Tsevntaub hauv ntej tau hlawv khoom fij.
Hab muab lub phab ntxuav teg ntxuav taw teeb rua kis nruab nraab ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hab lub thaaj, hab nqaa dlej lug laub rua kuas puv.
Xov vaaj ncig thoob plawg hab muab dlaim ntaub lug dlai thaiv lub roojvaag.
“Ces muab cov roj txhawb meejthawj nchus rua lub Tsevntaub hab taagnrho tej cuabyeej siv, kuas lub tsevntaub hab tej cuabyeej txhaj yuav dlawbhuv.
Dlua le ntawd, tseem muab nchus rua lub thaaj hab lub thaaj tej cuabyeej, kuas lub thaaj tej cuabyeej txhaj yuav dlawbhuv.
Hab muab nchus rua lub phab ntxuav teg ntxuav taw hab lub taw phab huv tuabsi.
“Coj Aloos hab nwg cov tub tuaj rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lub qhovrooj, hab muab dlej lug ntxuav puab.
Muab lub tsho luj rua Aloos naav hab muab nwg txhawb meejthawj, mej ua le nuav txhaj yog mej muab nwg tsaa ua povthawj ua kuv teg num.
Coj Aloos cov tub tuaj hab muab cov tsho luj rua puab naav.
Muab roj pleev puab ib yaam le pleev rua puab txiv, puab txhaj tau ua cov povthawj ua kuv teg num. Muab puab txhawb meejthawj le nuav, puab txhaj yuav tau ua cov povthawj moog ibtxhis.”
Mauxes ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV has rua nwg.
Yog le ntawd, lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab ib kws yog xyoo ob, suav txij le thaus puab tsiv tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, yog nub kws Mauxes tsaa lub Tsevntaub.
Mauxes cog cov tag taw ncej, tsaa cov taab, muab cov laag lug yuam rua hab txhus cov ncej.
Nthuav ntaub vuv lub Tsevntaub hab nthuav dlaim tawv kws vuv tuaj sau vuv lub tsev, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm lawm.
Ces Mauxes txhaj muab ob dlaim txag zeb tso rua huv lub Phijxaab. Nwg muab ob tug laag ntxig rua ntawm lub Phijxaab cov khawb hab muab lub hau khwb lub phijxaab.
Nwg muab lub Phijxaab moog tso rua huv lub Tsevntaub, hab dlai dlaim ntaub thaiv. Qhov kws nwg ua le nuav tub yog muab dlaim ntaub thaiv lub Phijxaab lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg lawm.
Mauxes teeb rooj rua huv lub Tsevntaub ntawm dlaim ntaub thaiv saab peg,
hab muab cov ncuav kws fij rua tug TSWV tso rua sau lub rooj, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg rua nwg lawm.
Nwg muab tug ncej teeb moog txawb rua huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib saab nraag kws yog nyob sis ncaag zog lub rooj,
hab nwg taws cov teeb ntawd rua huv chaav kws nrug tug TSWV sis ntsib, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg rua nwg lawm.
Nwg muab lub thaaj kub coj moog teeb rua huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib ntawm dlaim ntaub kws kem lub tsev hauv ntej,
hab hlawv tej moov tshuaj kws tsw qaab, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg rua nwg.
Ces nwg txhaj dlai dlaim ntaub thaiv lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub,

hab nwg muab lub thaaj hlawv khoom fij coj moog teeb rua ntawm hauv ntej dlaim ntaub thaiv lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub sis ntsib. Nwg coj tej khoom fij hab tej qoobloo kws yog khoom fij coj moog hlawv huv tuabsi rua sau lub thaaj, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg rua nwg.
Nwg muab lub phab ntxuav teg ntxuav taw coj moog teeb rua ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib hab lub thaaj kis nruab nraab hab nqaa dlej lug laub rua huv puv nkaus.
Mauxes, Aloos hab Aloos cov tub ntxuav puab tej teg hab tej taw ntawm lub phab ntawd,
puab ntxuav teg ntxuav taw ua ntej kws puab moog huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib lossis moog ntawm lub thaaj, lawv le tug TSWV tau saamfwm tseg rua nwg lawm.
Mauxes xov vaaj ncig lub Tsevntaub hab lub thaaj, hab nwg dlai ib dlaim ntaub thaiv lub roojvaag. Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj ua txhua yaam tav huv tuabsi lawm.
Ces pus fuab tsaus nti laum nkaus tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub hab tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab huv tsev.
Vim le ntawd, Mauxes txhaj moog tsi tau rua huv tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub.
Thaus tauv fuab tshem tawm ntawm lub Tsevntaub lawm, cov Yixalayees txhaj tshais chaw tau moog rua lwm qhov.
Tabsis yog tauv fuab ntawd tsi tshem, ces puab yeej tsi tshais chaw moog txug thaus kws tauv fuab tshem.
Lub sijhawm kws cov Yixalayees pheej tsiv moog tsiv lug, nruab nub puab yeej pum tauv fuab kws yog tug TSWV qhov chaw nyob pus tsaus nti sau lub Tsevntaub hab mo ntuj muaj nplaim tawg cig laam lug.
